40025012	Ngwuk kanda ngwuk. Ngwuk kat ana vɨga lɨgowun. Woseka ana wowun ngwuk kat ana vɨga lɨgowun waa wandɨ taagwa klavat ya njambi nyan.
40025013	Jisas ndɨna mbaapmamba la nɨmba kat vɨlaa wandɨ. Ngwuk yigumba vɨga lɨgiyangwuk. Njambwi nyan yaiga nandinya ana vɨga lɨgangwuk waa wandɨ Jisas.
40025014	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Ngɨni nyinangwupmba lɨga nyan yaiga nandinya kɨngi vat tɨgandɨ. Kɨta njambwi nyan ngay kwagalalaa nat kavat yivat tɨndɨ. Yivat tɨga ndɨna njɨvwa kwuta nɨmba kat yagwa walaa ndi kat njivwa kwindɨ.
40025015	Ndina maawupmba lɨga vak kat vɨlaa sɨga nagulaa ndi kat wan njɨvwa kwindɨ. Nat nyan kat dola 5,000 kwilaa wandɨ. Kan moni vɨga lɨgiyamɨn wandɨ. Nat nyan kat dola 2,000 kwilaa wupma ndɨ kat kwilaa wandɨ. Nat nyan kat dola 1,000 yindɨ.
40025016	5,000 dola kla nyan wungi monimba bisnis kwuka nat 5,000 kdola kla nyan wungi monimba bisnis kwuka nat 5,000 dola klandɨ. klandɨ, ndɨnamba 10,000 dola tɨndɨ.
40025017	Ndɨno 2,000 dola kla nyan wungi monimba bisnis kwuka nat 2,000 dola klandɨ. Klandɨ, ndɨnamba 4,000 dola tɨndɨ.
40025018	Ndɨno 1,000 dola kla nyan ndɨ bisnis ana kwutndi. Waangu valaa wan moni waangumba laagandɨ, tɨndɨ.
40025019	Nɨma njɨmbla lɨga njambwi nyan yalaa njɨvwa kwilaa yinda ndi kuvut nyanguna njɨvwa vɨvat yandɨ.
40025020	5,000 dola kla nyan yalaa nɨma nyan kat vɨlaa wandɨ. tat wun kat 5,000 dola kwimɨn. Wungi monimba bisnis kwuka nat 5,000 dola klawun. mɨna 10,000 dola agla waa wandɨ.
40025021	Wandɨ maa njambwi nyan wandɨ. Mɨn apma njɨvwa kwutɨma. mɨn kat njɨvwa kwiwa moni apma vat vɨga lɨmɨn. Ngɨni mɨn kat nɨma moni kwiwun, vɨga lɨgiyamɨn. Wuna ngay wuleilaa wunogwinala apma vat yetɨgiyamɨn waa wandɨ.
40025022	2,000 dola kla nyan yalaa nɨma nyan kat vɨlaa wandɨ. Tak wun kat 2,000 dola kwimɨn, wungi monimba bisnis kwuka nat 2,000 dola klawun. Mɨna 4,000 dola kɨngiyan. Agla waa wandɨ maa njambwi nyan ndɨ kat wandɨ.
40025023	Mɨn apma njɨvwa kwutɨma. Tak mɨn kat kwiwa mat moni kat apma vak vɨga lɨgiyamɨn. Wuna ngay wuleilaa wunogwinala apma vat yetɨgiyamɨn waa wandɨ njambwi nyan.
40025024	1,000 dola kla nyan wuleilaa wandɨ. Njambwi nyan. Mɨn kao mbundɨ nyan mɨn. Ngi kat tɨga mɨn kat vaaka lɨgowun. Nat nyan tuga kandi ndamba klaga kɨga yetɨlɨgamɨn. Nat nyan yaagiya mina sɨpmba sɨgɨka kɨga yetɨlɨgamɨn.
40025025	Mɨn kat vaaka lɨga wun kat kwima moni waangu valaa waangumba taagawun. Mɨna moni kɨngiyan. Agla wandɨ.
40025026	Wandɨ maa njambwi nyan wandɨ. Mɨn kavle njwvwa kwutɨga nyan mɨn. Mɨn mbangɨ kɨlɨpangɨ namwiya nyan mɨn. Wuna vak tamba vɨga lɨgamɨn. Nat nyan tuga kandi ndamba klalaa kɨga yetɨlɨgowun. Nat nyan yaagiya mi sɨpmba sɨgɨka kɨga yetɨlɨgowun.
40025027	-
40025028	Manda kat mɨn kat kwiwa wuna moni bengmba taagalapman yimɨn. Bengmba taagagemɨn wan moni samat nɨman yigendɨ. Yilaa yawan bengmba taagagemɨn 1,000 dola nɨmba kat wandɨ. Kan kwutaa lɨnda moni klalaa 10,000 dola kwuta lɨga nyan kat agwi ngwula.
40025029	Moni kwuta lɨga nɨmba ndi nat moni klaigandi. Klalaa ndi nɨma sakwat monio lɨgiyandi. Moni kwutapman tɨga nɨmba wan kwutaa lɨnja nda klalaa yaagigiyandi.
40025030	Wan kavle njɨvwa kwutɨga nyan kat kwutaa alaguat yaagi ngwula. Yaagingwut, yiga kulun walɨga kavamba lɨga nglaga nɨmbi ngliaka lɨgiyandɨ waa wandɨ njambwi nyan waa wandɨ Jisas.
40025031	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Wun ndinyangu kat Godna nyaangɨt mbutɨganyan wun. Ngɨni njambwi kingat tɨwun, Godna ensel wuna sɨ kwutaa katsolɨndi, yaigowun. Enselonala yalaa kingna tɨgɨtmba ndaa lɨgiyowun.
40025032	Ndaa lɨwun maa kan kɨpmamba lɨga nɨmba aywaa yaa yisolaa lɨgiyandi. Ndi kat vɨlaa sɨga naguga mbaapma vɨlɨlɨkmba taagaiyowun. Sip sip vɨga la nyan nat mbaapmamba sip sip taagalaa nat mbaapmamba meme taaganda vla taagaiyowun.
40025033	Sip sip kat yaagindan naangamba taagagiyowun. Meme kat ambugendan naangamba taagagiywoun.
40025034	Taagalaa yaagindan naangamba lɨga nɨmba kat wun njambwi king wun waigowun. Ngwuk apma nɨmba ngwuk. Wuna nyaek ngwuk kat apma vat yindɨ. Yagwa ngwula. God ngwuk kat kwindeya nda yaa kla ngwula. Tamba kɨpma kwuta njɨmblamba ngwuk kat kwindeya nda kwundaka taagandɨ.
40025035	Ngwuk wun kat apma vat yilɨngwuk. Wundɨ kat tɨwun, wun kat kɨgɨnda kwingwuk. Ngu kɨvat tɨwun, wun kat ngu kwingwuk. Nat ngepmamba lɨga ya nyan vla lɨwun, wun kat kwutaa ngwula ngayat kalingwuk.
40025036	Waavwi lapman tɨwun, wun kat waavwi kwingwuk. Yelogwen kat tɨwun, wun kat yaa kwunakngwuk. Kalambusmba tɨwun, wun kat yaa vɨngwuk waa ndi kat waigowun.
40025037	Ndi kat wupma wowun, wan apma nɨmba awat wun kat waigandi. njambwi nyan anda njɨmbla wundɨ kat tɨmɨn, mɨn kat kɨgɨnda kwinɨn. Anda njɨmbla ngu kɨvat tɨmɨn, mɨn kat kwinɨn.
40025038	Anda njɨmbla kapma ngepma nyan vla lɨmɨn, vɨlaa mɨn kat kwutaa nɨna ngayat kalinan. Anda njɨmbla waavwi lapma tɨmɨn, mɨn kat waavwi kwinan.
40025039	Anda njɨmbla yelogwen kat kwamɨn, mɨn kat kwunatnɨn. Anda njɨmbla kalabusmba tɨmɨn, mɨn kat yaa vɨnɨn waa wagalagiyandi.
40025040	Wun njambwi king ndi kat waigowun Ngwuk kat wowun. Mbutuwa apma njɨvwa ngwuk tamba yilɨngwuk wuna mbaapmamba la nɨma nɨmba mat nyaangu kat. Ndi kat yilɨngwa vak wuna lak yandɨ. Ngi kat tɨga wun kat yilɨngwuk wowun waa ndi kat walaa
40025041	ambugendan naangamba lɨga nɨmba kat waigowun. Ngwuk wun kat kwagalalaa ay ngwula. God ngwuk kat kai walɨgandɨ. Njɨmbla njɨmbla vɨtɨga ya lɨga kavat ay ngwula. ngwula ngepma. Tamba wan kava God kwutndɨ. Setan dɨna enselonala ndi kat kwutaa taagandeya ngepma kat kwutndɨ.
40025042	Tak wun wundɨ kat tɨwun, wun kat kɨgɨnda kwivak kat kai wangwuk. Ngu kɨvat tɨwun, ngu kwivak kat kai wangwuk.
40025043	Wun nat ngepmamba lɨga yalaa la nyan vla lɨwun, ngwula ngayat kalivak kat kai wangwuk. Wun waavwi lapman tɨwun, wun kat waavwi kwivak kat kai wangwuk. Wun yelogwen kat kwowun, wun kat kwunapmak kat kai wangwuk. Wun kalambusmba lɨwun, wun kat vɨvak kat kai wangwuk waa wowun maa wun kat waigandi.
40025044	Njambwi nyan anda njɨmbla wundɨ kat tɨmɨn, vɨlaa kɨgɨnda ngu kwilapman yinɨn. anda njɨmbla kapma nyan vla lɨmɨn, mɨn kat kwutaa nɨna ngayat kalilapman yinɨn. anda njɨmbla waavwi lapman tɨmɨn, kwilapman yinɨn. anda njɨmbla yelogwen kat tɨmɨn, kwunatapman yinɨn. anda njɨmbla kalabusmba tɨmɨn, mɨn kat vɨlapman yinan waa wandi maa
40025045	-
40025046	wun njambwi king ndi kat waigowun. Wuna mbaapmamba lɨga mat nyangu ndi kat kwunapmak kat kai wangwuk. Ndi kat tɨga kavat kalilaa ndi kat taagagiyandi. Yaagindan naangamba lɨga apma nɨmba njɨmbla njɨmbla apma vat tɨnjeya kava wuleigiyandi waa wandɨ Jisas.
40026001	Jisas yisola la nɨma sakwat nɨmba kat nyaangɨt kwilaa ndɨna mbaapmamba la nɨmba kat wandɨ.
40026002	Nandinya vɨlɨlɨk yindɨ maa Pasova walɨna pesto tɨgiyandɨ. Wan nandinya wun Godna vak sɨmogwi lɨga nyan wun kat kwutaa diwai krosmba kaalagiyandi waa wandɨ Jisas.
40026003	Tɨga lɨga God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmbo Judana njambwi nɨmbo yisola lɨga nyaangɨt ngambulɨndi. God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nyan Kaiafasna ngaymba yisolaa lɨga nyaangɨt ngambulɨndi.
40026004	Jisas kat pagwuga kwutaa vatnyagiyanɨn waa ngambulɨndi.
40026005	Nɨma sakwat nɨmba Pesto tɨga njɨmbla yalɨgandi. Ndɨ kat kwutneya vak vɨlaa nɨn kat kai walaa walegiyandi. Ana nglaatndɨ. Ndɨna mala waa ngambulɨndi.
40026006	Jisas Betanimba lɨga tak kawia kɨla nyan Saimona ngaymba lɨndɨ.
40026007	Jisas ngaymba lɨndɨ, kɨta lagwa kambapmba kwutnja aw kwutaa yalɨ. Wan awmba apma njangu veilɨga sanda lɨndɨ. Wan sanda nɨma sanya kwiga klalɨnja sanda. Jisas njambamba lɨga nao kɨlɨndi maa wan sanda Jisasna nambumb salatɨ.
40026008	Ndɨna mbaapmamba la nɨmba vɨlaa walega wandi. Wan sanda manda kat kwo salatɨ.
40026009	Nɨma sanyo lɨga sanda. Wan sanda kwilaa sanya klalaa sanya lapman tɨga nɨmba kat kwigelɨ waa walega wandi.
40026010	Jisas wanja vak wutaa ndi kat kat wandɨ. Manda kat ngwuk lɨ kat walega njɨka wangwuk. Wun kat apma vak kwunakalɨ.
40026011	Sanya lapman nɨmba ngɨni ngwulogwinala njɨmbla njɨmbla tɨgiyandi. Njɨmbla njɨmbla ndi kat apma vat yilɨgiyangwuk. Wun ngwutnogwina njɨmbla njɨmbla ana lɨgiyowun.
40026012	Kiyawun maa wun kat waangumba taaganjeya vak kat yelavɨta wan sanda salɨtɨ.
40026013	Ngwuk kat wowun. Yelavɨk ngwula. Kan apma nyaangɨt mbutnjeya kava kavamba lɨlai sanda wun kat salɨkna vak kat yelavɨtaa mbukiyandi waa wandɨ Jisas.
40026014	Wan tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk Jisasna ngwaymba la nɨmbana kɨta nyan ndɨna sɨ Judas Iskeriot. Ndɨ God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmba kat yiga vɨlaa ndi kat nyaangɨt ngambundɨ.
40026015	Nyaangɨt ngambulaa wandɨ. Jisas kat kwukngweya vat ngwuk kat sɨmogwiweyan wun kat angamala sanya kwigiyangwuk waa wandɨ maa ndɨ kat sanya kɨta ndumi kiyeli tamba vɨli kwindi.
40026016	Sanya klalaa ndi kat kwagalalaa yiga Jisas kat kwutnjeya vak kat ndɨna maawupmba yelavɨka lɨndɨ.
40026017	Yis taagalapman nao kɨlɨnja pestona kɨta nandinya Jisasna mbaapmamba la nɨmba yalaa ndɨ kat wagalandi. Pestona kɨneya kɨgɨnda anda kavamba kwukiyanɨn waa wagalandi Jisas kat.
40026018	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. nɨma ngepma wuleilaa tamba wawa nyana ngay kat yiga vɨ ngwula. Ndɨ kat vɨlaa awa ngwula ndɨ kat. Nyaangɨt sɨmogwi lɨga nyan wandɨ. Nɨma njɨvwa kwukweya njɨmbla tamba ngway tologandɨ. Mɨna ngaymba wunogwinala wuna mbaapma lɨga nɨmbo pestona kɨgɨnda kɨgiyanɨn waa sɨmogwi lɨga nyan wandɨ waa ndɨ kat yiga awa ngwula waa wandɨ Jisas.
40026019	Wandɨ maa yindi. yilaa ngay wuleilaa pestona kɨgɨnda kwutndi.
40026020	Nglaambu Jisas yandɨ maa ndɨna mbaapmamba lɨga nɨmbo njambamba ndaa lɨga nglaambu kɨgɨnda kɨga lɨndi.
40026021	Kɨga lɨga Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Ngwuk kat wowun. Wuna mbaapmamba lɨga ngwutna kɨta nyan wun kat kwutajangat sɨmogwigiyandɨ waa wandɨ maa
40026022	ndɨna mbaapmamba la nɨmba nɨma vak yelavɨka lɨga wunayɨ? Njambwi nyan wunayɨ? waa wagalandi.
40026023	Wagalandi, wandɨ. Wunogwina kɨta nombe awmba kɨgɨnda klavat taamba kwusendagiya nyan wungian ndɨnayɨ wun kat sɨmogwigiya.
40026024	Wun Godna vat sɨmogwi lɨga nyan wun. Wun kat vatnyanjeyangat sɨmogwigiya nyan kat ndɨ kat miwa ay ngwula. Ndɨ kat nyɨme kwutapman yigelan ndɨ apma vat tɨgendɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
40026025	Judas Jisas kat vatnyanjeya vak kat sɨmogwigiya nyan wutaa Jisas kat wandɨ. Nyaangɨt sɨmogwi lɨga nyan. Wunayɨ? wandɨ. Wandɨ maa Jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ. Mɨn ngiyambak wama. mɨnayɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
40026026	Kɨga lɨga Jisas bret-nao klalaa God kat sɨvu kɨlaa lɨmba ngɨlɨga ndɨna mbaapmamba la nɨmba kat kwilaa wandɨ. Klalaa agɨ ngwula. Kan wuna wimba ngwuk kat kwiwa waa walaa.
40026027	wain ta kap klalaa God kat sɨvu kɨlaa ndɨna mbaapmamba la nɨmba kat kwilaa wandɨ. Ngwuk aywaa kan ngu agɨ ngwula.
40026028	Kan ngu wuna yelogwena ngwuk kat kwiwa. kan wuna yelogwen Godna nyingi maawut kat kwunatndɨ maa ngwuk kat ana sɨgiyandɨ. Nɨma sakwat nɨmba yiga yetɨlɨnja kavle vak kwunapmak kan wuna mbangɨna yelogwen salakiyandɨ.
40026029	Ngwuk kat wowun. Wain walɨna ngu kɨpmamba lɨga ana nat njambɨ kɨgiyowun. God vɨga lɨga kavat wuleilaa ngɨni ngwulogwinala kupi apma ngu kɨgiywoun waa wandɨ Jisas.
40026030	Jisas wandɨ maa God kat yelavɨka mbangu kwundi walaa wan ngay kwagalalaa Oliv walɨnja nduwiat yindi.
40026031	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Mbambala ngan ngwuk aywaa wun kat kwagalalaa vaaka yigiyangwuk. Tamba la nɨmba God waa nyaangɨt kupma pɨlɨwutndi. Sip sip kat bɨga la nyan kat God vatnyandɨ maa ndi sip sip kava kavat yigiyandi waa tamba pɨlɨwutndi.
40026032	Kiyalaa lɨga laataa tak Galiliat yigiyowun. Ngwuk ngɨni wuna kwupmba yaigangwuk waa wandɨ Jisas.
40026033	Wandɨ maa wutaa Pita Jisas kat wandɨ. Njambwi nyan mɨn kat kwagalalaa ana vaaka yigiyowun. mɨna mbaapmamba lɨga nɨmba nat nɨmba ndi anagandi mɨn kat kwagalagiya. Wun ana mɨn kat kwagalgiywowun waa wandɨ maa Jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ.
40026034	Pita wawa nyaangɨt wutaa mɨna maawut ke sɨlwoka kwagalaga. Mbambala ngan njambɨ kuvuk waigamɨn. Jisas kat ana vɨga lɨgowun waigamɨn. Wamɨn maa ava nyaaga viyaigandɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
40026035	Pita wutaa wandɨ. Jisas kat ana vɨga lɨgowun waa ana wupma waigowun. mɨnogwinala kiyaweyan apma vatna. Ana vaakiyowun waa wandɨ maa Jisasna mbaapmamba la nɨmba aywaa wupma wandi.
40026036	Jisas ndɨna mbaapmamba la nɨmbonala Getsemani walɨnja kavat yindi. yindi maa Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Ngwuk kumba ndaa lɨ ngwula. Wun samat yiga yilaa tɨga lɨga God kat wagalagiyowun, waa walaa
40026037	ndɨna mbaapmamba la nɨmbana nat nɨmba kat kwagalaa Pita, Jems, Jon kuvut nɨmba ndi kat mɨna kwutaa yindɨ. Tɨga lɨga nɨma maawut yelavɨka lɨga ndi kat wandɨ.
40026038	Wun nɨma maawut yelavɨka lɨgowun. Kiyavat tɨga nyan vla lɨgowun. Ngwuk kumba lɨga sɨndu ke kwa. Wun kat kawiga alɨ ngwula waa walaa
40026039	ndi kat kwagalalaa samat kapma yindɨ. yilaa mɨndama mɨndama kɨpmamba ndalaa tɨga God kat wagalandɨ. Wuna nyaek mɨn kat wagalavat yigowun. Kan yaiga kavle vat wun kat yalandɨ. Wuna maawupmba yelavɨkwa vapmba wun kat ke yiga. Mɨnaj yelavɨkiya vapmba wun kat ay mɨla waa walaa
40026040	lataa kuvut nyaangu ta kavat ndi kat vɨvat yindɨ. Sɨndu kwanja vak vɨlaa Pita kat wandɨ. Ngwuk manda kat sɨndu kwangwuk. Samat wun kat ana kawiga lɨlɨgangwuk?
40026041	Mɨni vɨga lɨga God kat wagala ngwula. God kat wagalangweyan ngwuk kat yaiga kavle vat ana ngwuk kat kwulakiyandɨ. Kwo lɨgiyangwuk. Ngwuk kat bɨga lɨgowun. Sɨndu kwavat ana yelavɨka waa walaa lungwamataa yindɨ.
40026042	Yilaa God kat wagalandɨ. Kan yaiga kavle vat wun kat yalandɨ. mɨnai yelavɨka lɨga vapmba kan yaiga kavle vat wun kat yandyan wovuna waa walaa laataa
40026043	kuvut nyangu ta kavat yindɨ. ndina mɨni valɨ kwutndɨ, sɨndu kwandi, yiga vɨndɨ. Vɨlaa ana wandɨ. Lungwamataa yindɨ.
40026044	Ndi kat kwagalalaa yiga kuvut wan njambɨ God kat wagalandɨ. Tak wagalanda wumba nyaangɨpmba wagalandɨ.
40026045	Wagalalaa ndɨna mbaapmamba la kuvut nyaangu kat laataa vɨvat yindɨ kuvut wan njambɨ. Yilaa ndi kat wandɨ. Ngwuk sɨndu kwangwuk? Wun Godna vak sɨmogwi lɨga nyan wun. Wun kat kwutaa kaligiya kavle nɨmba tamba yaa ngway tologandɨ. laataa avɨ ngwula.
40026046	Laak ngwula. yigat. Wun kat sɨmogwivat tɨga nyan tamba yaa ngway tologandɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
40026047	Jisas walɨndi maa ndɨna mbaapmamba la tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk nyanguna kɨta nyan Judas yandɨ. Jisas kat kwutaa kalivat ta nɨma sakwat nɨmbana yandɨ. ndi yak kwuka njay kwuka nɨmbi nda kwuka yandi. God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmbo Judana njambwi nɨmbo ay wandi maa yandi.
40026048	Tak Judas ndi kat mbuka wandɨ. Yiga vɨlaa kɨpmwimba wusɨtweya nyan ndɨ Jisas wungiyan ndɨ. ndɨ kat wumba agwukmba ngwuk waa tak Judas ndi kat mbuka wandɨ.
40026049	Judas yalaa Jisas kat vɨlaa nyaangɨt sɨmogwi lɨga nyan apma ngan walaa ndɨ kat yiga kwutaa ndɨna kɨipmwimba wusɨtndɨ.
40026050	Wusɨtndɨ maa Jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ. Kɨta mbaapma nyan wun kat kwupmeya njɨvwa kwiyatapman agwup mɨla waa wandɨ maa Judasnogwinala ya nɨmba Jisas kat taambamba kwutndi.
40026051	Jisasna mbaapmamba la nyan kɨta ndɨna ngway avamba kwa yak laguga klalaa God kat kwunat njambwi nayana njɨvwa kwuta nyana waan kalɨtndɨ. Kalɨtndɨ, kɨpmamba ndandɨ.
40026052	Vɨlaa Jisas wandɨ. Mɨna yak tɨnda vla sisenda. Kɨta nyan wan yapmba viyama vak vatnyagiyandi.
40026053	Wuna nyaek kat wagalaweyan wuna nyaek wandɨ maa nyingangwutna nɨma sakwat ensel yaigandi wun kat kwunapmak. Mbaapma tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk ensel wun kat walaa ndi kat sɨvat yaigandi. Wun ana wagalgiyowun.
40026054	Wun kat kwutaa kalilaa vatnyanjeya vak kat tamb la nɨmba lavu nyinangmba pɨlɨwutndi. Nyaek kat ndɨnogwi lɨga ensel kat wagalaweyan tamba pɨlɨwutnja vak ana kak kiyaigandɨ. Wungi kat tɨga kai wowun. Ana wagalgiyowun waa walaa
40026055	ndɨ kat kwupmat ya nɨmba kat wandɨ. ngwuk manda kat nɨmbi nda njay yak kwutaa wun kat yangwuk. Sɨkwutɨga nyan kat kwupmat tɨnja vak vla manda kat wun kat yangwuk. nandinya nandiya Godna ngay wuleilaa ngwutnogwinala ndaa lɨga nyaangɨt ngwuk kat mbutɨwun. Wun kat wungi nandinyamba kwukengwuk tuwa.
40026056	Wun kat yilɨngwa vak kwo ana yilɨgangwuk. Tamba la profet pɨlɨwutnja vak vla wun kat wupma yilɨgangwuk waa wandɨ maa ndɨna mbaapmamba la nɨmba aywaa ndɨ kat kwagalalaa vaaka pɨlɨga yindi.
40026057	Jisas kat kwuka nɨmba God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nyan Kaiafasna ngayat kalindi. Moses kwiya lo sɨmogwi la nɨmbo Judana njambwi nɨmbo wan ngaymba yilaa yisolaa lɨndi.
40026058	Pita sɨvlamba lɨga Jisasna kwupmba yandɨ. yalaa ngayna ngwutnyala way nge alagumba tɨndɨ. Plismanonala kɨta kavamba lɨndɨ. jisas kat yinjeya vakvɨmbowun walaa yalaa vɨga lɨndɨ.
40026059	God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmbo yisola la nat nɨmbo Jisas kat woseka wanja vak kat wupmak yalaa lɨndi. Wutaa ndɨ kat vatnyagiyanɨn waa yelavɨka lɨndi.
40026060	Nɨma sakwat nɨmba yalaa Jisas kat woseka walɨndi. Woseka walɨnja vak kɨta nyaangɨt ana walɨndi ndɨ kat. Mandɨp mandɨp nyaangɨt walɨndi. Ngɨni vɨlɨlɨk palɨ laataa nɨmba sakwat nɨmba kat woseka waga mbupmbɨk.
40026061	Kupma wambɨk. Tak Jisas kupma wandɨ. Godna ngay sulɨlaa nandinya kuvutmba kwukiyowun waa Jisas wandɨ waa woseka mbupmbɨk.
40026062	Mbupmbɨk maa God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nyan laataa Jisas kat wandɨ. Mɨn kat mbupmba nyaangɨt mɨn an ngambumba nyaangɨt kat wutaa awat nyaangɨt mbukiyamɨn? waa wagalandɨ maa
40026063	Jisas kwundi ana wandɨ. God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nyan at nat njambɨ Jisas kat nɨma kwundimba wagalandɨ. Mɨn nɨn kat ambup mɨla. Woseka wana walɨmeya. nyinangwupmba lɨga God woseka wameya vak vɨgiyandɨ. Mɨn Juda kat kwunapmak ya nyan mɨn? Mɨn Godna nyan mɨn? waa ndɨ kat wagalandɨ.
40026064	Jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ. Mɨn ngiyambak wupma wama wun kat. Wun Godna vat sɨmogwi lɨga nyan wun. Ngɨni kan kɨpmamba lɨga yiwun maa wun kat ana vɨgiyangwuk. Nyinangwut wokelaa Godna yaagindan naangɨmba ndaa lɨga njambwi nyanat tɨwun maa vɨgiyangwuk. Ngɨni nyinangwupmba lɨga ngaga yaweya vak vɨgiyangwuk waa wandɨ Jisas.
40026065	Jisas waa nyaangɨt wutaa God kat kwunata njambwi nyan nyingi maawut tɨga avla ndɨna waavwi taambamba ngɨlɨtaa wandɨ. Wan nyan God kat kavle nyaangɨtna wanda. Ngɨni ndɨna kavle vat mbukiya nɨmba ana yalaa mbukiyandi. Kavle vat yinda vak ngiyambak wutna. Kavle vat mbuta nyaangɨt kan yesolaa lɨga nɨmba nɨn aywaa tamba wutnɨn.
40026066	Ngwuk angamak ndɨ kat yigiyangwuk. Angamak ngwuk yelavɨka lɨgangwuk waa ndi kat wandɨ maa wandi. Ndɨ kavle nyan. Ndɨ kat sɨgiyanɨn. Kiyaigandɨ waa wandi.
40026067	Wupma walaa ndɨ kat mɨndamamba sɨpmiya saga ndɨ kat taamamba viyalɨndi.
40026068	Nat nɨmba pagwuga yalaa ndɨ kat viyalaa wandi. Mɨn Kraist profet vla timeyan mɨn kat viyalɨga nɨmbana sɨ ambuk waa kasega wandi.
40026069	Pita alagu ndaamangemba ndaa lɨndɨ, God kat kwunata njambwi nyana njɨvwa kwutat taagwa yalaa Pita kat vɨlaa walɨ. Mɨn Galilimba lan Jisasonala tɨmɨn, vɨwun walɨ.
40026070	Pita wutaa wandɨ. Wanya vak wun ana vɨga lɨgowun waa walaa
40026071	laataa ngegavamba la tɨvwina suwi yambat yindɨ. Yindɨ maa nat taagwa vɨlaa wumba yisolaa la nɨmba kat walɨ. Kan nyan kat avɨ ngwula. Kan nyan Nasaretmba la Jisasonala kɨta vat tɨndɨ.
40026072	Pita wala vak kat wutaa wandɨ. Nɨma kwundimba wandɨ. Wanya nyan wun ana vɨga lɨgowun wandɨ.
40026073	Tɨga lɨga wumba yisola la nɨmba Pita kat vɨlaa wandi. Mɨn mɨn kat vɨnɨn. Jisasna mbaapmamba la nyan mɨn. Galilimba lɨga nɨmbana kwundimba ngambulɨgamɨn waa wandi.
40026074	Pita wutaa ndi kat nɨma kwundimba wandɨ. Ngwuk kat woseka ana waigowun. Woseka waweya vak God vɨga wutaa wun kat sɨgiyandɨ. Wan wun kat wangwa nyan Jisas kat ana vɨga lɨgowun waa walɨndɨ maa ava nyaaga viyandɨ.
40026075	Viyandɨ maa wutaa Pita yelavɨtndɨ. Tak Jisaswun kat wandɨ. Wun kat njambɨ kuvut pagwuga kai walɨmɨn, ava nyaaga viyaigandɨ wanda vak kat ndɨna maawupmba yelavɨtaa Pita laataa yiga nɨmamba nglalɨndɨ.
40027001	Ngambi gleimba God kat kwunata njambwi nɨmbo Judana nɨma nɨmbo Jisas kat vatnyanjeya vak kat yisola lɨga ngambulɨndi.
40027002	Jisas kat kwutaa man taamba sangilaa njambwi nyan pailat ta ngayat kalindi.
40027003	Jisas kat sɨmogwia nyan Judas Jisas kat kwutaa kotndangat kalindi, wutaa mandɨp maawut sɨlɨmaka yelavɨtndɨ. Yelavɨtaa wan ndɨ kat kwinja sanya kɨta ndumi kiyeli tamba vɨli kwutaa yiga God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmbo Judana njambwi nɨmba kat wandɨ.
40027004	Wan nyan Jisas kavle vat yiga yetɨla nyan Sɨmogwiwun mala apma njɨvwa kwuka yeta nyan kat kwo vatnyagiyangwuk waa wandɨ. Wandɨ maa wutaa wandi. Nɨna njɨvwa ana ndɨ. Mɨn mɨna njɨvwa waa wandi maa
40027005	Judas wutaa sanya Godna ngaymba yaagiga kwagalalaa wup yiga yelavɨka yilaa kwapmba yaaw tulaa mimba tulaa vasak selindɨ. Vasak selilaa kwapmba tunda yaawmba kiyandɨ.
40027006	God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmba ngay yapmba la sanya klalaa wandi. Ndu nyan kat sɨvak kat kwina sanya. Godna ngaymba bengmba lɨga sanyogwi ana kɨta kavamba taagagiyanɨn. Wupma ana yigiyanɨn. moses kwiya lo nɨn kat kai wandɨ maa ngambundi.
40027007	Ngambuga lɨga kɨta maawupmba yelavɨka ngambulaa wan sanya kwutaa aw nyalɨga nɨmbana kɨpma kat wenga kwindi. Kwilaa klandi wan kɨpmɨ. Kapma ngepmamba lɨga yaiga nɨmba kiyangjeyan waangu valaa ndi kat kumba laagagiyanɨn waa wandi.
40027008	Wan kɨpma kan mbambala tɨna njɨmbla kwo lɨgandɨ. Yelogwen ndaa la lɨga kɨpma walɨnja kɨpma.
40027009	-
40027010	Tamba la profet Jeremaia tamba pɨlɨwutnda vak kak kiyandɨ, mbambala vɨganɨn. Ndi kɨpma kwo ana klandi. Jeremaia pɨlɨwutnda nyaangɨtmba klandi. Tamba kupma pɨlɨwutndɨ. Isrelmba la nɨmba ndɨ kat sɨvak kat wenga kwinja sanya kɨta ndumi kiyeli tamba vɨli kwilaa aw nyalɨga kɨpma lɨga nɨmba kat kwilaa wan kɨpma ndina lak klandi. God wun kat wandɨ maa wupma waa tamba pɨlɨwutndɨ Jeremaia.
40027011	Jisas njambwi nyan Pailat ta kavamba laataa tɨndi maa ndɨ kat wagalandɨ. Mɨn Judana king mɨn? waa wagalandɨ. Wagalandɨ maa Jisas wandɨ. Mɨn ngiyambak wun kat wama.
40027012	God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmbo Judana nɨma nɨmbo yalaa yisolaa lɨga Jisas kat nɨma sakwat kavle vak kat ngambuga lɨndi. Ngambulɨnja vak kat wutaa Jisas awat ndi kat ana kulumataa wandɨ.
40027013	Jisas kwundi walapman tɨnda vak kat vɨlaa Pailat ndɨ kat wandɨ. Mɨn kat kotɨnia nyaangɨt mɨn ana wutɨgamɨn?
40027014	Jisas wutaa ana Pailat kat wandɨ. Wuka kwagalalaa lɨndɨ. Wuka kwagala lɨnda vak kat vɨlaa Pailat ngɨpaliga ndalaa lɨndɨ.
40027015	Pailat wan pesto la nandinyamba kalabusmba la kɨta nyan kat kwo ay walɨndɨ. Juda wan nyan kat sɨmogwindi maa kwo wogwelaa ay walɨndɨ Pailat.
40027016	Wan njɨmbla kavle glei nyan kalabusmba lɨndɨ. Ndɨna sɨ Barabas.
40027017	Wan nɨma sakwat ndu lagwa yisola lɨndi maa Pailat laataa ndi kat wagalandɨ. Anda nyan kat kwo ay waigowun. Ngwuk kanda kat yelavɨka lɨgangwuk. Wangwuk maa waigowun. Barabas kat kwo ay walu? Jisas waa Kraist walɨnja nyan kat kwo ay walu? waa ndi kat wagalandɨ.
40027018	Pailat Jisas kat kwagalavak kat yelavɨka lɨga ndi kat wangalandɨ. Jisas ndɨ kavle vat ana yindɨ. Ndina kumbut maawupmba ndɨ kat kai walaa kwutaa kiyandi. Ndi mandɨp maawut anagandi yelavɨkiya walaa ndi kat wagalandɨ.
40027019	Pailat jas tɨla tɨgɨtmba ndaa lɨndɨ maa ndɨna taagwa walɨ maa kɨta nyan yalaa Pailat kat mbutndɨ. Wan yalaa lɨndɨ kat wutɨna nyan ndɨ kavle vat ana yindɨ. Nak ngan wun smapmba vɨwun. Ndɨ vak kai. Ndɨ kat kwagala mɨla. Wan sɨmak vɨlaa wun kat kavle vat nɨma vat yandangat nɨma maawut yelavɨka lɨgowun waa walɨ mɨna taagwa waa Pailat kat mbutndɨ.
40027020	God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmbo Judana nɨma nɨmbo nɨma sakwat yisola la ndu lagwa kat wutnjangat wandi. Pailat kat awa ngwula. Barabas kat kwagalamɨn nɨna lak yaandɨ. Jisas kat kwutaa vatnya mɨla waa Pailat kat awa ngwula wandi.
40027021	Wandi maa Pailat laataa ndi kat wagalandɨ. Anda nyan kat kwo ay waigowun waa andɨ maa Barabas kat waigamɨn wandi.
40027022	Wandi maa Pailat ndi kat wagalandɨ. Jisas waa Kraist walɨnja nyan kat angamak yigiyowun waa wagalandɨ maa wandi. Ndɨ kat diwai krosmba kaalaa mɨla wandi.
40027023	Pailat ndi kat wandɨ. Kavle vat yinda vat wun ana vɨga lɨgowun. Anda kavle vatna yinda waa wandɨ maa ndi nɨma kwundimba kɨselaa wandi. Ndɨ kat dewai krosmba kaala mɨla waa kɨselaa wandi.
40027024	Pailat yelavɨtndɨ. Ndi kat waluwa vak ana wutɨgandi. yelavɨka walɨnja vapmba yilapman yiweyan wun kat waleagiyandi waa yelavɨtaa ngu awmba kalɨtaa yisolaa vɨga lɨndi maa taamba ngu njangindɨ. Njangilaa wandɨ. Wan nyan kat tamba kwagalawun. Ndɨ kat kwutaa vatnyangweyan wuna vak ana ndɨ. Ngwuk ngwutna vatna waa wandɨ Pailat.
40027025	Wandɨ maa ndi aywaa ta nɨmba wutaa wandi. Wama vak tamba wukanɨn. Wovuna. Nɨna vatna. Ndɨ kat vatnyaneya nglambi nɨna lak nɨna nyangu lagwa nɨna lak yaigandɨ wandi.
40027026	Wandi mala Pailat wutaa barabas kat kwo ay walaa wandɨ maa Jisas kat kwutaa viyalaa diwai krosmba kaalavat kwutaa kalindi.
40027027	Pailatna mbaapmamba lɨga soldia Jisas kat kwutaa Pailat wuleilaa njɨvwa kwuta ofisat kalindi. Wuleindɨ maa soldia yaa yisolaa ngɨlɨtaa ndɨ kat vɨndi.
40027028	Ndɨna waavwi lapmiga klalaa yelogwen mbangɨ waavwi kwindi, kwusondɨ.
40027029	Mangɨ nɨmbɨ yamboy klalaa ndɨna nambumba wegwuga taagalaa kaalandi. Suwa kalɨtaa ndɨna yaagindan taambamba taagandi, kwutaa lɨndɨ, kwali mamba sɨlaa ndɨ kat kwusɨlɨga wandi. Mɨn Judana king mɨn. Apma vat tɨgamɨn waa ndɨ kat kwusɨlɨga wandi.
40027030	Walaa ndɨna mbangɨmba ndɨ kat sɨpmiya sandi. Taambamba kwutaa lɨnda suwa klalaa ndɨna nambumba viyandi.
40027031	Ndɨ kat kwusɨlɨga kwagalalaa ndɨ kat kwusonja yelogwen mbangɨ waavwi lapmiga klalaa ndɨna waavwi kwindi, kwusondɨ. Kwusondɨ maa ndɨ kat kwutaa diwai krosmba kaalavat kalindi.
40027032	Jisas kat kaliga lɨga ava yambɨ yiga lɨga kɨta nyan Saimon ndɨ kat ava yambɨmba soldia vɨndi. Sairini walɨnja ngepmamba ya nyana. yalɨndɨ, ndɨ kat vɨlaa wandi. Kan kiwai kros klalaa mɨna lak walalaa kali mɨla wandi malaa klalaa walalaa kalindɨ.
40027033	Yiga lɨga Golgota walɨnja nduwiat wokendi. Golgota walɨnja nduwina angwa sɨ Andagava Nambu.
40027034	Nɨma nguo mi mbio kɨta awmba salɨtaa Jisas kat kwindi. Njangu wutaa kɨvak kat kai wandɨ. Ana kɨndɨ.
40027035	Soldia ndɨ kat kwutaa kiwai krosmba taagalaa man taamba kaalandi. Kaalalaa ndɨna waavwi klavak kat satumba kaselɨndi.
40027036	Satumba kasega ngɨlɨlaa kwo ndaa lɨga ndɨ kat vɨga lɨndi.
40027037	Jisas kat kotnja nyaangɨt lavungamba pɨlɨwutaa ndɨna nambu sɨso diwai krosmba kaalandi. Kupma pɨlɨwutndi. Ndɨ Jisas. Judana kinga waa pɨlɨwutndi.
40027038	Sɨkwuta mbɨt nyanogwi Jisaso kaalandi. Nat nyan kat yaagindan naangɨmba kaalandi. Nat nyan kat ambugendan naangɨmba kaalandi.
40027039	Diwai krosmba Jisas tɨndɨ maa yi ya la nɨmba ndɨ kat bɨga nambu njingwenga kwusɨlɨga ndɨ kat waga yilɨndi.
40027040	Kupma kwusɨlɨga wandi. Godna ngay sulɨlaa nandinya kuvupmba kwukiyowun wamɨn. Mɨn Godna nyanat tɨmeyan mɨna mbangɨ kwunap mɨla. Godna nyanat tɨmeyan diwai kros kwagalalaa ngaga yaa mɨla waa kwusɨlɨga waga yilɨndi.
40027041	God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmbo Moses kwiya lo sɨmogwi la nɨmbo Judana nɨma nɨmbo ndino wupma kwusɨlɨga walɨndi.
40027042	Kupma walɨndi. Nat nɨmba kat tak kwunatndɨ. Ndɨ avla ndɨ kat ana alɨpsɨga kwunakiyandɨ ndɨna mbangɨ kat. Ndɨ Isrelna kingat tɨndeyan ndɨ diwai kros kwagalalaa ngaga yaigandɨ. Diwai kros kwagalaa ngaga yandeyan ndɨ kat vɨlaa waiganɨn. Ndɨ njambwi nyana waa waiganɨn.
40027043	Wun Godna nyan wun. God wun kat kwunakiyandɨ waa walɨndɨ. God ndɨ kat anagandɨ alɨpsɨga kwunakiya. Vɨgiyanɨn waa kwusɨlɨga ndɨ kat walɨndi.
40027044	Sɨkwuta mbɨt nyan Jisasonala mbɨk kat diwai krosmba kaalandi. Jisas kat kwusɨlɨlɨnja vla mbɨlo kwusɨlɨga walɨmbɨt.
40027045	Nɨma nɨndɨ nandinya nya kulun wandɨ. 12 klok kulun walaa tɨga yiga 3 lok nglaambu kembandɨ.
40027046	3 klok nglaambu Jisas nɨma kwundimba kiselaa wandɨ. Ndina kwundimba wandɨ. Eli, Eli, lema sabaktani. God wuna nyaek wun kat manda kat kwagalmɨn waa wandɨ.
40027047	Wumba la nɨmba yigumba ana wutndi. Wutaa wandi. Awuk ngwula. Ndɨ Ilaija kat walɨgandɨ waa wandi.
40027048	Ndina kɨta nyan pɨlɨga namɨnɨnga klalaa nɨma ngumba sɨvugundɨ. Sɨvugulaa njɨmbwi mbaomba ngilaa kwusoga Jisasna tɨpmwimba taagalaa agɨ wandɨ. Jisas kɨvak kat kai wandɨ.
40027049	Wumba la ndina nat nɨmba wandi. Kumba kawiga vɨga lɨgiyanɨn. Tɨga lɨga Ilaija ndɨ kat kwunapmak yandeya vak vɨgiyanɨn. Anagandɨ yaiga waa njɨka wandi.
40027050	Jisas nɨma kwundimba kɨselaga waga kiyandɨ.
40027051	Kiyandɨ maa Godna ngay nɨndɨmba la nɨma waavwi ngɨlɨtndɨ. Angwapmba lɨga ngɨlɨka ngaga yandɨ. Nɨma yɨnaw kwutndɨ, nduwimba la kambak mbɨlɨga yindɨ.
40027052	Godna mbaapmamba la tɨga kiya nɨmba nɨma sakwat mat matna kɨpma mbɨlɨndɨ vasagla laatndi. Laataa lɨndi.
40027053	Ngɨni Jisas laatndɨ maa ndi Jerusalemat wuleini, nɨma sakwat nɨmba vɨndi ndi kat.
40027054	Jisas kat bɨga la njambwi soldagwi ndɨna kwupmba la soldio yɨnaw kwutɨndɨ mala kiya nɨmba laatnja vak vɨlaa vaaka lɨndi. Vaaka lɨga wandi. Ndɨ Godna nyana luwa waa wandi.
40027055	Sɨvla kavamba la ndi taagwa nɨma sakwat yitega vɨga lɨndi. Tamba Jisas Galilimba lɨga yandɨ, ndɨna kwupmba yandi. Yalaa ndɨna kɨgɨnda kwutndi.
40027056	Ndina nat kɨta lagwa Maria. Magdala walɨnja ngepmana taagwat. Nat Maria tɨlɨ. Lɨ Jems Josepna nyɨmeat. Sebedina mbɨt nyana nyɨme lɨlo tɨlɨ.
40027057	Jisas kiya nandinyana nglaambu arimatia walɨnja ngepmamba la sanyo la nyan yandɨ. Ndɨna sɨ Josep. Ndɨ Jisasna mbaapmamba ta nyana.
40027058	Ndɨ Pailat kat yiga Jisasna sɨm kwutaa kalivat wagalandɨ. Kwutaa kali mɨla waa Pailat wandɨ maa Josep Jisasna sɨm kwutaa kalindɨ.
40027059	Josep sɨm klalaa sawun mbangɨ waavwi lalaa Jisasna sɨm mbaatndɨ.
40027060	Mbaataa kwutaa kaliga yiga kambapmba vanja kupi waangumb taagandɨ. Wan waangu Josepna waangua. Sɨm taagalaa nɨma kambak mbandɨga dkliga waangu tegɨlɨndɨ. Tegɨlɨlaa kwagalalaa ngepma yindi.
40027061	Magdalamba la Mariagwi nat Mario waangu la kavamba ndaa lɨga vɨga lɨmbɨt.
40027062	Jisas kiyandɨ, vaangulaa tɨga nat nandinya God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmbagwi Ferisio laataa yiga Pailat kat wandi.
40027063	Kupma wandɨ, njambwi nyan. Wan woseka walɨga nyan tamba wandɨ. Kiyalaa nandinya kuvut tɨga laakiyowun waa wandɨ.
40027064	Wamɨn maa ndɨna waangu lɨga kava soldia yiga vɨga lɨgiyandi. Soldia yiga vɨlapman yinjeyan ndɨna mbaapmamba lɨga nɨmba ndɨna sɨm sɨkwuta kalilaa Jisas tamba kiyalaa laatndɨ waa woseka waigandi. Tak Jisaana mbaapma nɨmba nɨma sakwat kavle nyaangɨt woseka wandi. Samat kavle vatna. Ngɨni Jisas kiyalaa laatndɨ waa wanjeyan nɨma kavle vatna waa Pailat kat wandi.
40027065	Wandi maa Pailat wandɨ. Ngwuk soldia kat kwutaa kaliga yiga waangu lɨga kavamba taagangwuk, vɨga lɨgiyandi wandɨ. Wandɨ maa soldia kat kwutaa kalindi.
40027066	Kaliga yiga waangu taa kavamba taagandi, vɨgalɨndi. Waangu sɨlɨtɨnja kambapmba njambiya taagandi, tɨndɨ. Kan kava ke yangweya waa taagandi. Wungi njambiya kat soldia yiga vɨga lɨndi.
40028001	Njɨvwa lapman nandinya ngɨlɨndɨ maa Sande ngambi Magdalana taagwa Mariagwi nat Mario Jisas taagndi ta waangu vɨvat ngambi gleimba laataa yimbɨt.
40028002	Yilɨmbɨt maa yɨnaw kiyandɨ, nyɨnangwupmba lɨga ensel ngaga yandɨ. Yalaa waangu tegɨlɨnja kambak mbandɨga kalilaa wungi kambak tagumba ndaa lɨndɨ.
40028003	Enselna mɨndama vlap vlap wandɨ, kembandɨ vɨna vla ndɨna mɨndama wupma lɨndɨ. ndɨna waavwi sawun mɨna lɨndɨ.
40028004	Waangu vɨga la Soldia ensel kat vɨlaa ava mban plaga vaaka lɨga yiga kɨpmamba ndandi. ndalaa kiyalaa la nɨmba vla lɨndi.
40028005	Taagwa vɨlɨlɨk yambɨt maa ensel mbɨk kat vɨlaa wandɨ. Diwai krosmba kaalanja Jisas kat kwaaka vɨvat yambɨt. Vɨga lɨgowun mbɨk kat.
40028006	Ndɨ kumba waangumba ana lɨgandɨ. Tamba laataa yindɨ. Tamba Jisas wandɨ. Kiyalaa lɨga ngɨni laakiyowun wandɨ. Wanda vapmba laatndɨ. Tɨnda waangu yaa vɨ mbɨla.
40028007	Mbɨk kwiyatapman yiga vɨmba vat ndɨna mbaapmamba la nɨmba kat yiga mbuikiyambɨt. Kiyalaa lɨga laataa Galiliat yindɨ. Ngwuk ndɨna kwupmba aymba ngwuk. yiga mbupmba ngwuk. Mbɨk kat wawa nyaangɨt mbɨtna maawut ke tɨvɨga waa wandɨ ensel.
40028008	Wandɨ maa waangu kwagalalaa pɨlɨga yimbɨt. Vaaka yelavɨka solat sɨga yimbɨt. Yiga Jisasna mbaapmamba la nɨmba kat mbupmat yimbɨt.
40028009	Yilɨmbɨt maa Jisas ava yambɨmba mbɨk kat vɨlaa wandɨ. apma vat alɨmba mbɨt waa wandɨ, wutna kwali kwali ndaa sɨlaa ndɨna mamba kwutaa ndɨna sɨ kwutaa katsoga wambɨt.
40028010	Jisas mbɨk kat wandɨ. Mbɨk ke vapmba. Tak Galiliat yiga tɨgowun. Wuna mbaapmamba la nɨimba kat ambukmba mbɨk. Mpupmbɨk, wutaa wuna kwupmba yalaa wun kat vɨgandi waa wandɨ Jisas.
40028011	Wumbɨt taagwa yilɨmbɨt maa waangu kat vɨga la nat soldia laataa ngepmat yindi. Yiga God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmba kat Jisas laatnda vak mbutndi.
40028012	Mbutndi maa God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmbo Judana nɨma nɨmbo yisolaa nyaangɨt ngambundi. Nyaangɨt ngambulaga soldia kat nɨma sakwat sanya kwilaa wandi.
40028013	Ngwuk kupma ambukmba ngwuk. Ngan sɨndu kwanɨn maa Jisasna mbaapmamba la nɨmba yalaa ndɨna sɨm sɨkwuta kalindi waa ambukmba ngwuk nat nɨmba kat.
40028014	Ngwuk kat vɨga la njambwi nayan mbukngweya nyaangɨt wutaa ngwuk kat kai wandeyan ndɨ kat yiga waiganɨn. Wamɨn maa ngwuk kat ana sɨga viyaigandɨ waa wandi Judana njambwi nɨmba.
40028015	Soldia wutaa kwinja sanya klalaa wanja nyaangɨtmba waa ndinyangu kat yiga mbutndi. Soldia waa nyaangɨt wuka lɨga apma vala wangwa waa Juda walɨndi. Mbambala nɨmbun wupma walɨgandi.
40028016	Tak Jisas wanda Galilimba lɨga nduwi Jisasna mbaapmamba la tamba vɨli kiyeli kɨta nɨmba wokendi.
40028017	Wokelaa Jisas kat vɨlagala solat sɨga ngu navɨn vɨyaa ndɨ kat tɨndi. Ndɨ kat nat nɨmba vɨlaa lɨga Jisas ana ndɨ waa maawupmba yelavɨka lɨndi.
40028018	Jisas ndi kat yalaa ngwaymba lɨga wandɨ. Nyinangwutna kwondu kɨpmana kwondu aywaa tamba klalaa lɨgowun.
40028019	Kan kwondu ngwuk kat kwiwun mala klalaa ngepma ngepma aywaa yigiyangwuk. Wuna nyaekna sɨ waga wuna sɨ waga wuna nyaekna waagana sɨ waga ndi kat ngu yagugiyangwuk.
40028020	Ngwuk kat mbutuwun, wutaa yetɨngwa nyaangɨt ndi kat mbukngwuk maa kwutaa yetɨgiyandi. Ngwuk kɨta nda kat wana yelavɨtapman yilɨngweya. Ngwuk kat ana kwagalagiyowun. Ngwutnogwinala njɨmbla njɨmbla tɨgiyowun. Ngwulogwi tɨlɨwun, kɨpma nyinangwut ngɨlɨgiyandi ngɨni la lɨga nandinya waa wandɨ Jisas.
41001001	Godna nyan Jisas Kraistna apma wupuseputna tat ta nyaangɨt kɨngiyan. God waa nyaangɨt wala nyan Aisaia pɨlɨwutnda vapmba tɨndɨ. Kupma pɨlɨwutndɨ.
41001002	God wandɨ. Vɨga awuk. Wunai waa nyaangɨt kiyaiga nyan kɨngiyandɨ. tata yilaa wuna nyan yaiga yambɨ kwunakiyandɨ waa wandɨ God.
41001003	Kɨta nyan kwo kavamba lɨga wan nyaangɨt walendɨ. nɨma nyana yaiga yambɨ kwuka kwunak waa walendɨ waa pɨlɨwutndɨ Aisaia.
41001004	Jon dinyangugat yagulɨga nyana. Kwo kavamba lɨga wan nyaangɨt mbutndɨ. Kupi maawut yelavɨka lɨngweyan ngwuk kat yagugigiyowun. Wungi kat tɨga kavle vat yetɨlɨngwa vak kat God lɨmbwigiyandɨ waa mbutndɨ Jon.
41001005	Judia walɨnja kavamba lɨga nɨmbagwi Jerusalem walɨnja ngepmamba lɨga nɨmbo ndɨna lak yindi maa ndi kat Jodan walɨnja ndandangɨmba yagulɨndɨ. Ndinai kavle savle yetɨnja vak kat mbutɨndi.
41001006	Jon kamelna yuwimba vɨtnja waavwimba kwusolaa lɨndɨ. Sɨmbɨmba yɨpma sɨtndɨ. Waakalavali vla lɨga ndagwi wanyanyevio klalaa kɨlɨndɨ.
41001007	Mbuka walɨndɨ. Wun mat nyan wun. Wuna kwupmba nɨma nyan yaikandɨ. Mat nyan vla lɨwangat ndɨna man suna yaaw taamba taaga pɨgiyaweyan kwondu ana lɨgandɨ waa wandɨ Jon.
41001008	Ngwuk kat ngumba yagugowun. Yaiga nyan ngwuk kat Godna waagan kwindɨ, tavagiyandɨ waa wandɨ Jon.
41001009	Samat tɨga Jisas Galili walɨnja kavamba nasaret walɨnja ngepmamba lɨga yandɨ. Yandɨ maa Jon Jisas kat Jodan walɨnja ndandangɨmba yagundɨ.
41001010	Jisas ngu kwagalalaa lɨndɨ maa nyɨnangwut mbɨlɨnda vat vɨndɨ. Vɨlɨndɨ maa Godna waagan namiyo vla lɨga ndaiga ndɨ kat tavindɨ.
41001011	Nyɨnangupmba lɨga kwundi wandɨ, wutndɨ. “Mɨn wuna kɨta nyan mɨn. Mɨn kat nɨmbamba woviyaguga solat sɨlɨgowun” waa wandɨ.
41001012	Wandɨ maa Godna waagan ndɨna maawupmba ngwandɨndɨ maa kwo kavat yindɨ.
41001013	Seten ndɨ kat kavle vat ay walaga lɨga nandinya ndumi vɨli kwo kavamba yetɨndɨ. Kwapɨmba yeta ndaonala lɨndɨ. God waa nyaangɨt kiyaa ensel Jisas kat kwunatndi.
41001014	Jon kat kalabusmba taagandi maa Jisas God waa apma nyaangɨt mbuka Galili wuleindɨ.
41001015	Wupma mbuka wandɨ. yaigandɨ God wanda sɨva yandɨ waa wandɨ. God nɨn kat vɨga lɨgiyaa sɨva mbambala wan wandɨ. Kupi maawut yelavɨk waa wandɨ. Apma nyaangɨt kat ngwula mbangɨ wiyo waavi taagagandɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41001016	Jisas Galilina waambu sak yiga Saimonagwi Endru kat nyamwun swambu kat vɨndɨ. Mbɨla njula vla lɨga nda yaagilɨmbɨt, vɨndɨ. Kɨgɨnda kwutɨga nyan mbɨt.
41001017	Jisas mbɨk kat wandɨ. Wuna kwupmba yagwa mbɨlɨ wandɨ. Kɨgɨnda kwutɨmba vak vla ndinyangu kat kwuka wuna mbaapmamba taagaiyambɨt waa wandɨ.
41001018	Wandɨ, njula kwagalalaa ndɨna kwupmba yimbɨk.
41001019	Samat yiga Sebedina nyan Jemsokwi Jon kat nyamwun swambu kat vɨndɨ. Vaalamba lɨga njula yaagilɨmbat.
41001020	Mbɨk kat vɨlaa yagwa wandɨ maa mbɨla nyaek kat ndɨna njɨvwa kwuta vaalamba la nɨmbanala kwagalalaa ndɨna kwupmba yimbɨt.
41001021	Kapaneam walɨnja ngepma wuleindi maa njɨvwa lapman nandinyamba nyaangɨt ngambulɨnja ngay wuleilaa Jisas sɨmagaga mbutindɨ.
41001022	Mbutndɨ maa ngɨpaliga ndandi. Kwondu nyan vla lɨga sɨmagaga mbutɨgandɨ waa wandi. Lo kat sɨmaga lɨga nɨmba vla ana sɨmagalɨngandɨ. Ndɨ kwonduo lɨga sɨmagalɨgandɨ waa wandi.
41001023	Kavle waagan tavila la nyan nyaangɨt ngambulɨnja ngay wuleilaa walendɨ.
41001024	Jisas Nasaretna nyan nɨn kat mandana yimeya. Nɨn kat vatnyagiyamɨn? Mɨn Godna apma vat tɨga nyan mɨn vɨga lɨgowun waa walendɨ.
41001025	Walendɨ maa Jisas waagan kat nɨma kwundimba wandɨ. Kiyak awa. Ndɨ kat kwagala waa wandɨ.
41001026	Wandɨ, waagan wan nyan kat kwutndɨ maa man taamba yaagiga kwundi ngu ngaanga ngu ndaga lɨndɨ maa nɨma kwundimba kɨsalaa ndɨ kat kwagalandɨ.
41001027	Kwagalandɨ maa wumba la nɨmba ngɨpaliga ndandi. Ngɨpaliga ndalaa awat sowat wagalaga yelavɨka lɨndi. Kan mandana waa wandi. Mbutnda kupi nyaangɨtna? Kwonduo lɨga Jisas waagan kat wandɨ maa wutndɨ waa wandi.
41001028	Wandi maa Galilina ngepma ngepmamba lɨga nɨmba Jisas kat aywaa wutndi.
41001029	Nyaangɨt ngambulɨnja ngay kwagalalaa Saimonagwi Endruna ngay wuleindɨ. Jemsagwi Jono apma wuleimbɨt.
41001030	Saimona nasakwat kangan yelogwengat njambamba kwalɨlangat ndɨ kat mbutndɨ.
41001031	Lɨ kat yalaa taambamba kwutaa kwusalatndɨ. Kwuslatndɨ maa kangan yelogwen kwiyatapman ngɨlɨndɨ maa ndi kat kɨgɨnda kwutaa kwilɨ.
41001032	Nandinya ngɨlɨndɨ nya yiga ndaindɨ maa yelogwenga ta nɨmbagwi waagan tavila la nɨmba kat ndɨ kat kiyandi.
41001033	Kiyandi, ngepma nɨmba aywaa ngwutnyala wavamba yalaa lɨndi.
41001034	mandɨp mandɨp yelogwenga ta nɨma sakwat nɨmba kat kwunatndɨ. Waagan nɨma sakwat savɨlɨndɨ. Waagan ndi kat vɨga lɨndi. Wungi kat tɨga ndi kat kewa wun kanda wun waa wandɨ.
41001035	Ngamb nya wokelapman tɨndɨ, Jisas laataa ngepma kwalalalaa ndinyangu lapman kavat yilaa God kat ngumbulɨndɨ.
41001036	Saimonagwi wumba la nɨmbanala Jisas kat kwaka yindi.
41001037	Ndɨ kat vɨlaa wandi. aywaa mɨn kat kwaka yalɨgandi waa wandi.
41001038	Wandi maa wandɨ. nat ngepma nɨmba kat mbupmak kwagalalaa yawun. Yigat? Ngepma ngepma yiga wan apma nyaangɨt mbupmak yawun waa wandɨ Jisas.
41001039	Nayaangɨt ngambulɨnja ngaymba mbuka waagan savɨlɨga Galilina ngepma ngepma yindɨ.
41001040	Kawia kɨla nyan kwalimamba sɨlaa ndɨ kat yawiga wagalandɨ. Wun kat kwunapmak wameyan kwunakiyamɨn waa wandɨ.
41001041	Ndɨ kat miwa yiga taamba taagalaa wandɨ Jisas. Kwunakiyowun. Kwo alɨ waa wandɨ.
41001042	Wandɨ maa kawia kasɨndɨ.
41001043	-
41001044	Jisas ndɨ kat nɨma kwundimba waga ndɨ kat ay wandɨ. mɨn kat kwunakwa vak kat nat nyan kat ke mbuka. God kat kwunatɨga nyan kat mɨna mbangɨ yiga sɨmaga. Mɨna kawia kasɨndangat God kat Moses waa nyaangɨtmba agwi Kwimɨn maa kawia kasɨndɨ lɨma vak kat aywaa vɨgiyandi waa wandɨ Jisas.
41001045	Wandɨ, ngepma ngepman nɨmba kat yiga mbutɨndɨ. Wungi kat tɨga Jisas ngepma ngepma kapmba ana yi yalɨndɨ. Ndinyangu lapman kavamba yetɨndɨ maa ngepma ngepma la nɨmba ndɨ kat yandi.
41002001	Samat tɨga Kapaneamat Jisas yindɨ. Ndɨna ngaymba lɨnda vak kat wutndi.
41002002	Nɨma sakwat nɨmba yisolaa lɨndi maa ngwutnyala wavamba ndinyngu mɨna tata lɨndi maandi kat wan apma nyaangɨt mbutɨndɨ.
41002003	Man taamba kɨvɨ watna nyan kat aynat nɨmba kwutaa Jisas ta kavat kiyandi.
41002004	Nɨma sakwat nɨmba lɨndi. Jisas takava yinjeya yambɨ kai. Sambange njɨk plalaa yaawaba tulaa sandandi, sɨndu kwalɨnda njambonala ndaindɨ.
41002005	Ndina mbangw wiyo waavi taagalɨnja vak kat Jisas vɨlaa kɨvɨ watna nyan kat wandɨ. Mɨn mɨnai kavle vat yetɨlɨma vat kat lɨmbwigiyowun waa wandɨ Jisas.
41002006	Moses kwiya lo sɨmogwilɨga nɨmba maawupmba sɨka wagalalɨndi.
41002007	Jisas manda kat wupma wandɨ waa maawupmba sɨka wagalandi. God kat kavle vat wandɨ waa yelavɨtndi. God mɨna kavle vak kat lɨmbwigiyandɨ waa yelavɨtndi.
41002008	Jisas ndina naawupmba sɨka wagalanja vak maawupmba vɨlaa wandɨ. Maawupmba sɨka manda kat wagalalɨgangwuk waa wandɨ.
41002009	Mandana nɨma njɨvwa. manai kavle vat yeta vak kat lɨmbwigiyowun waweyan nɨma njɨvwa? Mɨna njamba kwutaa laataa yetɨ waweyan nɨma njɨvwa? waa wandɨ.
41002010	Wun Godna vak sɨmogwi lɨga nyan wun. Kavle vak kat lɨmbwiweya kwondu wunamba lɨgandɨ. lɨmbwiweya vak kat ngwuk kat sɨmagavak kat man taamba kɨbɨ watna nyan kat ngi vat wowun waa wandɨ Jisas.
41002011	Mɨn kat wowun. Laataa njamba kwutaa ngay ay.
41002012	Wandɨ, laataa njamba kwutaa yindɨ maa vɨndi. Wungi kat tɨga ngɨpalɨga ndalaa God kat nɨma tɨndangat yelavɨka wandi. Tak wupma ana vɨlɨnɨn waa wandi.
41002013	Jisas nat samba waambu sapmba yindɨ maa ndinyangu nɨma sakwat yisolaa lɨndi. Ndi kat sɨmogwiga wandɨ.
41002014	Samat yiga Alfiasna nyan Livai kat takis sanya yaagilɨnja gaymba lɨndɨ, vɨlaa wandɨ. Wuna kwupmba yagwa waa wandɨ. Wandɨ, laataa ndɨna kwupmba yindɨ.
41002015	Jisas Livaina ngaymba njambamba nao kɨga lɨndɨ. Takis sanya klalɨga nɨma sakwat nɨmbagwi kavle vat yilɨga nɨmbo Jisasonala lɨndi. ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba ndɨnanala lɨndi. Ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba nɨma sakwatna.
41002016	Ferisi walɨnja kɨt vapmba yetɨga nɨmbana nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nɨmba kɨlɨndangat vɨlaa ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba kat wagalandi. Kavle vat yetɨg nɨmbagwi takis sanya klalɨga nɨmbanala manda kat kɨlɨgandɨ waa wagalandi.
41002017	Wagalandi, Jisas wutaa wandɨ. Kwo lɨga nɨmba dokta kat ana yilɨgandi. Yelogwenga tɨga nɨmba mɨna yilɨgandi. Apma vat yetɨlɨga nɨmba kat kwunapmak ana yawun. Kavle vat yetɨlɨga nɨmba kat kwunapmak yawun waa wandɨ Jisas.
41002018	Ngu yagulɨga Jona kwupmba la nɨmbagwi Ferisio kɨvak kak kai waga lɨndi. Nat nɨmba Jisas kat yalaa walɨndi. Jona kwupmba la nɨmbagwi Ferisio kɨvak kak kai waga lɨndi waa walɨndi. Mɨna kwupmba la nɨmba wupma ana lɨlɨgandi waa walɨndi. Wupma manda kat yilapman yilɨgnadi waa wandi.
41002019	Jisas ndi kat awat wandɨ. Kupi lagwa klaa nyan tɨndyan vɨga lɨlɨga nɨmba kɨvak kak kai waigandi? waa wagalandɨ. Kupi lagwa klaa nyan ndinanala lɨndyan kɨvak kak kai ana waigandi waa wandɨ Jisas.
41002020	Kupi lagwa klaa nyan yindeya sɨva yaigandɨ. Yindeyan kɨvak kak kai wagiyandi waa wandɨ.
41002021	Tamba ngɨlɨkna waavwimba kupi waavwi taagalaa tavanjeyan ngɨni wan waavwi nɨmamba gɨlɨkiyandɨ.
41002022	Tamba sɨmbɨmba tavanja awmba kupi nɨma ngu ana salakyandi. Salatnjeyan nɨma nguna mbiyak nɨma yindɨ maa sɨmbɨ kɨkɨk waa mbɨlɨgiyandɨ. Mbɨlɨndɨ maa nɨma ngu kɨpmamba salaka yigiyandɨ. Nɨma nguagwi wan sɨmbo kavle yigiyandɨ. Kupi nɨma ngu kupi sɨmbɨmba mɨna salatɨgandi vɨlɨgangwuk waa wandɨ Jisas.
41002023	Jɨvwa lapman nandinyamba ambugava yilɨndi maa Jisasna kwupmba la nɨmba kɨlɨnja yuwi sɨk sɨgɨtɨndi.
41002024	Sɨgɨtnja vak kat vɨlaa Ferisi Jisas kat wagalandi. Avɨ. njɨvwa lapman nandinya kat yetɨlɨna vapmba ana yetɨlɨgandi waa wandi.
41002025	-
41002026	Wandi, Jisas wandɨ. Tamba la nyan Devit ya vak kat pɨlɨwutnja nyaangɨt vɨngwuk? waa wandɨ. Kwo lɨga wundɨ kat tɨga Devit ndɨnowinala la nɨmba Godna gay wuleilaa God kat kelonja naaw kɨndi. God kwunatɨga njambwi nyan Abaita tɨndɨ maa kɨndi. God kat kwunatɨga nɨmba mɨna kelonja naaw kɨlɨgandi. Devit ndɨ kilaa ndɨnogwinala la nɨmba kat kwindɨ. Wupma wukngwuk? waa wandɨ Jisas.
41002027	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. God njɨvwa lapman nandinya taagandɨ. ndinyangu yaat njawinjangat taagandɨ. njɨvwa lapman nandinyana vapmba yetɨnjangat God dinyangu kat ana kwutndɨ.
41002028	Ngwuk kɨta vak vɨngwangat wowun. Wun Godna vaksɨmogwi lɨga nyan njɨvwa lapman nandinya kat vɨga lɨgowun waa wandɨ Jisas.
41003001	Nat njambɨ nyaangɨt ngambulɨnja ngay Jisas wuleindɨ maa kɨvɨ watna taamba la nyan tɨndɨ.
41003002	Jisas kat vɨlɨndi. Njɨvwa lapman nandinyamba ndɨ kat kwunapmak wandeyan kavle vat yindɨ wavat wandi.
41003003	Jisas kɨvɨ watna taamba la nyan kat kapmba yagwa wandɨ.
41003004	Jisas nat nɨmba kat wandɨ. njɨvwa lapman nandinyamba apma vat yiweyan kwowa? Vatnyaweyan kwowa? waa wandɨ. Wandɨ, kwundi walapman tɨndi.
41003005	Jisas ndi kat tatna maawut sɨtnja vak kat ndi kat waleavat nɨma mɨni vɨndɨ. Kɨvɨ watna taamba la nyan kat taamba agwi wandɨ. kwindɨ maa kwunatndɨ.
41003006	Kwunatndɨ Ferisi kwiyatapman yindi. herotna nɨmbonala Jisas kat vatnyanjeyan vak kat yisolaa ngambuvat tɨndi.
41003007	-
41003008	Jisas ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmbonala sak yindi. Galili, Judia, Jerusalem, Idumia, Jodan anguveli naanga, Taia, saidon, ngepma ngepma la nɨmba ndɨ kat yandi.
41003009	Jisas ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba kat wandɨ. Wun kat vaala taaga ngwula. Nɨma sakwat nɨmba ndi yaa lɨga wun kat kematandi waa wandɨ.
41003010	Jisas nima sakwat nɨmba kat kwunatndɨ. Wungi kat tɨga yelogwenga ta nɨmba ndɨ kat sɨnyɨpmak kematndi.
41003011	Kavle waagan tavila la nɨmba ndɨ kat vɨlaa ndalaa walendi. Mɨn Godna nyan mɨn waa walendi.
41003012	Walendi, ndi vat nɨma kwundimba wandɨ. Godna nyanat tɨwangat ke walega waa wandɨ.
41003013	Jisas nduwi lɨga kava yiga ndɨna maawupmba nat nɨmba kat yagwa wandɨ maa yandi.
41003014	-
41003015	Tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk nɨmba ndɨnanala tɨnjangat, wan apma nyaangɨt yiga mbutnjangat, waagan savɨlinja kwondu klanjangat, yagwa ngwula waa wandɨ.
41003016	Wundi tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk nɨmba vɨsɨmogwinda nɨmba kɨngiyan. Saimon nat sɨ wandɨ. Mɨn Pita mɨn wandɨ.
41003017	Sebedina nyan Jemsagwi yakwa nyan Jon kat nat sɨ wandɨ. Nyingangwutna kɨndɨgɨn vla lɨga nyan mbɨt waa wandɨ. Ndina kwundimba Boanesis mbɨt wandɨ.
41003018	-
41003019	Endru, Filip, Batolomyu, Matyu. Tomas, Alfiasna nyan Jems, Tatiyas, ngepma ngepma nyaangɨt waga yi ya la Saimon, Judas Iskeriot Jisas kat vatnyavak kamwin kwiya nyan. Aywaa vɨsɨmogwindɨ maa ngepma yindi.
41003020	Jisas ngepmat yindɨ. Nat ngambɨ nɨmba yisolaa lɨnjangat naaw ana kɨlɨndi.
41003021	Jisasna ngaymba la nɨmba ngi vat wutaa ndɨna maawut yigumba ana sɨka lɨgandɨ walaa ndɨ kat kwutaa wusovat yindi.
41003022	Nyaangɨt pɨlɨwuta nɨmba Jerusalem kwagalalaa yalaa wandi. Beilsebul ndɨ kat tavilɨgandɨ waa walɨndi. Ndɨ waagana njambwi nyana waa walɨndi. Jisasnanagwinala kwaa lɨga waagangat savɨlɨlɨgandɨ waa walɨndi.
41003023	Jisas wundi nɨmba kat pakwuga la nyaangɨt wandɨ. mand vapmba Seten ndɨna mbaapmamba la waagangat savɨlɨgiyandɨ waa wandɨ.
41003024	Kɨta yelangɨ nɨmba avla kao yilɨnjeyan ndi aywaa ngɨlɨgiyandi waa wandɨ.
41003025	Kɨta ngaymba la nɨmba avla kao yilɨnjeyan ndi aywaa ngɨlɨgiyandi waa wandɨ.
41003026	Seten avla kao yilɨndeyan kwo vala tɨgiyandɨ.
41003027	Tagula ava la kavle nyan ndɨna man taamba yaaw sangilapman lɨndeyan ndɨna ngay wuleilaa ndɨna kwanda kwanda nda ana awagapma klaigandɨ. Sangilaa klaigandɨ.
41003028	-
41003030	Ndɨ kat tak wandi. Waagan mɨn kat tavilɨgandɨ. Wungi kat tɨga wupma wandɨ. ngwuk kak wowun. ndinyangu kavle ya vak kat God alɨpsɨga lɨmbwigiyandɨ. Kɨta nyan God kat kavle nyangɨt wandeyan God wan kavle vak kat alɨpsɨga lɨmbwigiyandɨ. Kɨta nyan Godna waagan kat kavle nyaangɨt ngambundeyan God ana alɨpsɨga lɨmbwigiyandɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41003031	Jisasna nyɨmeo swambuo yalaa ngegavamba lɨga kɨta nyan kat Jisas kat yiga wamɨn yaandɨ waa wandi.
41003032	Nɨma sakwat nɨmba Jisasonala ndalɨndi. Ndi ndɨ kat wandi. Vɨga awut. Mɨna nyɨmeo swambuo tɨga mɨn kat yagwa waa wandi.
41003033	Wandi, Jisas wandɨ. Wuna nyɨmeo swambuo kanda ndi waa wandɨ.
41003034	Jisas ndinyanguna nɨndɨmba lɨndɨ. Ndɨna waymba la nɨmba kat vɨlaa wandɨ. Wuna nyɨmeo swambuo ngwulayɨ.
41003035	Godna maawupmba yetɨlɨga nɨmba wuna swambu, wuna nyange, wuna nyɨme ndi waa wandɨ Jisas.
41004001	Nat njambɨ waambu sapmba Jisas sɨmagaga walɨndɨ. Nɨma sakwat nɨmba yisolaa lɨndi maa sapmba la vaala ndailaa ndalɨndɨ. yisolaa la nɨmba waambu sapmba lɨndi.
41004002	Pagwuga la wupuseputmba nɨma sakwat nyaangɨt ndi kat sɨmagagawandɨ. Sɨmagaga kupma wandɨ.
41004003	Awut wandɨ. Kɨlɨnja sɨk yaagilɨga nyan sɨk yaagivat yandɨ.
41004004	Yaagilɨndɨ maa nat sɨk nɨma sakwat angwa yambɨmba ndalɨndɨ, waavi yalaa kɨndi.
41004005	nat sɨk nɨma sakwat kambat tɨga tagu kɨpma kuvut tɨga kavamba ndandɨ. ndandɨ, kwiyatapman waatndɨ.
41004006	Njingwut tambɨ lɨndɨ maa nya sɨngwalɨtndɨ, njingwut law wandɨ, kiyandɨ.
41004007	Nat sɨk nɨma sakwat kavle yuwi sɨt tɨga kavamba ndandɨ. Kavle yuwi waataa kematndɨ maa yaaginda sɨk tegɨlɨlaa ndɨna sɨk ana kwandɨ.
41004008	-
41004009	Nat sɨk nɨma sakwat apma kɨpmamba ndandɨ. ndandɨ, sɨk kwandɨ. nat avamba sɨk kɨta ndumi kiyeli tamba vɨli kwandɨ. Nat avamba sɨk ndumi kuvuk kwandɨ. Nat avamba sɨk ndumi tambanat kwandɨ. apma maawut tɨga nyan wutaa yelavɨkyandɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41004010	Jisas wan nɨma sakwat nɨmba kat kwagalandɨ maa ndɨnanala lɨga nɨmbagwi wan tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk nɨmbo ndɨkat pagwula la wapuseput kat wagalandi.
41004011	Ndi kat wandɨ. God vɨga lɨga vatna aytesɨgɨt ngwuk kat tamba sɨmogwiwun waa wandɨ. Nat nɨmba kai walɨga nɨmba pagwuga la wupuseput mɨna wukiyandi waa wandɨ.
41004012	Kai walɨga nɨmba maawut yelavɨtapman mɨni mɨna vɨga lɨgandi. Maawut yelavɨtapman waan mɨna wuka lɨgandi. Wungi vak vapmba kupi maawut ana yelavɨkiyandi. Kupi maawut yelavɨtnjeyan kavle vak yetɨnja vak kat God lɨmbwingiyandɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41004013	Ndi kat wandɨ. Wan pagwugala wupuseputna angwa yelavɨtapman yingweyan pagwuga la angwa vat angamak yelavɨka lɨgiyangwuk.
41004014	Kɨlɨnjandana sɨk yaagilɨnda vak vla apma nyaangɨt mbutɨgandɨ.
41004015	Way angwa yambɨmbalɨga kɨpma ndinyangu vla lɨgandɨ. Nyaangɨt mbutndɨ maa wutndi. Wutndi, Seten kwiyatapman yalaa mbutnda nyaangɨt klalaa kaliga yiga pagwundɨ.
41004016	Kambat tɨga tagu kɨpma kuvuk tɨga kɨpma ndinyangu vla lɨgandɨ. Nyaangɨt nolin ngwandɨga klandi.
41004017	Ndina maawut njingwut tapman nda vla lɨgandɨ. Samat tɨga nɨma vat tɨndɨ, wan apma nyaangɨt kat tɨga waleavat waleanjangat kwagalandi.
41004018	Nat nɨmba kavle yuwimba la kavamba yaaginda sɨk vla lɨgandi. nyaangɨt wutndi.
41004019	Kɨpmana kwanda kwandanda kat yelavɨtnja vak, mandɨp mandɨp nda klavat walɨnja vat, nɨma sakwat nɨmbundawi nolin ngwandɨga klalɨnja vak, nyaangɨkat kematndi maa sɨk ana kwandɨ.
41004020	Nat 20 nɨmba apma kɨpmamba yaaginda sɨk vla lɨgandi. nyaangɨt wutaa maawupmba kwutaa yuwi sɨk kwa vak vla apma njɨvwa kwukiyandi. Nat nyan sɨk ndumi vɨli kiyeli tamba vɨli kwa vak vla apma njɨvwa kwukiyandɨ. Nat nyan sɨk ndumi kuvuk kwa vak vla nɨma sakwat apma njɨvwa kwukiyandɨ. Nat nyan sɨk ndumi tambanat kwa vak vla nɨma nglei sakwat apma njɨvwa kwukiyandɨ.
41004021	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Salɨndi, vɨtɨga ya aw yapmba njamba pulumba taagalɨkandi? Kai. Njambamba taagalɨgandi waa wandɨ.
41004022	Mbambla pagwuga lɨga nda ngɨni kapmba lɨgiyandɨ. Kapmonja nda vla nda ngɨni vɨgiyandi.
41004023	Maawut yelavɨta lɨgiyaa nyan awut.
41004024	Ndi kat wandɨ. yigumba awut. nat nɨmba kat yilɨngwa vak vla ngwuk kat wupma yigiyandi. Ndi kat nɨma vat yingweyan ngwuk kat nɨma anglei vat yigiyandi.
41004025	Maawupmba yelavɨka lɨga nyan ndɨ nɨma sakwat apma vat klaigandɨ. maawupmba yelavɨtapman tɨga nyan apma vat ana klaigandɨ. Tat kla la apma vat nat nyan ndɨnamba klalaa kaligiyandɨ.
41004026	God nɨn kat kwilɨga vat kɨpmamba sɨk yaagilɨga nyan vla lɨgandɨ.
41004027	Wan nyan ngan sɨndu kwalaa nandinya laatndɨ maa sɨt kwo waatndɨ. Waataa vat ana vɨndɨ.
41004028	Kɨpmamba lɨga avla waatndɨ. Tat ava. Ngɨni mwe tawndɨ. ngɨni sɨk kwandɨ.
41004029	Sɨk ak wulaa lɨndeyan kalɨtɨnda sɨva yandeyan yapmba kalɨtɨgandɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41004030	Jisas wandɨ. God vɨga lɨga vat manda vat vla lɨgandɨ. Angamak vɨlɨnja wapuseputmba sɨmagagiyowun waa wandɨ.
41004031	Mastet walɨnja sɨk vla lɨgandɨ. Wan sɨk mak nglei nda.
41004032	Wan sɨk yaaginjeyan waakiyandɨ. Kaawa ava vla waakiyandɨ. Nɨma sandanala lɨgiyandɨ. ndɨna angɨmba wiyaka yetɨlɨga waavi ngay kwukiyandi.
41004033	Pagwuga lɨga wapuseput nɨma sakwat ndi kat ngambundɨ. Nat nɨmba wuka yelavɨtndi. Nat nɨmba kai.
41004034	Nat nɨmba kat pagwuga lɨga wapuseput mɨna mbutndɨ. Kapmba ana ndi kat mbutndɨ. Ndɨna mbaapma nɨmba kat wupma kai. Ndi kat kapmba nyaangɨtna angwa vɨsɨmogwindɨ.
41004035	Nat nandinya ngan ndandɨ, Jisas ndɨna mbaapma nɨmba kat wandɨ. Sak valigegat waa wandɨ.
41004036	Nat nɨmba kat kwagalalaa njaambɨt kulaa valɨgendi. Nat njaambɨt nɨmbun valɨgendi.
41004037	Yilɨndi maa nɨma mwutolo kwutndɨ, pali laatndɨ. nɨma pali laataa ndina njaambɨt wuleindɨ.
41004038	Jisas kwengwi njaambɨtmba lɨga sɨndu kwandɨ. Ndɨ kat sɨvɨlulaa wandi. Sɨmogwi lɨga nyan nɨna njaambɨt tamba kambruka tɨgandɨ. Nɨn kat ana yelavɨka lɨgamɨn?
41004039	Jisas laataa mwuk pali kat kai wandɨ maa kiyak wandɨ. Ngu yuvut tapman tɨndɨ.
41004040	Mwuk kat walaa ndi kat wandɨ. Ngwuk manda kat vaaka lɨgangwuk. njambwi nyanat tuwa vak ana yelavɨka lɨgangwuk? waa ndi kat wandɨ.
41004041	Wandɨ maa ndi ngɨpaliga ndalaa awat sowat wandi. Wan nyan anda nyana. mwuk pali ndɨnai waa vapmba wutɨnda waa wandi. atwandɨ. God waa nyaangɨt mbutɨga nyan kwo ngepma lɨndyan ndɨ kat apma maawut yelavɨkiyandi. ndɨna angwa ngepma lɨndeyan ndɨna ngepma nɨmba ndɨ kat kai waigandi waa wandɨ.
41005001	Nat naanga sapmba yalaa Gerasa walɨnja nɨmba ta kavamba kawindi.

41005004	Nɨma sakwat njambɨ sen walɨnja yaawmba ndɨna man taamba sangindi maa vɨtɨtɨndɨ. nɨma ava la nyanat tɨndangat ndɨ kat ana kwulatndi.
41005005	Nandinya ngan nandinya ngan kiyaa nɨmba waangumba taagalɨnja kavamba duwi la kavamba avla kaambapmba sɨlɨmbinda kɨsala lɨndɨ.
41005006	-
41005008	Sɨvla mbundɨmba lɨga Jisas kat vɨlaa pɨlɨga yalaa Jisasna mangandɨmba ndandɨ. jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ. kavle waagan ndɨ kat kwagalalaa ay ngwula. wandɨ, wan nyan nɨma kwundimba walega wandɨ. Wun kat manda kat vat yigamɨn. Mɨn Godna nɨma nyan mɨn waa wandɨ. Godna sɨ waga wun kat ke yiga nɨma vat waa wandɨ. Godna sɨ waga wun kat ke yiga nɨma vat waa wandɨ.
41005009	Jisas ndɨ kat wagalandɨ. mɨna sɨ angamak waigowun waa wandɨ. Wuna sɨ Nɨma Sakwat. Wupma nɨma sakwat tɨganɨn waa wandɨ.
41005010	Nɨmbamba yawiga wandɨ. Waagan kat ke kapma ngepma yinjangat savɨlɨga waa wandɨ.
41005011	Mbak nɨma sakwat yisolaa ngwaymba lɨga nduwimba kɨga lɨndi.
41005012	Waagan jisas kat yawiga wagalandi. Mbatnat nɨn kat savɨlɨ. Mbatnamba tavilaa lɨgiyanɨn waa wandi.
41005013	Jisas kwowa wandɨ maa waagan wan nyan kat kwagalalaa mbatnanamba tavilɨndi. Tavilɨndi maa wundi mbak nduwimba tɨlanda ndaindi. Dailaa ngumba yindi. Mbak 2,000 ngu kɨgiyatndi.
41005014	Mbak kak vɨga la nɨmba vaaka yindi. Ngepma ta kavamba ngepma lapman kavamba ndinyangu kat yiga mbutndi. ndinyangu wutaa Jisas kwutna vat vɨvat yindi.
41005015	Jisas ta kava yalaa waagan tat tavila la nyan kat vɨndi. Tat nɨma sakwat waagan tavila nyan waavwi kwusolaa apma maawut sɨka lɨnda vak kat vɨndi. Vɨlaa vaatndi.
41005016	Wan nɨmba mbatnagwi waagan tavila la nyan kat Jisas kwutɨndangat yiga mbutndi.
41005017	-
41005018	Wan ngepma nɨmba Jisas kat wandi. Nɨna ngepma kwagala yawiga wandi. Jisas daa vaala kundɨ maa tak waagan tavila la nyan ndɨna kwupmba yivat wandɨ.
41005019	Jisas ndɨ kat kai wandɨ. Mɨn kat awagapma mɨna yinda vak kat ayga wamɨla waa wandɨ, Jisas.
41005020	Wandɨ maa kwagalalaa ngepma tamba vɨli ta kavamba yiga Jisas ndɨ kat kwutna vak kat mbutɨndi. mbutndɨ maa wuta nɨmba ngɨpaliga ndandi aywaa.
41005021	Ak Jisas wumbayambɨ vaalamba valɨgendɨ. Waambu sapmba lɨlɨndɨ maa nɨma sakwat nɨmba yaa yisondi.
41005022	Nyaangɨt ngambulɨnja ngayna nɨma nyan ndɨna sɨ Jairas, Jisas kat vɨlaa mangandɨmba yaak yaak ndandɨ.
41005023	Jisas kat wandɨ. Wuna tagwanyan kiyavat yigalɨ waa wandɨ. Mɨna taamba lɨ kat taagameyan ana kiyaigalɨ. Kwo lɨgiyalɨ waqa wandɨ.
41005024	Jisas Jairasna kwupmba yalɨndɨ maa nɨma sakwat nɨmba wupma kwupmba yisolaa kemaka yalɨndi.
41005025	Yaat tɨgtɨmbimba yelogwen yila taagwa lɨlɨ. Naambi tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk yelogwen yiga yilɨndakat tɨlɨ.
41005026	Nɨma sakwat dokta lɨ kat kwunapmak yilɨnjan ana apma vat tɨlɨ. kavle nglei yilɨ.
41005027	Jisas kat wanja nyaangɨt wutaa nɨma sakwat nɨmbana nɨndɨmba lɨga ndɨna kwupmba yaga ndɨna waavwi sɨnyɨtɨ.
41005028	Wat taagwa yelavɨtaa walɨ. ndɨna waavwi sɨnyɨkweyan kwo lɨgiyowun waa walɨ.
41005029	Sɨnyɨtɨ, yelogwen yi la kava tɨvɨndɨ. Lɨla mbangɨ kwo lɨnda vatalva yelavɨtndɨ.
41005030	Jisas wuna kwondu samat ngɨlɨndɨ waa yelavɨtndɨ. Yelavɨtaa lɨmbalaguga kwutmɨni vɨlaa wandɨ. Wuna waavwi kanda sɨnyɨka waa wagalandɨ.
41005031	Ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba wandi. ngwaymba lɨga kemaka nɨma sakwat nɨmba kat vɨga lɨgamɨn. Manda kat kanda sɨnyɨka wagalamɨn waa wandi.
41005032	Sɨnyɨta nyan vɨvat jisas lɨmbalaguga kwatɨndɨ.
41005033	Wat taagwa lɨ kat kwutaa vak kat yelavɨtaa vaaka ava plalaa yalaa ndɨna mangandɨmba ndalaa ndɨ kat aywaa mbutɨ.
41005034	Jisas lɨ kat wandɨ. Tagwa nyan nyɨna mbangɨ wiyo waavi laaganda vapmba nyɨna yelogwen ngɨlɨndɨ waa wandɨ. Apma vat ay. kwo lɨgiyanyɨn waa wandɨ.
41005035	Walɨndɨ maa nyaangɨt ngambulɨnja ngayna nɨma nyana ngay la nɨmba yalaa wandi. Mɨna tagwa nyan tamba kiyalɨ waa wandi. Manda kat sɨmaga lɨga nyan kat wumba lɨndɨ wagalalɨgamɨn waa wandi.
41005036	Jisas wutaa wan nyaangɨt kat kai walaa nyaangɨt ngambulɨnja ngayna nɨma nyan kat wandɨ. Ke vaaka. Mɨna mbangɨ wiyo waavi taaga waa wandɨ.
41005037	Jisas nat nɨmba ndɨna kwupmba yavakak kai wandɨ. Pita, Jems, Jon kat kuvut nɨmba mɨna ndi kat kai ana wandɨ. Jon Jemsna swambu.
41005038	Naangɨt ngambulɨnja ngayna nɨma kwundimba nglala nɨmba kat vɨndɨ.
41005039	Jisas wuleiga lɨga ndi kat wandɨ. Manda kat mandɨp mandɨp yiga nglalɨgangwuk. Mat nyan ana kiyalɨ. Sɨndu kwalɨ waa wandɨ.
41005040	Wandɨ maa ndɨ kat kasendi. Ndi kat savɨlɨlaa mat nyana nyaet nyɨme ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba apma mat nyan tɨga kava wuleindi.
41005041	Taambamba kwutaa lɨ kat ndina ngepma kwundimba wandɨ. Talita kumi wandɨ. Wupma wandɨ. Mat nyan laak waa wandɨ.
41005042	Wandɨ, laataa man veilɨ. Lɨla naambi tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk. Veilɨ maa lɨ kat vɨlaa ngɨpaliga ndandi.
41005043	Ndɨnai kwutna vat sɨmogwivak kak kai wandɨ. Ndi kat wandɨ. Lɨ kat kɨgɨnda agwi waa wandɨ.
41006001	Wan ngepma kwagalalaa ndɨna angwa ngepma yindɨ. Ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba ndɨna kwupmba yindi.
41006002	Njwvwa lapman nandinyamba nyaangɨt ngambulɨnja ngaymba mbuka wandɨ. nɨma sakwat nɨmba wutaa ngɨpaliga ndalaa wandi. Maawupmba yelavɨtnda vak ndɨ kat kandana kwiya. mandamba kwunatnda nɨma njɨvwa kwutɨndɨ waa wandi.
41006003	Ndɨna nyaek ngay kwuta nyana. ndɨ mariana nyana. Jems, Josis, Judas, Saimon ndina nyamwun ndɨ. Ndɨna nyange nɨnanala yetɨndi. jisas kat ndina maawupmba kavle vat yelavɨtndi.
41006004	Jisas di kat wandɨ. God waa nyaangɨt mbutɨga nyan kwo ngepma lɨndeyan ndɨ kat apma maawut yelavɨkiyandi. ndɨna angwa ngepma lɨndeyan ndɨna ngepma nɨmba ndɨ kat kai waigandi waa wandɨ.
41006005	Wungi kat tɨga wan ngepmamba nɨma njɨvwa ana kwutndɨ. Yelogwenga ta nɨmba kuvuti mɨna taamba laakandɨ, kwo lɨndi.
41006006	Ndina mbangɨ ndɨ kat vali yindangat Jisas ngɨpaliga ndalaa ngepma ngepmamba yiga sɨmagaga mbutndɨ.
41006007	Wundi tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk nɨmba kat yagwa walaa ay wandɨ. Vɨli vɨli ay ngwula wandɨ. Waagan kat savɨlɨnjangat ndi kat kwondu kwindɨ.
41006008	Ndi kat wandɨ. Naaw lapman kɨmbi lapman sanya lapman ay wandɨ. Vasɨ vasɨ mɨna klalaa ay waa wandɨ.
41006009	Man su kwusolaa waavwi kɨta kwusolaa ay wandɨ. Waavwi vɨlɨlɨk ke kwusoga waa wandɨ.
41006010	Ndi kat wandɨ. Ngepma wuleilaa ngay ngay ke yiga kɨga. kita ngaymba kɨga alɨ waa wandɨ
41006011	Nat ngepmana nɨmba ngwuk kak wupmak kat kai wanjeyan wan ngepma kwagala. kwagalalaa man mbaw vɨvlɨ. ndinai kai waa vak sɨmagavak kak vɨvlɨ waa wandɨ.
41006012	Wupma yiga mbutndi. Kupi maawut yelavɨk waa mbutndi. Kavle vat yetɨlɨngwa vak kat kwagala waa mbutndi.
41006013	Waagan nɨma sakwat savɨlɨndi. yelogwenga ta nɨmba kat ngwaat kuvut salɨka kwunatndi maa kwo lɨndi.
41006014	Nɨma sakwat nɨmba Jisas kat wutɨndi. Wan kavana njambwi nyan Herot ndɨno wutndɨ. Nat nɨmba Jisas kat weandi. Ndɨ ngu yagu la Jona. Kiyalaa laatndɨ waa wandi. Wupma kwondumba nɨma njɨvwa kwutɨgandɨ waa wandi.
41006015	Nat nɨmba wandi. ndɨ Ilaija waa wandi. Nat nɨmba wandi. God waa nyaangɨt tamba mbuta nyana vla lɨgandɨ waa wandi.
41006016	Herot wutaa wandɨ. nambu kalɨkwa Jon kɨngiyan. Kyalaa laatndɨ waa wandɨ.
41006017	-
41006020	Tat ngu yagu la Jon Herot kat wandɨ. Mɨna nyamwuna taagwa kwo klaman ana nglaatndɨ waa wandɨ. Kerot klaa taagwa Herodias wan nyaangɨt wutaa Jon kat walialɨ. Ndɨ kat vatnyavat yilavilaa lɨlɨ. Herotna nyamwun Filipna taagwa Herodias kat tɨga Jon kat kwutaa man taamba sangilaa kalabusmba taagandɨ. Herot Jon kat vaatɨndɨ. Savagu maawut tɨndangat vɨlaa Jon kat miwa yindɨ. Wupma Herodias vatnyavat yilavilaa lɨlɨ. Herot Jon waa nyaangɨt wutaa yigumba ana maawut sɨtndɨ. Ndɨnai waa nyaangɨt nolin ngwandɨga wutndɨ Herot.
41006021	Herot kwutnja naambina nandinyamba nɨma kɨgɨnda kwutɨndi. ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmbagwi kao lɨlɨga njambwi nɨmbo Galilina njambwi nɨmbagat kap ti kwutɨndi. Wan nandinyamba wuna maawupmba kwukiyowun waa yelavɨtɨ Herodias.
41006022	Herodiasna taagwa nyan yalaa mbangu veilɨ. lɨlai veilaa vak kat Herotagwi ndɨnanala la nɨmbo lɨ kat vɨlaa nolin ngwandɨndi. Veilɨ maa Herot tagwa nyan kat wandɨ. Kla nda klavat wanyeyan nyɨn kat klalaa kwigiyowun waa wandɨ.
41006023	Nyaet sɨga yiga wandɨ. Anda nda klavat wanyeyan nyɨngat klalaa kwigiyowun waa wandɨ.
41006024	Wandɨ, yilaa nyɨme kat walɨ. Angamak wagalagiyowun waa walɨ. Walɨ, nyɨme walɨ. Ngu yagu la Jona nambu kat wagala waa walɨ.
41006025	Walɨ, kwiyatapman Herot kat yiga wagalalɨ. Ngu yagu la Jona namb u kalɨtaa yaanjɨmba taagtalaa wun kat kwiyatapman agwi waa walɨ.
41006026	Herot Jon kat miwa yilɨndɨ. Ndɨnai lɨ kat nyaek sɨga yiga wanda vak ndɨnanala kɨlɨga nɨmba tamba wutndi. Wungi vat mandɨp vak ana yigiyowun waa yelavɨtndɨ Herot.
41006027	Herot yelavɨtaa ndɨna kao lɨlɨga nyan kat nambu kalɨtaa agiya wandɨ. Wandɨ maa kalabusmba kalɨtndɨ.
41006028	Kalɨtaa yaanjɨmba taagalaa tagwa nyan kat kwindɨ. kwindɨ, nyɨme kat kwilɨ.
41006029	Jona kwupmba la nɨmba wutaa yaa ndɨna sɨm klalaa waangumba taagandi.
41006030	Jisas apma nyaangɨt yiga ambuk waa wanda nɨmba yalaa Jisas kat ndinai kwutna vapmba ndinai sɨmagaga waa vapmba aywaa mbutndi.
41006031	Ndi yilaa yanjan waangɨt ana pugwalɨndi. Yilaa yalaa yetɨlɨnjan naaw ana kɨlɨndi. Wungikat tɨga Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Nat nɨmba kwagalalaa kwo kavat yagwa ngwula. Samat waangɨt pugwalɨga yagwa ngwula waa wandɨ Jisas.
41006032	Vaalamba kwo kavat avla yindi.
41006033	Ndinai ya vak kat vɨlaa nɨma sakwat nɨmba ngepma ngepmamba lɨga kawinjeya kavat tata yivat angwa yambak pɨlɨndi.
41006034	Kawindi maa nɨma sakwat nɨmba kat Jisas vɨndi. Jisas wan nɨmba ndunyan vɨlapman tɨga sip sip vla lɨndi waa yelavɨtaa ndi kat miwa yiga di kat nɨma sakwat vak kat sɨmagaga wandɨ.
41006035	Nya ndaivat yilɨndɨ maa Jisasna kwupmba la nɨmba ndɨ kat wandi. Wan kava kwo kava nya ndaivat yilɨgandɨ waa wandi.
41006036	Ndi kat ay awa waa wandi. Ngwaymba lɨga ngepma lɨga kava kɨgɨnda klavak ay waa awa wandi.
41006037	Wandi, wandɨ. Mbaolamba tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk yaagilaa ndi kat naaw kwivak kak klaiganɨn? waa wagalandi.
41006038	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Ngwula nao anda sakwat tɨgandɨ. Yiga vɨga avɨ waa wandɨ. Vɨlaa yalaa wandi. Nao tambanat kami vɨlɨlɨk tɨgandi waa wandi.
41006039	Kwandɨ yuwimba yiga mbaapma mbaapmamba yiga ndaalɨ ngwula waa wandɨ.
41006040	Wupma ndaalɨndi. Mbaapma ndumi tambanat tɨgandɨ. Mbaapma kɨtamba ndumi vɨli kiyeli tamba vɨli nɨmba tɨndi.
41006041	Jisas nao tambanat kami vɨlɨlɨk taambamba kwutaa nyɨnangwutnat vɨga God kat kɨgɨnda kat sɨvu kɨndɨ. Ngambulaa nao samat samat lɨmbalaa mɨna ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba kat nɨma sakwat nɨmba kat kwivakak kwindɨ.
41006042	Aywaa kɨndi. Yaat taatndɨ.
41006043	Klambɨnjan nao kɨgɨnda mbanimba naangandi. Mbani tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlk naangandi.
41006044	Ka duna sakwat 5,000.
41006045	Jisas ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba kat nat naangamba Betsaida walɨnja ngepmat vaalamba ay wandɨ. Yilɨndi maa wan nɨma sakwat nɨmba kat ngiyambak ay ngwula wandɨ.
41006046	Ndi kat kwagalalaa nduwi la kavat God kat ngambuvat yindɨ.
41006047	Kulun wandɨ ma vaala nɨndɨ sapmba lɨndɨ. Jisas nɨmbumba kapma lɨndɨ.
41006048	Mwuk ndina pumba viyalɨndɨ, ngusa nɨma njɨvwa kwuka kalɨnja vat Jisas vɨndɨ. mbambala nglei vɨtɨtindɨ ndinai la kavat tagu ngumba veiga yindɨ. Ndi kat kwulaka tata yivat yindɨ.
41006049	Tagu ngumba veiga yindangat vɨlaa wundumbu waa yelavɨtaa kɨsalandi.
41006050	Vɨlaa vaaka yindi. Ke vaaka wun Jisas wun waa wandɨ.
41006051	Walaa ndina vaalamba kundɨ maa mwuk kiyak wandɨ. Mwuk kiyak wandɨ maa ngɨga ndandi.
41006052	Jisas nao kwutna vak kat ndina maawut ana yelavɨtndi. Wungi vak kat tɨga tagu ngumba yanda vak vɨla ngɨga ndandi.
41006053	Valɨgelaa Genesaret walɨnja ngepma kawilaa mbonjwe tawlaa yaaw tundi.
41006054	Vaala kwagalaa valilaa wokendi maa nɨmbumba la nɨmba Jisasna mɨndama vɨndi.
41006055	Ngay ngay yilaa njambamba la nɨmba yelogwenga ta nɨmba kat Jisas ta kava kat wutaa ndɨnai la kavat kiyandi.
41006056	Nɨma ngepma mat ngepma ngepma lapman kava apma Jisas yandɨ maa wenga kavamba yelogwega ta nɨmba kat kiyalaa taagandi. Jisasna njɨmbwi waavwi sɨnyɨpmak wagalalaa lɨndi. Sɨnyɨta nɨmba kwo lɨndi.
41007001	-
41007002	Jerusalemba la yaa nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nɨmbagwi Ferisio Jisas ta kava yalaa Jisasna kwupmba la nɨmba taamba ngu njangilapman kwo kɨnjangat vɨndi.
41007003	Ferisiagwi nat Juda walɨnja nɨmbo aywaa taamba ngu njagilapman ana kɨlɨndi. ndina ngwat ta vapmba njangilaa kɨlɨndi.
41007004	Wengamba klalɨnja kɨgɨnda njangilapman yinjeyan ana kɨlɨndi. Nat vak nɨma sakwat vat kwunapmak yilɨgandi. Kap njangilɨnja vat, aw njangilɨnja vat, kapamba viyanja aw njangilɨnja vat, sɨndu kwaa njamba njangilɨnja vat, mandɨp mandɨp vat yilɨndi.
41007005	Ferisiagwi nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nɨmbo Jisas kat wagalandi. Mɨna kwupmba la nɨmba manda kat ngwatna vapmba ana yilɨgandi. Manda kat tamba ngu njangilapman taambamba kɨlɨgandi waa wagalandi.
41007006	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Ngwuk mandɨk ngambuga mandɨt yetɨga nɨmba ngwuk. Aisaia ngwuk kat mbutndɨ. Woseka ana wandɨ. Wupma God waa nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutndɨ. Wundi nyangu ndina kwundimba wuna sɨ nɨma tɨndangat walɨgandi. Ndina maawupmba wun kat ana yelavɨtɨgandi.
41007007	Ndinai wun kat nambu sɨlandalaa maawupmba yelavɨtnja vat kwo vatnat tɨlɨgandɨ. God waa nyaangɨt kwagalalaa ndinyanguna nyaangɨt nat nɨmba kat sɨmagaga mbutndi waa pɨlɨwutndɨ Aisaia.
41007008	God waa nyaangɨt kwagalalaa ngwat waa nyaangɨtmba mɨna yetɨlɨgangwuk.
41007009	God waa nyaangɨk kat kai walɨgangwuk tuwa. Ngivat ngwutna vapmba yetɨlɨgangwuk.
41007010	Moses ngivak wandɨ. Nyaek kat nyɨme kat apma vat ay wandɨ. Nyaek nyɨme kat kavle vat walɨga nyan kiyaa tɨgandɨ waa wandɨ Moses.
41007011	Ngwuk kapma vapmba wangwuk. Kɨta nyan ndɨna nyaek nyɨme kat mbɨk kat kwiweya nda tamba God kat kwiwun waa wandeyan apma vatna waa wangwuk. Wan vak kat “koban” walɨngwa vatna.
41007012	Ndɨna nyaek nyɨme kat ana vɨga lɨgiyandɨ waa wangwuk.
41007013	God kwiya apma nyaangɨt kwagalaa kavle nyaangɨtmba kwilɨgangwuk nat nɨmba kat. Nɨma sakwat wungi vat kvale vapmba yetilɨgangwuk wandɨ Jisas.
41007014	Jisas ta nɨmba kat nat njambɨ yagwa wandɨ. Walaa ndi kat wandɨ. Ngwuk awuk ngwula. Maawupmba yelavɨk ngwula waa wandɨ.
41007015	Ndinyangu kɨgiyaa nda ndɨna maawuk kat ana kavle yigiyandɨ. Maawupmba lɨga wogwegiyaa nda ndinyangu kat kavle yigiyandɨ waa wandɨ.
41007016	Waan wuka lɨgiyaa nɨmba awut waa wandɨ.
41007017	Wan nɨmba kat kwagalalaa ngay wuleindɨ maa ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba ndɨnai waa nyaangɨk kat ndɨ kat wagalandi.
41007018	Ndi kat wandɨ. ngwutna maawut yigumba ana sɨka lɨgangwuk? Ndunyan kɨgiyan nda ndɨna maawuk kat ana kavle yigiyandɨ. Ana vɨlɨgangwuk? waa wandɨ.
41007019	Kɨgiyan nda ndɨna maawut ana wuleigiyandɨ. Yaapmba lɨga kwo wogwegiyandɨ. Kɨgɨnda aywaa apma mɨna waa wandɨ.
41007020	Maawupmba lɨga wogwegiyaa nda ndinyangu kat kavle yigiyandɨ.
41007021	Ndinyanguna maawupmba lɨga wogwegiyaa vat kɨngiyan. Kavle maawut yelavɨtnja vak, sɨmblan wangɨlɨnja taagwa kat yilɨnja vak, sɨkwutnja vak, ndinyangu kat vatnyalɨnja vak, nat nyana taagwa kat wangɨlɨnja vak,
41007022	nat nyana nda klavat walɨnja vak, kavle vat yetɨlɨnja vak, nyɨnangat kwutɨnja vak, yambɨsɨk yilɨnja vak, kavle maawut yelavɨtnja vak, njɨka walɨnja vak, avla nolin ngwandɨnja vak, kwusɨlɨga kaselɨnja vak.
41007023	Wan kavle vak aywaa maawupmba lɨga wogwelɨndan ndinyangu kat kavle yigiyandɨ.
41007024	Wan nyaangɨt walaa Jisas laataa Taiagwi Saidano walɨnja ngepma vɨlɨlɨk ta kavat yindɨ. Ngay wuleilaa ndɨnai wuleia vat vɨvak kat kai waa tɨndɨ. Tamba vɨndi.
41007025	Ngay wuleindɨ maa waagan tavila la tagwa nyana nyɨme Jisas yanda vak wutaa yalaa ndɨna mangandɨmba ndalɨlɨ.
41007026	Wat taagwa kapma ngepma lagwat. Lɨla angwa ngepma Siria Finisia. Glik walɨnja kwundimba wala taagwat. Lɨla tagwa nyamba tavila waagangat savɨlɨndangat Jisas kat walɨ.
41007027	Jisas lɨ kat wandɨ. Tat mat nyan kɨgiyandi. Mat nyana nao waala kat yitenjeyan ana nglaatndɨ waa wandɨ.
41007028	Wandɨ, njambwi nyan ngiyambak wamɨn waa walɨ. Njamba pulumba waala mat nyan kɨlaa kwat nao ndalɨndɨ, kɨlɨgandi waa walɨ.
41007029	-
41007030	Lɨ kat wandɨ. Wupma walaa yigiyanyɨn. nyɨna taagwa nyan kat waagan taamba kwagalandɨ waa wandɨ. Wandɨ maa yilaa njambamba vɨlɨ.
41007031	Taia kwagalalaa Saidon wuleilaa kwagalalaa ngepma tamba vɨli ta kava yilaa kwagalalaa Galili walɨnja sak yindɨ.
41007032	Waan tɨvɨga kwundi kɨla la nyan Jisas kat kiyandi. Kiyalaa Jisas taamba ndɨ kat taagandagat mbutndi.
41007033	Jisas nɨma sakwat nɨmba ta kava kwagalalaa ndɨ kat kapma kava kalilaa ndɨna waan vɨli apa sɨt taamba sɨsolalaa sɨpmiya salaa ndɨna tɨgatmba sɨt taamba laagandɨ.
41007034	Jisas nyɨnangwutnat vɨga yaat njawiaga wan nyan kat ndɨna kwudimba “Efata” waa lavwi ke tɨvɨga wandɨ.
41007035	Wandɨ maa ndɨna waan wuka ndɨna kwundi apma vat ngambundɨ.
41007036	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Nat nɨmba kat ke mbuka waa wandɨ. Wupma walɨndɨ maa nat nɨma sakwat nɨmba kat mbutɨndi.
41007037	Ngɨga ndalaa wandi. Aywaa yigumba kwunatɨndɨ. Waan tɨvla la nɨmba kat walɨndɨ. Kwundi kɨlɨla la nɨmba kat walɨndɨ maa apma vat ngambulɨndi waa ngɨpaliga ndalaa walɨndi.
41008001	Samat tɨga nat njamba nɨma sakwat nɨmba yisolaa lɨndi. Ndina kɨgɨnda ngɨlɨndɨ maa Jisas ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba kat yagwa walaa ndi kat wandɨ.
41008002	Nandinya kuvut wunanala tɨndi maa ndina kɨgɨnda ngɨlɨndɨ. Ndi kat miwa yiga loɨgowun waa wandɨ Jisas.
41008003	Nao kɨlapman tɨndi ndi kat ngepma ay waweyan nat nɨmba yiga ava yambɨmba wundɨ kat tɨga ndaigandi. Nat nɨmba sivlamba lɨga yandi.
41008004	Ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba ndɨ kat wandi. Kwo kavqamba lɨganɨn. Kɨgɨnda andambas klalaa kwigiyanɨn waa wandi.
41008005	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Naaw anda sakwat tɨgandɨ waa wandɨ. Wandɨ, naaw sɨla vɨli lɨgandɨ wandi.
41008006	Jisas ndi kat kɨpmamba ndaalɨ wandɨ. Nao sɨla vɨli klalaa kwutaa God kat apma vat kwimɨn waa waga samat samat lɨmbaga mɨna ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba kat kwinjangat kwindɨ. Kwindɨ maa awat nat nɨmba kat kwindi.
41008007	Nat kami kuvut tɨndi. Jisas God kat wungi vat sɨgɨt walaa agwi wandɨ.
41008008	Ndi aywaa kɨndi. Ndi alɨpsɨga wan nao kɨgɨnda kɨndi. Klambɨnjan nao kɨgɨnda mbani sɨlavɨli naangandi, mbani taatndɨ. Ka nɨmba 4,000.
41008009	Jisasna kwupmba la nɨmba klambɨnjan nao naangalɨndi maa Jisas nɨma sakwat nɨmba kat ngepma ay ngwula waa wandɨ.
41008010	Jisas ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmbanala vaala kundi maa Dalmanuta walɨnja kavat yindi.
41008011	Ferisi yalaa Jisas kat kwundimba waliavat tɨndi. Ndɨ kat wandi. Kwutɨma njɨvwa sɨmogwi lɨma vak kat vɨlaa mɨn Godna nyan mɨn waa yelavɨkiyanɨn.
41008012	Jisasna mbangɨ ndi kat kɨlɨpangɨ yilaa wandɨ. Mbambala lɨga nɨmba ndi sɨmogwi nda mɨna vɨvat walɨgandi. Ngwuk kak wowun. Sɨmogwi nda ngwuk kat ana sɨmogwigiyowun waa wandɨ.
41008013	Ndi kat kwagalalaa nat njambɨ vallamba kulaa nat naanga valigendɨ.
41008014	Nao klavak kwagalalaa yindi. Vaalamba lɨga bret-nao kɨta lɨndɨ.
41008015	Jisas wandɨ. Ferisiagwi Herotna yis walɨnja mbiyak vla bret-naomba taakalɨnja nda kat yigumba vɨmba ngwuk waa wandɨ.
41008016	Ndɨnai ngambula vak kat wutaa avla ndi wagalandi. Nɨna bret-nao ngɨlɨndɨ maa nɨn kat kan nyaangɨt anagandɨ waa waa avla wagalandi.
41008017	Jisas ndinai waa nyaangɨt wutaa wandɨ. Manda kat nao lapman tɨngwangat ngambulɨgangwuk.
41008018	Mɨni ana vɨlɨgangwuk? Waan ana wutɨgangwuk? Ngwula maawut tɨvɨndɨ? Nao kat ana wowun. Ndina kavle vak yetɨnja vak kat wukwangat wowun.
41008019	Tat nao tambanat lɨmba mɨna kwiwun klambɨnjan nao anda sakwat mbani naangangwuk waa wandɨ. Wandɨ, wandi. Tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk naanganɨn waa wandi.
41008020	Ndunyan 4,000 ndi kat nao sɨla vɨli kwiwun klambɨnjan nao anda sakwat mbani naangangwuk waa wandɨ. Wandɨ, wandi. Sɨla vɨli naanganɨn waa wandi.
41008021	Ndi kat wandɨ. Wupma ngwula maawut ygumba ana sɨka lɨgangwuk? Manda kat nao ngɨlɨndɨ maa nɨmamba yelavɨtɨgangwuk waa wandɨ.
41008022	Betsaida wuleindi maa mɨni kiyaa nyan kat Jisas taamba taagavak kak ndɨ kat kiyandi.
41008023	Jisas mɨni kiyaa nyan kat taambamba kwutaa waambu ngepma kalindɨ. Ndɨna mɨnimba kwundi ngu laagalaa taamba laagalaa wandɨ. Vɨlɨgamɨn? waa wandɨ.
41008024	Wandɨ maa wan nyan vɨga wandɨ. Ndinyangu kat vɨlɨgowun. Mi vla lɨndi, vɨlɨgowun waa wandɨ.
41008025	Wandɨ, Jisas nat njambɨ taamba mɨnimba taagandɨ maa mɨni kwitaa yigumba vɨndɨ.
41008026	Jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ. Ngepma wuleilapman ngay ay wandɨ.
41008027	Jisas ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmbanala Sisaria Filipai walɨnja kavana ngepma ngepmat yindi. Nɨndɨ ava yambɨmba Jisas ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba kat wagalandɨ. Wunai luwangat angamak walɨgandi waa wagalandɨ.
41008028	Ndɨ kat wandi. Nat nɨmba mɨn kan ngu yagula Jon mɨn walɨgandi. Nat nɨmba mɨn kan Ilaija mɨn walɨgandi. Nat nɨmba mɨn God waa nyaangɨt mbuta kɨta nyan mɨn walɨgandi waa wandi.
41008029	Jisas ndi kat wagalandɨ. Ngwuk wunai luwangat angamak walɨgangwuk waa wagalandɨ. Wagalandɨ, Pita wandɨ. Mɨn Kraist mɨn waa wandɨ.
41008030	Pita wandɨ maa Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Wungi vak vak kat nat nɨmba kat ke waga waa wandɨ.
41008031	Jisas wandɨ. Judana ngwatnagwi God kat walɨga njambwi nɨmbo nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nɨmbo wun kat kai waigandi. nɨma nɨma vat wun kat yigiyandi. Wun Godna vat smogwi lɨga nyan wun kat vatnyagiyandi. Kiyalaa nandinya kuvut tɨga laakiyowun waa wandɨ.
41008032	Ndi kat wan nyaangɨt kapmba mbutndɨ. Ana pagwundɨ. Mbutndɨ maa Pita Jisas kat kwutaa kalilaa Jisas waa nyaangɨt kat kai walaa vɨtɨk walaa wandɨ.
41008033	Pita wandɨ maa Jisas lɨmbalagulaa ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba kat vɨlaa Pita kat vɨtɨk walaa wandɨ. Seten wun kat kwagala waa wandɨ. Mɨn Godna maawupmba ana yelavɨtɨgamɨn. Mɨn ndinyanguna maawupmba yelavɨtɨgamɨn.
41008034	Nɨma sakwat nɨmbagwi ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba kat yagwa walaa ndi kat wandɨ. Kɨta nyan wuna kwupmba yavat wandeyan ndɨna maawuk kat kai waigandɨ. Ndɨna mbangɨ kat kai walaa diwai kros kwutaa nyaambupmba walalaa kaliweya vla ndɨno kwutuwa njɨvwa kwukiyandɨ. Wuna kwupmba yavat wa nɨmba kwutɨwa njɨvwa ndino kwukiyandi.
41008035	Kɨta nyan ndɨna mbangɨ mɨna yelavɨka kwunatndeyan kavle yigiyandɨ. Kɨta nyan ndɨna mbangɨ mɨna yelavɨtapman wuna njɨvwa kwuka wan apma nyaangɨt mbutndeyan wan nyan apma vat tɨgiyandɨ.
41008036	Kɨta nyan kɨpmana kwanda kwanda nda aywaa klalaa kavle vat yiga yetɨndeya vak klandeyan apma vatna? Kai. Apma vat ana ndɨ waa wandɨ.
41008037	Apma vak yetɨndeya vak kak wenga anda sakwat kwilaa klaigandɨ. Wenga kai.
41008038	Mbambala lɨga nɨmba kavle vat yetɨlɨgandi. God kat kai walɨgandi. Kɨta nyan wunai waa apma nyaangɨt wan kavle nɨmba kat mbupmak kat ndɨna mbangɨ wup yindeyan ngɨni ndɨ kat wuna mbangɨ wup yigiyandɨ. Wuna nyaek wandɨ mala enselonala yaigowun. Apma vat tɨga yaigowun. Yaweya njɨmblamba wun kat wup yila nɨmba kat ndi kat wup yigiyowun.
41009001	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Wumba lɨga nat nɨmba God kwondumba vɨga lɨgiyaa vak vɨgiyangwuk. Ana tat kiyaigangwuk. Vɨlaa tɨga lɨga kiyaigangwuk waa wandɨ.
41009002	Nandinya sɨla kɨta yindɨ maa Jisas Pita Jems Jon kat nduwiat kalindɨ. Nduwimba kapma lɨndi maa ndɨ kat vɨlɨndi maa Jisasna mbangɨ mandɨk vak tɨndɨ.
41009003	Ndɨna waavwi nya vla sɨlɨndɨ. Njanginjeya waavwi sawun mɨna lɨgandɨ. Jisasna waavwi sawun ava vla lɨndɨ.
41009004	Tɨga lɨga Ilaijagwi moseso Jisas kat ngambulɨmbɨk mala vɨndi.
41009005	Vɨndi maa Pita Jisas kat wandɨ. Sɨmagaga lɨga nyan, tɨnan apma vatna. yisombale kuvuk kwutneyan kwowa? Mɨn kat kɨta Moses kat kɨta Ilaija kat kɨta kwukiyanɨn waa wandɨ.
41009006	Nɨma vaatɨnjangat angamak waigowun waa yelavɨtaa kwo wandɨ.
41009007	Mbaw ndi kat yaa pagwundɨ. God mbaw nɨndɨmba lɨga ndi kat wandɨ. Ndɨ wuna nyana. Ndɨ kat solat sɨga lɨgowun. Ndɨ kat awut waa wandɨ God.
41009008	Wandɨ maa nat nyan tapman Jisas kapma lɨndangat kwaka vɨlɨndi.
41009009	Nduwimba lɨga ndailɨndi maa Jisas ndi kat walɨndɨ. Vɨngwa vak kat nat nyan kat wata ke mbuka. Wun Godna vak sɨmogwi lɨga nyan wun. Kiyalaa laakwun maa mbambala vɨngwa vak kat mbukiyangwuk waa wandɨ.
41009010	Wupma ana mbutndi. Avla ngambundi. Kiyalaa laakiyowun wanda nyaangɨk kat avla wagalaga ngambulɨndi.
41009011	Jisas kat wagalaga wandi. Nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nɨmba Ilaija tat yaigandɨ ngɨni Kraist yaigandɨ waa walɨgandi waa wandi. Manda kat wupma walɨgandi waa wandi.
41009012	Ndi kat wandɨ. Kwowa Ilaija yambɨ kwunapmak tata yandɨ. Wun Godna vak sɨmogwi lɨga nyan wun kat kavle vat yetɨnjeya vak kat wun kat kai wanjeya vak kat tamba manda kat pɨlɨwutndi waa wandɨ.
41009013	Ngwuk kak wowun. Ilaija tamba yandɨ maa ndina maawupmba la vapmba ndɨ kat yindi. Ndinai ya vak kat tamba pɨlɨwutndi.
41009014	Jisasna kwupmba la nat nɨmba ta kavat aynat nɨmba yindi maa nɨma sakwat nɨmba Jisasna kwupmba la nat nɨmba la kavamba lɨndi. Moses kwiya lo sɨmogwi lɨga nɨmba Jisasna kwupmba la nat nɨmba kat kwundimba waliyavat tɨndi.
41009015	Wan nɨmba sakwat nɨmba Jisas kat vɨlaa nolin ngwandɨga ndɨnai lɨga kava ndɨ kat ngambuvat yindi.
41009016	Jisas ndɨna mbaapmamba la nɨmba kat wandɨ. Manda vatna ngambulɨngwa waa wandɨ.
41009017	Kɨta nyan wandɨ. Sɨmagaga lɨga nyan, wuna nondayan mɨn kat kiyawun. Tɨgat kulumata waagan ndɨ kat tavilɨndɨ.
41009018	Waagan ndɨ kat tavilɨndɨ maa kɨpmamba ndalaa man taamba satega kwundi ngu ngaanga ngu ndalaa nɨmbi ngliaka lɨndɨ waa wandɨ. Mɨna kwupmba la nɨmba kat wowun. Savɨlɨ wowun. Ana alɨpsɨga savɨlɨndi waa wandɨ. Jisas wandɨ. Ngwuk ngwula mbangɨ wiyo waavi laagalapman nɨmba ngwuk. Wungi kat tɨga ana savɨlɨngwuk.
41009019	Anda sakwat nandinya tɨga ngwuk kat sɨmagaga mbutiwun mala ngwula mbangɨ wiyo waavi taagagiyandɨ. Angambala nandinya wun tɨga ngwula mbangɨ kɨlɨpangɨ yinda vak kat mbukiyowun. Wan nyan kat kwutaa wun kat agiya wandɨ.
41009020	Ndɨ kat mat nyan kiyandi maa waagan Jisas kat vɨlaa mat nyan kat kwutndɨ maa kɨpmamba ndandɨ. Kɨpmamba ndalaa paaka lɨga kwundi ngu ngaanga ngu ndalɨndɨ.
41009021	Jisas mat nyana nyaek kat wagalandɨ. nandinya anda sakwat ngi vat yilɨndɨ waa wagalandɨ. Wagalandɨ, wandɨ. Mat nyan tɨndɨ ngi vak mɨna yilɨndɨ waa wandɨ nyaek.
41009022	Waagan nɨma sakwat njamba ndɨ kat kwutaa yamba yaagilɨndɨ. Nɨma sakwat njamba ndɨ kat kwutaa ngumba yaagilɨndɨ. Vatnyavak yaagilɨndɨ. An kat miwa ay. Alɨpsɨga kwunapmak tɨmeyan ndɨ kat kwunak.
41009023	Jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ. Manda kat alɨpsɨga kwunapmeyan waa wamɨn. Mbangɨ wiyo waavi taakalɨga nyan nɨma njɨvwa kwutapman nda? waa waigandɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41009024	Nyaek yawiga waga Jisas kat wandɨ. Mɨn kat wuna mbangɨ wiyo waavi samat samat taagalɨngandɨ. Wuna mbangɨ kɨlɨpangɨ yilɨnda vak kat kwunak waa wandɨ.
41009025	Nɨma sakwat nɨmba yisolaa lɨnjangat Jisas vɨlaa waagan kat wandɨ. Mɨn tɨgat kulumaka waan tɨvɨla lɨga waagan mɨn ndɨ kat kwagala. Nat njamba ke taviga waa nɨma kwundimba wandɨ.
41009026	Waagan kɨselaa ndɨ kat kwutndɨ maa man taamba satnedɨ maa ndɨ kat kwagalandɨ vɨlaa tamba kiyandɨ waa wandi.
41009027	Jisas ndɨ kat taambamba kwutaa katsondɨ maa laatndɨ.
41009028	Jisas ngay wuleindɨ maa ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba ndɨ kat kpma kavamba wagalandi. Manda kat tamba ndɨ kat savɨlɨlapman yinɨn waa wagalandi.
41009029	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. God kat wakalalapman yilɨngweyan wungi vak waagan kat ana savɨlɨgiyangwuk waa wandɨ.
41009030	Wan kava kwagalalaa Galili walɨnja kavamba lɨga kwagalalaa yinda vak kat nat nɨmba vɨvak kat kai wandɨ. Ndɨna mbaapmamba la nɨmba kat kapma lɨga ndi kat sɨmogwivat wandɨ.
