41009031	Ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba kat sɨmagaga wandɨ. Wun Godna vak sɨmogwi lɨga nyan wun kat ngɨni nɨma sakwat nɨmba kwutaa vatnyagiyandi. Vatnyandi maa nandinya kuvut tɨga laakiyowun waa wandɨ.
41009032	Ndɨnai waa nyaangɨk kat Jisas kat wagalvak kat ndina tɨpmwi wup yindɨ.
41009033	Kapaneam wuleilaa ngay wuleindi maa Jisas ndi kat wagalandɨ. Ava yambɨmba manda vatna ngambulɨngwa waa wandɨ.
41009034	Ngɨni anda nyana nɨna nɨma nyanat tɨga nat nɨmba kat vɨga lɨgiyaa waa ngambulaa ndɨna nyaangɨt kat ndina mbangɨ wup yiga na awat wandi.
41009035	Jisas ndaalɨga tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk nɨmba kat yagwa walaa ndi kat wandɨ. God waa apma nyaangɨtmba wandɨ. Kɨta nyan nɨndɨ vaalamba ndaalɨga nyan tɨga vla lɨndeyan God ndɨ kat yelavɨkiyandɨ. Ndɨ njambwi nyan ana ndɨ waa yelavɨkiyandɨ. Kɨta nyan avla ndɨna sɨ kwusoga walapman yiga nat nɨmbana njɨvwa kwutndyeyan God ndɨ kat yelavɨkiyandɨ. Wan nyan njambwi nyana waa yelavɨkiyandɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41009036	Mat nyan kwutaa ndina nɨndɨmba valagalaa taambamba kwutaa katsolaa wandɨ.
41009037	Kɨta nyan wungi vat mat nyan kat wuna sɨ waga kwunatndeyan ndɨna njɨvwa wuna lak yaigandɨ. Kapma wuna lak ana yaigandɨ. Wun kat ay waa nyan kat yaigandɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41009038	Jon Jisas kat wandɨ. Sɨmaga lɨga nyan, kɨta nyan mɨna sɨ waga waagan savɨlɨndɨ. Savɨlɨnda vak kat vɨlaa ndɨ kat kai wanɨn. Nɨna mbaapma ana yetɨlɨgamɨn walaa kai wanɨn.
41009039	Jisas wandɨ. Kai ke waga. Kɨta nyan wuna sɨ waga nɨma njɨvwa kwutndeyan ngɨni wun kat kavle nyaangɨt ana mbukiyandɨ waa wandɨ.
41009040	Mɨn kat kai walapman nɨmba nɨna mbaapmamba lɨ vla lɨgandi.
41009041	Ngwuk kat wowun. Kraistna mbaapmamba lɨngwangat ngwuk kat kɨlɨnja ngu kwinjeyan awat apma vat wunamba klaigandi.
41009042	Kɨngi vat mat nyana wun kat yelavɨtnda vak kat nat nyan kai wandɨ maa wun kat kwagalalaa yindeyan wan ana nglaatndɨ. Wan kai waa nyan kat kambak yaawumba ndɨna kwapmba tulaa ngumba yiga yaagɨnjeyan apma vatna.
41009043	-
41009044	Kɨta nyana taambamba kwutaa kavle njɨvwa ndɨna maawupmba lɨga apma vak kat kwulatndeyan taamba kalɨka tɨgandɨ. Taamba lapman apma kavat yindeyan wovuna. Apma tamba lɨga kavle kava ya vɨtɨga kavat yindeyan kavle vatna.
41009045	-
41009046	Kɨta nyan kavle kavat mamba yilaa wan kavamba kavle njɨvwa kwutnda njɨvwa ndɨna maawupmba lɨga apma vak kat kwulatndeyan man kalɨkiyandɨ. Sambɨn tɨga apma kavat yindeyan apma vatna. Man apma vat tɨndɨ kavle kava ya vɨtɨga kavat yindeyan kavle vatna.
41009047	Kɨta nyan mɨnimba vɨnda kavle vat ndɨna maawupmba lɨga apma vak kat kwulatndeyan mɨn pɨnguka yaagigiyandɨ. Mɨni lapman kɨta naanga mɨnimba vɨga apma kavat yindeyan apma vatna. Mɨni vɨli apa apma vat tɨmbɨk kavle kava ya vɨtɨga kavat yindeyan ana nglaatndɨ.
41009048	Wan kavamba ya vɨtɨga vak ana ngɨlɨgiyandɨ. Wan kavamba ngak kawiya sɨm kɨlɨnda vak ana ngɨlɨgiyandɨ.
41009049	-
41009050	Njangu veivat yiga ndamba sol taakandi, sol kwunakiyandɨ. Ngɨni sol taagalɨnja vak vla God ngwuk kat yamba kwunakiyandɨ. Sol apma nda. Solna nyingi yilɨga vat ngɨlɨndɨ maa ngɨni mandamba kwunakiyangwuk. Ngwuta lak yigumba alɨ ngwula. Sol taagalɨnja wimbu vla apma vat tɨgiyangwuk. Ngwuk yigumba kɨtamba lɨgiyangwuk. Yakwa nɨmba lɨga vak vla alɨ ngwula.
41010001	Wan kava kwagalalaa Judia yindɨ. Jodana nat naangat valigendɨ. Nɨma sakwat nɨmba ndɨ kat yaa yisolaa lɨndi. Yisolaa lɨndi maa ndinai waa vapmba sɨmagaga mbutɨndɨ.
41010002	Nat Ferisi ndɨ kat mandɨp mandɨp vat wagalavat yandi. Kɨta nyan ndɨna taagwa kwagalandeyan kwowa? Waa wagalandi.
41010003	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Moses angamak ngwuk kat wandɨ waa wandɨ.
41010004	Wandɨ, wandi. Moses wandɨ. Kɨta nyan ndɨna taagwa kat kwagalavat wandeyan lavunga pɨlɨwutaa kwagalagiyandɨ waa wandɨ Moses waa wandi.
41010005	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Ngwulai kai walɨga vak kat tɨga wupma Moses wan nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutndɨ waa wandɨ.
41010006	Tamba God aywaa kwutndɨ. Ndu taagwa kwutndɨ.
41010007	Wungi kat tɨga kɨta nyan ndɨna nyaek nyɨmena ngay kwagalalaa taagwa klaigandɨ.
41010008	Nduwo tagwo kɨta vatna lɨgiyambɨk. Ngɨni kapma vak ana lɨgiyambɨk.
41010009	God kɨta vak tɨmbeya vak kat kwutndɨ maa taagwa kwagalalaa mandɨp mandɨp kavat ay waa ke waga waa wandɨ.
41010010	Ngay wuleindi maa Jisasna kwupmba la nɨmba ndɨ kat ndɨnai waa nyaangɨk kat nat njambɨ wagalandi.
41010011	Ndi kat wandɨ. Kɨta nyan ndɨna taagwa kwagalalaa ngɨni nat taagwa klandeyan sɨkwuka wandgɨlɨgandɨ. Wangɨlɨndangat kwagalanda taagwa kat kavle vat yilɨgandɨ waa wandɨ.
41010012	Kɨta lagwa lɨla lan kat kwagalalaa ngɨni nat lan klaleyan sɨkwuka wangɨlɨgalɨ. Wangɨlɨlangat kwagalalaa lan kat kavle vat yilɨgalɨ waa wandɨ.
41010013	Mat nyangu kat Jisas taamba taagandangat ndɨ kat kiyandi. Kiyandi maa Jisasna kwupmba la nɨmba kat nɨma kwundimba walendi.
41010014	Jisas walenja vak vɨlaa ndi kat nɨma vak walega wandɨ. Mat nyangu wun kat yaandi. Ndi kat kai waa ke waga. God vɨga lɨga vapmba ndi kat vɨga lɨgandɨ waa wandɨ.
41010015	Ngwuk kat wowun. Kɨta nyan mat nyan kwo klanja vak vla God kwigiyaa vat klandeyan God tɨga kavat wuleigiyandɨ. Mat nyan klanja vak vla klavak kat kai wandeyan ana klaigandɨ.
41010016	Jisas mat nyan kat kwutaa ndaawamba laagalaa taamba laagalaa ndi kat apma nyaangɨt wandɨ.
41010017	Wan kava kwagalavat yilɨndɨ maa kɨta nyan ndɨ kat yalaa kwalimamba vaselaa ndɨ kat wagalandɨ. Apma sɨmaga lɨga nyan, ngɨlɨlapman apma vat yetɨweya vak klavak kak angamak kwuikiyowun waa wagalandɨ.
41010018	Jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ. Manda kat wun kat apma nyan waa wamɨn. Apma nyan ana lɨgandɨ. God mɨna apma nyana waa wandɨ.
41010019	God tamba waa nyaangɨt tamba wupmɨn waa wandɨ Jisas. Ndinyangu kat ke vatnyaga, nat nyana taagwa kat ke wangɨlɨga, ke sɨkwuka, woseka ke waga, woseka waga ke klaga, nyaek nyɨme kat yigumba kwunaka yetɨ. Aywaa wupmɨn waa wandɨ Jisas.
41010020	Jisas wandɨ maa kwandɨ nyan wandɨ. Sɨmaga lɨga nyan, mat nyan tɨga wupma wama nyaangɨtmba wuka yetɨlɨwun waa wandɨ.
41010021	Jisas ndɨ kat vɨga miwa yiga wandɨ. Kɨta vak kwagalamɨn. Mɨna kwanda kwanda nda yiga wenga klalaa kwo lɨga nɨmbagat agwi. kwimeyan nyɨnangwupmba lɨga mɨna kwanda kwanda nda nɨma sakwat tɨgiyandɨ. Kwilaa wuna kwupmba yagwa waa wandɨ.
41010022	Jisas waa nyaangɨt wutaa ndɨna kwanda kwanda nda nɨma sakwat tɨndangat nambu njɨnjwenga nolin ngwandɨlapman yindɨ.
41010023	Jisas lɨmbalaguga ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba kat vɨlaa wandɨ. Nɨma sakwat kwanda kwanda ndo lɨga nɨmba God vɨga lɨga kavat wuleivat nɨma njɨvwa waa wandɨ.
41010024	Ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba wutaa ngɨpaliga ndandi. Jisas ndi kat nat njambɨ wandɨ. Ngwuk wuna nyangu ngwuk, God vɨga lɨga kavat wuleivat nɨma njɨvwa waa wandɨ.
41010025	Kamel kumbwi mbawna yambɨ wleivat yindeyan nɨma njɨvwa. Nɨma sakwat kwanda kwanda ndo lɨga nyan God vɨga lɨga kavat wuleivat yindeyan nɨma nglei njɨvwa waa wandɨ Jisas.
41010026	Wutaa nɨma vat ngɨpaliga ndalaa wandi. Kandana God vɨga lɨga kavat wuleigiyaa. God anda nyan kat apma vak kwunakiyandɨ waa wandi.
41010027	Jisas ndi kat vɨlaa wandɨ. Ndinyangu nat nɨmba kat kwutaa God vɨga lɨga kavat ana kaligiyandi. Wan Godna njɨvwa. Ndɨ alɨpsɨga kaligiyandɨ. Ndɨ nɨma nglei njɨvwa alɨpsɨga kwukiyandɨ.
41010028	Pita Jisas kat wandɨ. Nɨma nda kat kai waga kwagalalaa mɨna kwupmba yanɨn waa wandɨ.
41010029	-
41010030	Jisas wandɨ. Ngwuk kak wowun. Woseka ana wowun. Kɨta nyan wunagwi wunai waa apma nyaagɨk kat tɨga ndɨna ngay, nyamwun, nyange, nyaek, nyɨme, nyan, ngepma, kwagalandeyan mandɨk ngay, nyamwun, nyange, nyaek, nyɨme, nyan, ngepma, ndumi tambanat mbambala kaligandɨ. Ndɨ kat nɨma vat yinjeya vat apma kalaigandɨ. Yaiga nandinyamba ngɨlɨlapman apma vat yetɨndeya vak klaigandɨ waa wandɨ.
41010031	Wan kɨpmana yetɨla nat nɨma sakwat ndo lɨga nɨmba God vɨga lɨga yetɨla nat kwo la nɨmba God vɨga lɨga kavat wuleilaa njambwi nɨmbat tɨgiyandi.
41010032	Jerusalem yilɨnja ava yambɨmba lɨga Jisas tata yindɨ. Ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba ndɨnai waa nyaagɨt kat ngɨpaliga yalɨndi. Nat nɨma sakwat kwupmba yalaa nɨmba ndɨnai waa nyaangɨt kat vaatɨndi. Wan tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk kat yagwa walaa wun kat yinjeya vak kat ngwuk kat mbutu wandɨ.
41010033	Awut. Nɨn Jerusalem wokelɨganɨn. God kat walɨga njambwi nyanguagwi nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nɨmbo wun ndinyanguna nyan wun kat kwutaa kiyandi walaa Juda ana ndi nat nɨmba kat kaligiyandi waa wandɨ.
41010034	Wun kat kwusɨlɨga kasega sɨpmiya saga yaawmba viyalɨtaa vatnyagiyandi. Vatnyandi maa nandinya kuvut tɨga laakiyowun waa wandɨ.
41010035	Sebidina nyan Jemsagwi Jono Jisas kat yalaa wambɨt. Sɨmaga lɨga nyan nɨn kat kɨta njɨvwa kwupmangat walieyan kwukiyamɨn? E? Kai? waa wambɨt.
41010036	Jisas mbɨk kat wandɨ. Angamak kwukwangat wambɨt waa wandɨ.
41010037	Wandɨ maa wambɨt. Ndinyangu kat vɨga lɨvat ndalɨmeyan ana nat nyan yaagindan naangamba nat nyan ambugendan naangamba ndalɨvat waga waa wambɨt.
41010038	Jisas mbɨk kat wandɨ. Wagalamba vak kat mbɨtna maawut ana yelavɨtɨgambɨk. Wun kat nɨma vat yinjeyan wuna lak kwaigambɨk? Wun kat yinjeya nɨma vak mbɨk kat ygiyand? waa wandɨ.
41010039	Wandɨ, wambɨk. Awa kwowa wambɨt. Wambɨk, Jisas mbɨk kat wandɨ. Wun kat nɨma vat yinjeyan wuna lak kwaigambɨt. Wun kat yinjeya nɨma vapmba mbɨk kat yigiyandi waa wandɨ.
41010040	Yaagindan naangamba ambugendan naangamba ndalɨmbangat mbɨk kat kwondu ana kwigiyowun. Wuna nda ana ndɨ. God wungi nyan kat vɨsɨmogwigiyandɨ.
41010041	Nat tamba vɨli nɨmba mbɨtna nyaangɨt wutaa Jemsagwi Jon kat walendi.
41010042	Jisas ndi kat yagwa walaa wandɨ. Wan kɨpmamba la njambwi nɨmba nat nɨmba kat mandɨp mandɨp vapmba vɨga lɨgandi. Nɨma kwonduo lɨga vɨga lɨgandi. Wupma vɨlɨgangwuk.
41010043	Ngwuk wungivat wata kwutɨngweya. Kɨta nyan nɨma nyan tɨvat wandeyan ndɨna sɨ viyesandalaa nat nɨmbana njɨvwa kwukiyandɨ.
41010044	Kɨta nyan njambwi nyana lɨvat wandeyan aywaa nat nɨmbana njɨvwa kwutɨga nyana tɨgiyandɨ.
41010045	Wun Godna vak sɨmogwi lɨga nyan wuna njɨvwa nat nɨmba kwutnjangat ana yawun. Ndi kat tɨga njɨvwa kwupmak yawun. Kwo luwa vat kwagalalaa kiyalaa nat nɨmba kat tɨga wenga kwivat yawun.
41010046	Jeriko walɨnja ngepma wuleilaa kwagalagɨvaa yindi. Ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmbagwi nat nɨma sakwat nɨmbo apma yindi. Yindi maa mɨni kiyaa nyan Timiasna nyan Batimias wagalaga walelɨga nyan waambu ava yambɨmba lɨndɨ.
41010047	Nasaretna nyan Jjsas yanda yak kat wutaa walega wandɨ. Jisas Devitna nyan wun kat miwa ay waa walega wandɨ.
41010048	Nɨma sakwat nɨmba ndi kat kai waa kiya awa waa wandi. Ndina kwundi wutapman wata nɨma kwundimba walelɨndɨ. Devitna nyan wun kat miwa ay mɨla walelɨndɨ.
41010049	Walelɨndɨ mala Jisas wuka yiga tolalɨga wandɨ. Ndɨ kat yagwa awa wandɨ. Wandɨ, mɨni kiyaa nyan kat ndɨ kat ke yelavɨka mɨn kat yagwa walɨgandɨ waa wandi. Laataa yagwa wandi.
41010050	Ndɨnai kambuga la waavwi lapmega kwagalalaa laataa Jisas kat yandɨ.
41010051	Jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ. Mɨn kat angamak yiwangat wamɨn waa wandɨ. Mɨni kiyaa nyan ndɨ kat wandɨ. Njambwi nyan, wuna mɨni kwunapmak kak wowun.
41010052	Jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ. Mɨn ay wandɨ. Mɨna maawupmba yelavɨpma vat, mɨna mbangɨ wiyo waavi taagalɨga vak mɨna mɨni tamba kwunatndɨ waa wandɨ. Wandɨ, apma mɨni vɨlaa Jisasna kwupmba yindɨ.
41011001	Jerusalem ngwaymba lɨga Betfasi Betani walɨnja ngepma vɨlɨlɨkmba lɨndi. Oliv walɨnja mi ta duwi lɨndi maa Jisas ndɨna kwupmba la vɨlɨlɨk palɨ kat tata ay waa wandɨ.
41011002	Nat naangamba lɨga ngepma yiga valɨge mbɨla. Ngepma wuleilaa nyan donki yaawmba tulaa lɨndɨ, vɨgiyambɨt. Ndalɨlapman yilɨnja donki. Ndɨ kat yaaw sɨvugilaa agiya.
41011003	Kɨta nyan kat mandana yilɨmba wandeyan awamba mbɨt. Nɨma nyan klavat wandɨ waa awamba mbɨt. Ngɨni awat kwigiyandɨ waa awamba mbɨt waa wandɨ Jisas.
41011004	Wupma yɨmbɨt. Waambu ava yambɨmba lɨga ndaamangemba tunja donki kat vɨlaa sɨvugimbɨt.
41011005	Sɨvugimbɨt maa wumba la nɨmba mbɨk kat wandi. Mandana donki kat sɨvugilɨgambɨt waa wandi.
41011006	Jisas klavat wandɨ waa wambɨt maa kwowa kali wandi.
41011007	Jisas kat donki kiyambɨt maa ndina waavwi donkina mbunimba taagandi, Jisas ndalɨndɨ.
41011008	Nɨma sakwat nɨmba ndɨna alagumba la waavwi ava yambɨmba taagandi. Nat nɨmba kwapɨmba kalɨtnja ngaangawi la mi sandɨ taagandi.
41011009	Tata yilɨga nɨmbagwi kwupmba yilɨga nɨmbo kɨselaga wandi. Wovun nglei yamɨn. God yaiya vatna wugɨn yaa nyan mɨn kat nɨma tɨmangat wanɨn waa kɨselandi.
41011010	Nɨna ngwat Devit vɨga la apma vak yaiqandɨ. Apma nglei vatna waa kɨselandi.
41011011	Jerusalem wuleilaa Godna ngay wuleindɨ. Ta nda vɨlaa ngan ndaivat yindɨ maa ndɨna tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk nɨmbonala Betaniat yindi.
41011012	Nat nandinya Betanɨmba lɨga yandi maa Jisas kat wundɨ yilɨndɨ.
41011013	Sɨvlamba lɨga fik walɨnja ngaanga la mi vɨndɨ. Vɨlaa sɨgɨpmak yindɨ. Yalaa ngaanga mɨna vɨndɨ. Sɨt kwala njɨmbla ana ndɨ.
41011014	Mi kat wandɨ. Nat njambɨ ngɨnɨ kɨta nyan mɨna sɨk ana kɨgiyandɨ waa wanda vak ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba wutndi.
41011015	Jerusalem wuleindi maa Jisas Godna ngay wuleilaa wenga klala la nɨmba kat savɨlɨndɨ. Nat nɨmba lavunga klalaa sanya kwila nɨmba. Ndina njamba kwuselɨtndɨ. Namiyo wenga kwila nɨmbana tɨgɨt kwuselɨtndɨ.
41011016	Godna ngaymba lɨga kɨta nda kwutaa kiyalɨnjangat Jisas kai wandɨ.
41011017	Ndi kat sɨmagaga mbuka wandɨ. Tamba God waa nyaangɨt Pɨlɨwutndi. God wandɨ. Wuna ngay ngepma ngepmana nɨmba God kat ngambunjeya ngaya tɨgiyandɨ waa wandɨ God waa tamba pɨlɨwutndi. Sɨkwutɨga nɨmbana ngay vla lɨndangat yingwuk waa wandɨ Jisas.
41011018	Wan nɨma sakwat nɨmba Jisas waa nyaangɨt wutaa ngɨpaliga ndandi. Wungi kat tɨga God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmbagwi nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nɨmbo Jisas kat vaaka ndɨ kat vatnyavat yelavɨtndi.
41011019	Ngan ndandɨ maa Jisas ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmbanala wan ngepma kwagalandi.
41011020	Ngambi fik walɨnja mi tamba lɨga wundangat vɨgɨvaa yindi. Sandɨ, nɨndɨ, njingwut aywaa lɨga wundɨ.
41011021	Pita wumbayambɨ yelavɨtaa wandɨ. Njambwi nyan kavle yigaandɨ wamɨn fik walɨnja mi tamba lɨga wundɨ waa wandɨ.
41011022	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. God kat ngwula mbangɨ wiyo waavi taaga waa wandɨ.
41011023	Ngwuk kat wowun. Kɨta nyan ndɨna mbangɨ God kat wiyo waavi taagandeyan wan nduwi kat nguat wokendangat wandeyan yigiyandɨ. Ngwula mbangɨ kɨlɨpangɨ yilapman yindeyan wangweya vat tɨgiyandɨ.
41011024	Wungigat tɨga ngwuk kat wowun. God kat wagalangweyan klangwangat ngwula mbangɨ wɨyo waavi taakandeyan klaigangwuk waa wandɨ.
41011025	God kat waga lɨngweyan nat nyan kat waleya vak kat kai waa ngwaat vla sɨga kwunak. Ngwaat vla sɨga kwunakngweyan ngwula nyɨnangwupmba lɨga nyaek ngwuk kak ngwaak vla sɨga kwunakiyandɨ.
41011026	Nat nyan mɨn kat kavle vat yinda vak kat ngwaat vla sɨga kwunatapman yingweyan ngwula nyɨnangwupmba lɨga nyaek ngwuk kat ngwaat vla sɨga ana kwunakiyandɨ.
41011027	Nat njambɨ Jerusalem wuleilaa Godna ngay wuleilaa veiga ngaga yalɨndɨ maa God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmbagwi nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nɨmbo Judana ngwatna Jisas kat yalaa walɨndi.
41011028	Mɨhai kwutɨga njɨvwa anda kwondumba kwutɨgamɨn. Kwupmangat kwondu kandana kwiya waa wagalandi.
41011029	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Ngwuk kak kɨta nda wagalagiyowun. Awat wangweyan wunai kwutɨga kwondu kat ngwuk kak waigowun waa wandɨ Jisas.
41011030	Jon ndinyangu kat yagunda kwondu ndinyangunamba klandɨ? E? Godnamba klandɨ? Wun kat awa wandɨ.
41011031	Avla ngambundɨ. Godnamba klandɨ waa waneyan nɨn kat wagalagiyahdɨ. Manda kat ndɨna maawut klalapman yingwuk waa waigandɨ waa ngambundi.
41011032	Ndinyangunamba klandɨ waa waneyan wan nɨma sakwat nɨmba nɨn kat kai waigandi. Wan nɨma sakwat nɨmba wupma yelavɨtndi. Jon God waa nyaangɨt ngambundɨ waa yelavɨtndi.
41011033	Wupma Jisas kat wandi. Nɨn ana yelavɨk lɨganɨn waa wandi. Wandi, Jisas wandɨ Wupma ngwuk kak wunai kwutɨga kwondu kat ana waigowun waa wandɨ.
41012001	Jisas ndi kat pagwuga la wupuseputmba mbutndɨ. Kɨta nyan glep watɨga ambugava kwutndɨ. Way ambugava tɨvwi kaambapmba kwutndɨ. Glep veinginyanjeyan waangu valaa ambugava kat vɨga lɨgiyaa sɨvla mbundɨ ngay kwutndɨ. Ambugava vɨgak lɨgiyaa nɨmba taagandɨ. Ndinai vɨga lɨgiyaa njɨvwa kat nat glep klaigandi. Ndi kat taagalaa nata ngepmat yindɨ.
41012002	Glep sɨkɨt njɨmbla lɨndɨ maa ndɨna njɨvwa kwutɨga nyan kat ambugavat ay wandɨ.
41012003	Ambugavamba wata nat glep klavak kak ay wandɨ. Ambugava yandɨ maa ndɨ kat kemaka kwutaa yiyandi. Glep klavat yindɨ, savɨlɨndi.
41012004	Nat njambɨ nat njivwa kwutɨga nyan kat ay wandɨ. Yindɨ maa ndɨ kat nambumba viyalaa kavle vat yindi.
41012005	Nat njambɨ nat kɨta nyan kat ay wandɨ maa yindɨ. Yandɨ maa ndɨ kat vatnyandi. Nat nɨmba nɨma sakwat ngivat sɨgɨt. Nat nɨmba viyandi. Nat nɨmba vatnyandi.
41012006	Vatnyandi maa nat kɨta nyan mɨna lɨndɨ. Ndɨna nyana. Ndɨna nyan kat ambugavat ay wandɨ. Wuna nyan kat ana kavle yigiyandi waa maawupmba yelavɨtaa ay wandɨ.
41012007	Ndɨna nyan ambukava yandɨ maa vɨga lɨga nɨmba avla wandi. Wan nyan ambugava ngɨni klaiga nyana. Kan nyan kat vatnyalaa ambugava nɨna lak klaiganɨn waa wandi.
41012008	Ndɨ kat kwutaa vatnyalaa ndɨna sɨm mbuni lɨvwimba yaagindi.
41012009	Ambugava kwutna nyan vatnya nɨmba kat angamak yigiyandɨ waa wandɨ Jisas. Ndi kat vatnyalaa nat nɨmba kat ambugava kwigiyandɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41012010	Tamba God waa pɨliwutnja nyaangɨt wukngwuk? Wupma pɨlɨwutndi. Ngay kwuta nɨmba tat yaaginja kaambak ngɨni tagumba laagandi, lɨndɨ. Tɨga njambwi kaambaknat tɨndɨ.
41012011	Wan vak God kwukna vatna. Kwutndɨ maa vɨlaa ngɨpaliga ndalaa apma vatna waa walɨganɨn waa pɨlɨwutndi.
41012012	Jisas wan nyaangɨt wandɨ maa Judana njambwi nɨmba yelavɨtndi. Wanda nyaangɨt nɨn kat nɨma vat wavat wandɨ waa yelavɨtndɨ. Wungi kat tɨga Jisas kat kwutaa vatnyavat wandi. Wan nɨma sakwat nɨmba kat vaataa Jisas kat ana kwutndi.
41012013	Nat Ferisi walɨnja nɨmbagwi Herotna kwupmba la nɨmba kat ndi kat Jisas ta kavat ay wandi. Wandi, ndɨnai waa nyaangɨk kat kavle yigaandɨ walaa ndɨ kat yindi.
41012014	Yalaa Jisas kat wandi. Sɨmogwi liga nyan, mɨn woseka walapman vapmba yetɨlɨgamɨn. Mɨn mandɨp vapmba ana yilɨgamɨn waa wandi. Aywa ndinyangu kat kɨta vapmba yilɨgamɨn. Ndinyangu yetɨlɨga vapmba ana yetɨlɨgamɨn. Godna vak mɨna sɨmogwiga walɨgamɨn. Njambwi nyan, king Sisa kat takis sanya yaagineya vat kwowa? Yaagigiyanɨn? E? Ana yaagigiyanɨn? waa Jisas kat wagalandi.
41012015	Jisas ndi kat mandɨp mandɨp vak kat vɨlaa ndi kat wandɨ. Wun kat manda kat wupma yilɨgangwuk. Sanya wun kat agiya vɨgiyowun waa wandɨ.
41012016	Sanya kɨta kiyandi maa ndi kat wandɨ. Kandana mɨndama kandana sɨ kan waa wandɨ Jisas. Ndɨ kat wandi. King Sisana mɨndama ndɨna so sanyamba kwaa wandi.
41012017	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. King Sisana nda ndɨ kat kwigiyangwuk. Godna nda ndɨ kat kwigiyangwuk waa wandɨ. Wandɨ, wanda nyaangɨt wutaa ngɨga ndandi.
41012018	Sadyusi walɨnja nɨmba kiyaa nyan ngɨni ana laakiyandɨ wala nɨmba ndi. Jisas kat yalaa wagalandi.
41012019	Sɨmogwi lɨga nyan, tak Moses pɨlɨwutndɨ. Nyamwun taagwa klalaa nyan njantapman kiyandɨ, swambu klaigandɨ. Klalaa nyan njangiyandɨ waa pɨlɨwutndɨ Moses waa wandi.
41012020	Yakwa ndu sɨla vɨli tɨndi waa wandi. Nyamwun nyan taagwa klandɨ. Kiyandɨ maa nyan kwutapman kwo lɨlɨ.
41012021	Ndɨna swambu nyan nyamwuna taagwa klandɨ. Klalaa kiyandɨ maa nyan kwutapman kwo lɨlɨ. Ndɨna swambu ngivat sɨgɨt.
41012022	Nat swambu aywaa ngivat sɨgɨt kiyandi maa taagwa nyan kwutapman kwo lɨlɨ. Ngɨni taagwa kiyalɨ
41012023	Ngɨni kiyaa nɨmba laatnjeyan at taagwa kana taagwat tɨgiyalɨ waa wandi. Wundi sɨla vɨli nyangua kɨta lagwamba klandi waa wandi.
41012024	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Ngwuk apma vak ana yelavɨtɨgangwuk. God waa nyaangɨt kat ana apma vat yelavɨtɨgangwuk. Ndɨna kwondu kat ana apma vat yelavɨtɨgangwuk.
41012025	Ngɨni kiyaa nɨmba laatnjeyan ndu ana taagwa klaigandi. Ensel yetɨga vak vla yetɨkiyandi.
41012026	Kiyaa nɨmba laakiyaa vak kat Moses tamba pɨlɨwutnda nyaangɨt ana vɨngwuk? Moses kaawa ya vla vɨtɨndɨ, vɨndɨ. Vɨlɨndɨ maa God ndɨ kat wandɨ. Wun Ebrahamna njambwi, Aisakna njambwi, Jekopna njambwi nyan wun waa wandɨ God.
41012027	God kiyaa nɨmbana njambwi nyan ana ndɨ. Kwo lɨga nɨmbana njambwi nyana God. Ngwuk wan hyaangɨk kat kavle maawut yelavɨka lɨgangwuk waa wandɨ Jisas.
41012028	Nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga kɨta nyan yalaa ndina kwundimba kao lɨnja vak kat wutaa Jisas apma vat wanda vak kat wutaa Jisas kat wagalandɨ. God kwiya njambwi vla lɨga nyaangɨt anda nyaangɨt njambwi lɨga waa wagalandɨ.
41012029	Jisas awat wandɨ. Njambwi kɨngiyan. Isrel walɨnja nɨmba awuk ngwula. God nɨna njambwi nyana. Nat nyan ana lɨgandɨ.
41012030	Ngwula njambwi nyan kat God kat maawupmba yelavɨka solat asɨ. Ndɨ kat maawupmba nolin ngwandɨ. Ndɨ kat mbangɨmba nolin ngwandɨ. Ndɨ kat mbangɨ kwondumba solat asɨ waa tamba pɨlɨwutndi waa wandɨ Jisas.
41012031	Kwupmba lɨga God waa nyaangɨt kɨngiyan. Avla nolin ngwandɨngwa vapmba nat nyan kai nolin ngwandɨgiyangwuk. Nat nyaangɨt njambwi kai kɨmbɨk kiyaambɨt waa wandɨ Jisas.
41012032	Nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nyan Jisas kat wandɨ. Apma vat wamɨn sɨmogwi lɨga nyan waa wandɨ. God kɨta lɨga vak kat ana woseka wamɨn. Ndɨha njambwi ana lɨgandɨ. Kapma lɨgandɨ waa wandɨ.
41012033	God kat maawupmba yelavɨka solat sɨnja vak, maawupmba nolin ngwandɨnja vak, mbangɨ kwondumba solat sɨnja vak, avla nolin ngwandɨga vapmba nat nyan kat nolin ngwandɨnja vak, aywaa apma nglei vatna. God kat kwunapmak yamba tuga kelonja vatnagwi God kat kwunapmak vatnyaga kwinja vak kat wan apma nglei vat kwulataa lɨgandi waa wandɨ.
41012034	Apma vat wanda vak Jisas wutaa wandɨ. Mɨnai waa vat God yelavɨtna vatnonala kɨta vak vla lɨgandɨ waa wandɨ. Wandɨ, nat nɨmba Jisas kat wagalavak kak kai wandi.
41012035	Jisas Godna ngaymba lɨga sɨmogwiga wandɨ. Nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nat nɨmba wupma walɨgandi. Kraist Devjtna mat nyana waa walɨgandi. Manda kat wupma walɨgandi waa wandɨ Jisas.
41012036	Godna waagan Devitna maawut ngwandɨndɨ maa wupma pɨlɨwutndɨ. Njambwi nyan God wuna njambwi nyan Kraist kat wandɨ. Wuna yaagindan naangamba ndaalɨ. Mɨn kat kao lɨga nɨmba kat sɨwun maa ngɨni mɨn kat ana kao yigiyandi waa wandɨ God waa pɨlɨwutndɨ Devit.
41012037	Devit Kraist kat njambwi nyan walɨndɨ. Manda kat tɨga Kraist Devitna mat nyanat tɨgɨyandɨ waa walɨgandi. Kraist Devitna njambwi nyana waa wandɨ Jisas. Wan nɨma Sakwat nɨmba ndɨnai waa nyaangɨt wutaa nolin ngwandɨndi.
41012038	Jisas sɨmogwiga wandɨ. Nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nɨmbana kavle vak kat yigumba avɨ ngwula. Lɨvla mbundɨ waavwimba kwusolaa yetɨvat walɨgandi. Wenga klalɨnja kavamba kwo nɨmba ndi kat apma vat wanjangat wupmat walɨgandi.
41012039	Nyaangɨt ngambulɨnja ngay wuleilaa njambwi nyana tɨgɨtmba ndalɨvat walɨgandi. Nɨma kɨgɨnda kwutnja kavamba ngivat sɨgɨt walɨgandi.
41012040	To lagwana kwanda kwanda nda sɨkwuka klalɨgandi. God kat sɨvla nyaangɨt maawut sɨtapman kapmba kwo walɨgandi. Nɨma nɨma vat Godnanamba klaigandi.
41012041	Godna ngaymba lɨga sanya yaagilɨnja kavana nat naangamba Jisas ndaalɨndɨ. Wan nɨma sakwat nɨmba sanya yaagilɨnja vak kat ndaalɨga vɨndɨ. Nat nɨma sakwat kwanda kwanda ndo lɨga nɨmba sanya nɨma sakwat yaagindi.
41012042	Sanya lapman to lagwa yalaa mat yelogwen mbangɨ sanya vɨlɨlɨk yaagilɨ. Wan sanya vɨlɨlɨk peni kɨta vla lɨgandɨ.
41012043	Jisas ndina kwupmba la nɨmba kat yagwa walaa ndi kat wandɨ. Ngwuk kat wowun. Wan sanya lapman to lagwa nat nɨmba sanya kwinja vak kat kwulatɨ waa wandɨ.
41012044	Nat nɨmba nɨma sakwat sanyo lɨga kuvuk klalaa kwindi. Lɨ sanya lapman tɨga lɨla sanya aywaa kwilɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41013001	Jisas Godna ngay kwagalandɨ maa ndɨna kwupmba la kɨta nyan ndɨ kat wandɨ. Sɨmogwi lɨga nyan avɨmba mɨn. Apma kaambapmba kwutnja ngaya. Apma nglei ngaya waa wandɨ.
41013002	Jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ. Nɨma nɨma Godna ngay vɨmɨn? Ngɨnɨ wan ngay sulɨndi maa wan kaambak nɨglɨga wulɨga ndalaa kɨta kɨta yiga tɨgiyandi waa wandɨ.
41013003	Jisas Oliv walɨnja nduwiat yiga ndaa lɨndɨ. Wan nduwi nat naangamba Godna ngay lɨndɨ. Pita, Jems, Jon, Endru ndɨ kat kapma lɨga wagalandi.
41013004	Nɨn kat ambuk. Anda sɨva Godna ngay kat yinjeya vak wama vak tɨgiyandɨ waa wagalandi. Anda nda tata lɨga nda nɨn kat sɨmogwigiyaa was wagalandi.
41013005	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Yigumba awukmba ngwuk. kɨta nyan ngwula maawut mandɨp yilandɨ.
41013006	Nɨma sakwat nɨmba wuna sɨ waga yaigandi. yalaa waigandi. Wun Kraist wun waa waigandi. Wan nɨmbana nyaangɨt wutaa nɨma sakwat nɨmbana maawut mandɨp vat yipiyandɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41013007	Kao veilaa yaa snjeya vak kat wutaa ke vaka. kao sɨgiyaa vat tiɨgiyandɨ. Wan vak ngɨlɨgiyaa njɨmbla wata.
41013008	Kɨta kwundi nɨmba nat kwundi nɨmba kat kao sɨgiyandi. Ngepma ngepma kat kao sɨkiyandi. kava kavamba yinaw kwukiyandɨ. Kɨgɨnda lapman njɨmbla tɨgiyandɨ. Wundi nama vat ngɨlɨgiyaa njɨmbla wata. Wan nɨma vak taagwa nyan kwupmak yipma sɨndɨ tɨga vak vla lɨgandɨ.
41013009	Ngwuk yigumba vɨga alɨmba ngwuk. Wan apma nyaangɨt ngambungweyangat ngwuk kak kwutaa kaligiyandi. nyaangɨt ngambulɨnja ngaymba ngwuk kak viyaigandi. njambwi nɨmbagwi nɨma nɨmba kat wun kat tɨga laataa kwukwa njɨvwa kat ndi kat mbukiyaangwuk.
41013010	Tat wan apma nyaangɨt ngepma ngepma nɨmba kat mbukiyangwuk.
41013011	Wan apma nyaangɨt ngambungweyangat ngwuk kat kwutaa kalinjeyan awat wangweyan nyaangɨk kat nɨmamba ke yelavɨka. Godna waagan ngwuk kat waigaa nyaangɨt waigangwuk. Avla ana waigangwuk. Godna waagan ngwula maawut ngwandɨndɨ maa waigangwuk.
41013012	Wan njɨmblamba nyamwun swambu kat vatnyavak kak kaligiyandɨ. Swambu nyamwun kat vatnyavak kak kaligiyandɨ. Nyan nyaek nyɨme kat ngivak kaligiyandɨ.
41013013	Wuna mbaapmba lɨngwangat tɨga ngwuk kak aywaa kai waigandi. Wan kavle njɨmbla kat kwulatɨga nyan tɨndeyan kwo lɨgiyandɨ.
41013014	Tamba God waa nyaangɨt walɨga nyan Danyel wupma pɨlɨwutndɨ. Kɨta nyan Godna ngaymba kavle nglei nda taagagiyandɨ. Taaganda nda wan ngay nglambi lɨgiyandɨ waa pɨlɨwutndɨ. Pɨlɨwuta nyaangɨt vɨgiyaa nɨmba vɨlaa maawupmba yelavɨk. Taaganda kavle nglei vat vɨlaa Judiamba lɨngweyan nduwiat kɨta yi yigiyangwuk.
41013015	Ngay ngwaymba lɨga nyan kwanda kwanda nda klavak lungwamata yindeyan kavle yigiyandɨ. Kɨta yi yigiyandɨ.
41013016	Ambugavamba lɨga nyan ngaymba lɨga taaganda waavwi kat lungwamata yindeyan kavle yigiyandɨ. Kɨta yi yigiyandɨ.
41013017	Nyan tɨga taagwa, nyan kat mwunya kwilɨga taagwa wan njɨmbla yandɨ, ndi kat miwa ay.
41013018	Meit mwuk kwutɨga njɨmblamba ngivat kavle vat ke kwiga God kat wagala.
41013019	Wan nɨma vatna sakwat tat wungivat ana lɨndɨ. Tat God kɨpma kwutna njɨmbla wungivat ana lɨndɨ. Ngɨni wungivat ana lɨgiyandɨ.
41013020	Nɨma nyan wan nandinayana sakwat kalɨtapman yindeyan ndinyangu aywaa kiyaigandi. God ndɨna nɨmba kat tɨga nandinyana sakwat kalɨkiyandɨ.
41013021	Kɨta nyan yalaa ngwuk kat wandeyan avɨ Kraist kɨngiwyan ndɨ waa woseka wandwyan maawupmba ke yelavɨk.
41013022	-
41013023	Kraist lɨwun waa nɨma sakwat nɨmba waga God waa nyaangɨt wowun waa nɨma sakwat nɨmba waga yaigandi. Yalaa sɨmogwi lɨga nɨma njivwa kwukiyandi. Kwutndi, ngɨpaliga ndaigandi. kwutnjeya vak kat vɨlaa wan nɨmbana maawutmba yelavɨtnja vak kavle yigiyandɨ. Godna nɨmbana maawupmba yelavɨntnja vak kat kavle yivat waigandi. ndina maawupmba yelavɨtnja ngwula. Ngwuk kak tak tamba mbukwun.
41013024	Wan kavle njɨmblana nɨma vak ngɨlɨndɨ maa nya yiga kulun waigandɨ. Mbak ana sɨgiyandɨ.
41013025	Singwuk pɨka ndalɨgiyandi. Nyɨnangwutmba lɨga nda kat yinaw kwukiyandɨ.
41013026	Kwutndɨ maa wun ndinyanguna nyan wun nyɨnangwupmba lɨga ngaga yaweya vak kat vɨgiyandi. Kwondumba yaigowun. Apma vat tɨga yaigowun.
41013027	Godna nɨmba kat klalaga kiyavak kak ndɨna ensel kat ay waigandɨ. Woli agwiat ay Malingwutnat ay. kambangwatnat ay. Kɨpmagwi nyɨnangwutnat wupma ay waa waigandɨ God.
41013028	Suwa sɨmogwi lɨga vak kat yelavɨk ngwula. Maambɨ wagwundeyan nyagangeat waa yelavɨtɨgangwuk.
41013029	Ngwuk kat mbukwa nyaangɨt tɨga vak vɨlaa yelavɨkiyangwuk. Wan kavle vat tamba ngway tola lɨgandɨ waa yelavɨkiyangwuk.
41013030	ngwuk kat wowun. Mbambala tɨga nɨmba wunai waa vat vɨgiyangwuk. Tat ana kiyaigangwuk. Vɨlaa tɨga kiyaigangwuk waa wandɨ.
41013031	Nyɨnangwutnagwi kɨpmo ngɨni ngɨlɨgiyandɨ. Wunai waa nyaangɨt ana ngɨlɨgiyandɨ. Njɨmbala njɨmbla lɨgiyandɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41013032	Yaweya njɨmbla kɨta nyan ana vɨga lɨgandɨ. Ensel ana vɨga lɨgandi. Godna nyan wun ana vɨga lɨgowun. Wuna nyaek mɨna vɨga lɨgandɨ.
41013033	Yigumba avɨ ngwula. yaweya njɨmbla ana vɨga lɨgangwuk.
41013034	Yaweya vat kɨta nyan sɨvla kavat yindeya vak vla lɨgandɨ. Wan nyan ndɨna njɨvwa kwuta nɨmba kat wandɨ. Ngay vɨga alɨ. Ngayna njɨvwa agwut wandɨ. Ndaamange kat vɨga la nyan kat yigumba avɨ wandɨ. Walaa kwagalalaa sɨvla kavat yindɨ.
41013035	Wungivat ngwutno avɨ ngwula. Ngayna njambwi nyan yaiga njɨmbla ana vɨga lɨgangwuk. Nglaambu yaigandɨ? Nɨndɨ yaigandɨ?
41013036	Ngwuk sɨndu kwalɨga nɨmba vla lɨngwuk mala yandeyan ana nglaatndɨ.
41013037	Wupma avɨmba ngwuk. Ngwuk kak wawa ntyaangɨt ngwuk kat mɨna ana walɨgowun. Ndinyangu kat aywaa walɨgowun. Avɨ ngwula wowun waa wandɨ Jisas.
41014001	Nandinya vɨlɨlɨk yindɨ mala Judana pesto lɨgiyandɨ. Wan pestomba tamba God ndi kat kwunatnda vak kat yelavɨka tugula nao kɨga lɨndi. God kat walɨga njambwi nɨmbagwi nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nɨmbo Jisas kat pagwuga kwutaa vatnyavak wandi.
41014002	Wan pesto la njɨmblamba kai wata wandi. Ndɨ kat kapmba kwutaa vatnyaneyan nɨma sakwat nɨmba vɨlaa kai walaa nɨma vat yigiyandi waa wandi.
41014003	Jisas Betanimba lɨga tat kawiya kɨla nyan Saimona ngaymba lɨga njambamba ndaa lɨndɨ, kɨta lagwa kaambapmba kwutnja aw kwutaa yalɨ. Wan awmba nat walɨnja apma njangu veilɨga ngwaat tɨndɨ. Wan ngwaat nɨma sanya kwiga klalɨnja ngwaakna. Aw tagulaa ngwaat ndɨna nambumba salɨtɨ.
41014004	Nat nɨmba kat waleavat wandi. Manda kat ngwaat ndɨna nambumba kwo salɨtnyɨn waa wandi.
41014005	Wan ngwaak wenga klagelɨ. Klalelaa sanya kwo lɨga nɨmba kat kwigelɨ. Wupma lɨ kat waa waleavat tɨndi.
41014006	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Lɨ kat ke yiga wungivat. Manda kat lɨ kat vat yigiyangwuk. Wun kat apma vat yiga kwunatɨ waa wandɨ.
41014007	Kwo lɨga nɨmba njɨmbla njɨmbla ngwutnogwinala lɨgiyandi. Njɨmbla njɨmbla ndi kat apma vat yigiyangwuk. Wun njɨmbla njɨmbla ngwutnogwinala ana lɨgiyowun.
41014008	Lɨla maawupmba yelavɨtaa apma vat yilɨ. Kiyawun maa wun kat waagumba taaganjeya vak kat yelavɨtaa salɨtɨ.
41014009	Ngwuk kak wowun. Wan apma nyaangɨt mbutnjeya kava kavamba lɨlai kwutna vak kak lɨ kat yelavɨtaa mbukiyandi.
41014010	Judas Iskeriot wan tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨtna kɨta nyan God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmba kat Jisas kat sɨnjangat kamwin kwivat yindɨ.
41014011	Wan njambwi nɨmba Judas waa nyaangɨt wutaa nolin ngwandɨlaa ndɨ kat sanya kwivat wandi. Judas Iskeriot Jisas kat vatnyanjeya vak kat ndɨna maawupmba kwaka yelavɨtndɨ.
41014012	Tagula nao kɨlɨnja pestona kɨta wan nandinyamba God Juda kat tamba kwunatnda pestona sip sip vatnyandi. Vatnyandi maa Jisas ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba kat wandɨ. Pestona nɨma kɨgɨnda andamba yiga kɨgiyanɨn yelavɨk ngwula waa wandɨ.
41014013	Ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmbana vɨlɨlɨk palɨ kat wandɨ. ngepma wulei mbɨla. Ngepma wuleilaa ava yambɨmba kɨta nyan ngu awmba naangalaa kiyalɨga nyan mbɨk kat sɨla klakɨvaa yigiyandɨ. Ndɨna kwupmba ay mbɨla.
41014014	Ngay wuleindɨ maa wan ngay kwutna nyan kat awa mbɨla. Sɨmogwi lɨga nyan wandɨ waa awa mbɨla. Wunai wuna kwupmba la nɨmbonala God Juda kat kwunatnda pestona kɨgɨnda kɨneya kava andamapmba lɨgandɨ waga awa mbɨla.
41014015	Nɨma tɨmbu vɨlɨnge awlak ngemba la kava mbɨk kat sɨmogwigiyandɨ. Wan kava kwo kava ana ndɨ. ngayna nda ngilɨga. Wan ngay nɨn kat tamba kwundatndɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41014016	Ndɨna kwupmba la mbɨk vɨlɨlɨk palɨ ngepma yimbɨk. Yilaa Jisas mbɨk kat waa nyaangɨtmba tɨndɨ, vɨmbɨk. Kɨgɨnda kwupmbɨk.
41014017	Ngan ndandɨ maa wan tamba vɨlɨi kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk nɨmbanala Jisas laataa yandɨ.
41014018	Njambamba ndaa lɨga kɨlɨndi maa Jisas wandɨ. Ngwuk kak wowun. Ngwula kɨta nyan wun kat sɨnjangat kamwin kwilɨga nyana. Wunagwinala kɨlɨga nyan kamwin kwilɨga nyana waa wandɨ.
41014019	Wutaa ngɨpaliga ndalaa yelavɨka lɨndi. Jisas kat kɨta nyan kɨta nyan wagalandi. Wun kat wamɨn? Waa kɨta kɨta wagalandi.
41014020	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Ngwutna nat nyan kɨgiyand. Kɨta nombe awmba kɨga lɨli.
41014021	Wun Godna vak sɨmogwi lɨga nyan wun. Wun kat tamba pɨlɨwuta nyaangɨtmba yigiyandi. Wun kat kamwin kwigiyaa nyan ndɨ kat miwa ay. Ndɨ kat nyɨme kwutapman yigelan apma vat tɨgendɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41014022	Kɨlɨndi maa Jisas nao klandɨ. Klalaa God kat wagalalaa lɨmba ngɨlɨlaa kwiga wandɨ. Agla wuna sɨmna wɨmba kwiwa.
41014023	Ngu la andagava klalaa God kat wagalaa tulaa kɨta kɨta nyan kat kwindɨ, kɨndi.
41014024	Ndi kat wandɨ. Wan ngu wuna yelogwena. Paak vla lɨgandɨ. Nɨma sakwat nɨmba kat kwunapmak wuna yelogwen salɨkiyandɨ.
41014025	Ngwuk kak wowun. Glepna ngu kɨpmamba lɨga ana nat njambɨk kɨgiyowun. God vɨga lɨga kavat wuleilaa kupi apma ngu kɨgiyowun waa wandɨ Jisas.
41014026	God kat mbangu kwundi walaa wan ngay kwagalalaa Oliv walɨnja nduwiat yindi.
41014027	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Ngwuk aywaa wun kat kwagalagiyangwuk. Tamba la nɨmba pɨlɨwutndi. Sip sip vɨga lɨga nyan kat God vatnyandɨ mala sip sip kava kava vaka yigiyandi waa pɨlɨwutndɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41014028	Kiyalaa laataa tata Galili yigiyowun waa wandɨ.
41014029	Pita ndɨ kat wandɨ. Nat nɨmba mɨn kat kwagalanjeyan wun ana kwagalagiyowun waa wandɨ.
41014030	Jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ. Mɨn kat wowun. Mbambala ngan wun kat njambɨ kuvuk kai waigamɨn. Kai wamɨn maa nyaaga njambɨ vɨli viyaigandɨ.
41014031	Pita nɨma kwundimba wandɨ. Mɨn kat ana kai waigowun. Mɨnai kiyaa vapmba kiyaweyan kiyalapman nda? Waa wandɨ Pita. Aywaa ngivak wandi.
41014032	Getsemani walɨnja kavat yindi maa Jisas ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba kat wandɨ. Ngwuk wumba ndaa alɨ ngwula. Wun God kat yiga wagalagiyowun waa wandɨ.
41014033	Nat Nɨmba kat kwagalalaa Pita, Jems, Jon kat Jisas ndi kat kwutaa samat kalindɨ. Jisas nɨma vak kat yelavɨtndɨ.
41014034	Ndi kat wandɨ. Wuna maawut nɨma vat yelavɨtɨgowun. Kiyalaa lsvla lɨgowun. Ngwuk alɨ ngwula waa wandɨ.
41014035	Jisas samat yiga kɨpmamba ndalaa God kat wagalandɨ. Wungivat vat wun kat yilandɨ waa wagalandɨ.
41014036	Ndina kwundimba aba waa nyaek kat wandɨ. Mɨn aywaa alɨpsɨga kwutɨgamɨn. Wungivat vak wun kat yilandɨ. Wupma mɨna maawutmba kwuka yetɨ. Wuna maawupmba ke kwuka yetɨga waa wandɨ Jisas God kat.
41014037	Wagalalaa yalaa kuvut nɨmba sɨndu kwalɨndi, vɨndɨ. Pita kat wandɨ. Saimon sɨndu kwamɨn? Laataa lɨga samat ana wun kat kawiga tɨgiyamɨn? Waa wandɨ Jisas.
41014038	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Ke sɨndu kwaga. God kat wagala ngwula. God kat wagalangweyan ngwutna maawut ana kavle yigiyandɨ. Ngwutna maawupmba ana sɨndu kwiganɨn waa yelavɨkngwuk. Ngwula mɨni vali yindɨ, sɨndu kwangwuk. Ngwula nɨni maawupmba yelavɨkngwa vapmba ana yindɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41014039	Nat njambɨ yiga God kat wagalandɨ. Tat wanda wumba nyaangɨtmba wandɨ.
41014040	Nat njambɨ yalaa ndina mɨni sɨndu yilɨndɨ, sɨndu kwandi, vɨndɨ. Ndɨnai waa nyaangɨk kat wutaa ana kwundi wandi.
41014041	Njambɨ kuvuk yilaa yalaa ndi kat wandɨ. Tamba sɨndu kwaangwuk? Ngiyambak. Wun kat kwupmak ya nɨmba tabma ngwaya yanja. Wun Godna vat sɨmogwi lɨga nyan wun. Wun kat kavle vat yetɨlɨga nɨmba wun kat kwupmak yaandi waa wandɨ.
41014042	Laak ngwula. Yigat. Wun kat kamwin kwiya nyan ngwaymba lɨgandɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
41014043	Jisas walɨndɨ maa wan tamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk nɨmbana kɨta nyan Judas yalɨndɨ. God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmbagwi nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nɨmbao Judana ngwatno nɨma sakwat nɨmba kat ay wandi maa yak kwutaa njay kwutaa Judasonala yalɨndi.
41014044	Kamwin kwiya nyan tat ndi kat sɨmogwivat yandɨ. Kɨpmwimba wusɨtweya nyan kwutaa agiya wandɨ.
41014045	Judas Jisas kat yalaa ndɨ kat njambwi nyan walaa kɨpmwimba wusɨtndɨ.
41014046	Wusɨtndɨ maa ndɨ kat kwutndi.
41014047	Jisasna ngwaymba la nyan yak kwutaa God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nyana njɨvwa kwutɨga nyana waan kalɨtndɨ.
41014048	Jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ. Wun sɨkwutɨga nyan ana wun. Manda kat yak kwutaa njay kwutaa wun kat kwupmak yanguwak.
41014049	Nandinya nandinya ngwulanala Godna ngaymba lɨwun, ana kwukngwuk. Tamba pɨlɨwuta nyaangɨtmba yingwuk waa wandɨ Jisas.
41014050	Wandɨ, ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmba ndɨ kat kwagalalaa vaaka yindi.
41014051	Kwandɨ nyan kɨta Jisasna kwupmba yindɨ. Waavwi kɨta kwo kapmalaa yindɨ. Jisasna kwupmba yindɨ. Waavwi kɨta kwo kapmalaa yindɨ. Jisas kat kwuta nɨmba ndɨ kat kwupmat wandi.
41014052	Ndɨna waavwi mɨna klandi. Kwo vaaka sɨp mɨna pɨlɨga yindɨ.
41014053	God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nyana ngayat Jisas kat kalindi. God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmbagwi Judana ngwatno nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nɨmbo yisolaa lɨndi wan ngaymba.
41014054	Pita sɨvlamba lɨga kwupmba yandɨ. Pita God kat walɨga njambwi nyana ngekavamba ndalɨndɨ. njambwi nyana kao lɨlɨga nɨmbonala ndalɨndɨ. Yipma yilɨndɨ, ya waymba yiga ndalɨndɨ.
41014055	God kat walɨga njambwi nɨmbagwi nat yisolaa la njambwi nɨmbo Jisas kat njɨkiya nɨmbakat kwaka yindi.
41014056	Nɨma sakwat nɨmba ndɨ kat njɨka wandi. Kɨta vapmba ana ngambundi. Mandɨp mandɨp nyaangɨt woseka ngambundi.
41014057	Nat nɨmba laataa njɨka wupma wandi.
41014058	Godna ngay ndinyangu kwutaa ngay sulɨgiyowun. Nandinya kuvut tɨga mandɨk ngay kwukiyowun. Ndinyangu kwutnjeya ngay vla ana kwukiyowun Jisas wandɨ wutnɨn njɨka walɨndi.
41014059	Kɨta nyaangɨtmba ana ngambundi. mandɨp mandɨp ngambundi.
41014060	God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nyan nɨndɨmba laataa Jisas kat wagalandɨ. Awat waigamɨn? Mɨn kat wanjangat angamak awat waigamɨn waa wagalandɨ.
41014061	Jisas awat ana wandɨ. Nat njambɨ God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nyan ndɨ kat wagalandɨ. Mɨn Kraist mɨn? Mɨn Godna nyan mɨn? Waa wagalandɨ.
41014062	Wandɨ, Jisas awa wandɨ. Ngɨni wun Godna vak sɨmogwi lɨga nyan wun Godna yaagindan naangamba ndalɨgiyowun, vɨgiyangwuk. nyɨnangwutmba lɨga yaigowun vɨgiyangwuk waa wandɨ Jisas.
41014063	Wandɨ maa god kat kwunatɨga njambwi nyan kimbuk yiga avla waavwi ngɨlɨtaa wandɨ. Ndɨ kat njɨka waiga nat nɨmba kat yagwa ana waiganɨn. Ndɨna ngambu sɨmbla nyaangɨtmba vatnyagiyanɨn.
41014064	Ndɨnai God kat kavle waa nyaangɨt tamba wukngwuk waa woseka wandɨ. Ngwuk angamak yelavɨkiyangwuk waa wandɨ. Wandɨ, wandi. Ndɨ kiyaigandɨ waa wandi.
41014065	Nat nɨmba Jisas kat sɨpmiya sandi. Nat nɨmba ndɨna mɨni waavwimba ngilaa viyaga wandi. Kandana viyaa. Viyaa nyana sɨ ambuk wandi. Kao lɨlɨga nɨmba ndɨ kat viyalaa kwutndi.
41014066	Pita ngekavamba lɨga God kat walɨga njambwi nyana njɨvwa kwutɨga tagwanyan ndɨ kat walɨ.
41014067	Pita ya ngwaymba lɨga mbangɨ kulavi lɨndɨ maa ndɨ kat vɨlaa walɨlɨ. Mɨn Nasaretmba lɨga yaa nyan mɨn. Tamba Jisasonala lɨmɨn waa walɨ.
41014068	Pita kai wandɨ. Nyɨnai waa nyaangɨk kat ana wuka yelavɨtɨgowun walaa laataa ngegava tɨvwina suwi yambɨ yindɨ.
41014069	Wat tagwanyan vɨlaa wumba lɨga nɨmba kat walɨ. Jisasna kwupmba la nyan angwiyan yiga waa walɨ.
41014070	Nat njambɨ Pita kai wandɨ. Tɨga lɨga wumba lɨga nyan Pita kat wandɨ. Mɨn ndɨna kwupmba la nyan mɨn. Mɨn Galilimba la nyan mɨn waa wandɨ.
41014071	Pita nyaek sɨge yiga wandɨ. Wama nyaangɨt ana vɨga lɨgowun waa wandɨ.
41014072	Wandɨ, ava nyaaga viyandɨ, ngɨni wumba nyaaga viyandɨ. Pita Jisas ndɨ kat waa nyaangɨk kat yelavɨtndɨ. Wun kat njambɨ kuvuk kai waigamɨn. Wamɨn, nyaaga njambɨ vɨli viyaigandɨ wandangat yelavɨtaa nglandɨ.
41015001	Ngambi gleimba God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmbagwi Judana ngwatno nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nɨmbo yisolaa ngambundi. Jisas kat man taamba sagilaa Pailat walɨnja njambwi nyanat kiyandi.
41015002	Pailat Jisas kat wagalandɨ. Mɨn Judana king mɨn? Waa wagalandɨ. Wagalandɨ mala Jisas wandɨ. Ngiyambak wamɨn waa wandɨ Jisas.
41015003	God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmba Jiasa kat nɨma vat njɨka wandi.
41015004	Pailat nat njambɨ Jisas kat wagalandɨ. Awat waigamɨn? Nɨma sakwat vak wanja vak kat awut waa wandɨ.
41015005	Jisas awat ana wandɨ. Walapman tɨndangat Pailatna maawut yigumba ana yelavɨka lɨndɨ.
41015006	Pailat wan pestona njɨmblamba kalabusmba lɨga kɨta nyan kat kwo ay walɨndɨ. Juda wan nyan kat sɨmogwindi maa Pailat kwo ay walɨndɨ.
41015007	Kalabusmba la Gavman kat kao la nɨmbana kɨta nyan tɨndɨ. ndina sɨ Barabas. kao la njɨmblamba kɨta nyan kat vatnyandɨ.
41015008	Wan nɨma sakwat nɨmba Pailat kat wandi. Mɨnai kwo ay waa vapmba agwut waa wandi.
41015009	Pailat ndi kat wandɨ. Judana king Jisas kat kwo ay walu? wandɨ.
41015010	God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmba Jisas kat waliyavat kiyanja vak kat Pailat maawupmba yelavɨtndɨ.
41015011	God kat kwunatɨga njambwi nɨmba wan nɨma sakwat nɨmba kat wandi. Pailat kat awa ngwula wandi. Barabas kat kwo ay waa awa ngwula waa wandi. Wupmba Barabas kat kwo ay waa awa Pailat kat wandi.
41015012	Pailat ndi kat nat njambɨ wandɨ. Judana king walɨnja nyan kat angamak yigiyowun waa wandɨ.
41015013	Ndi kɨselaga wandi. Vɨtagwe mimba kaala waa wandi.
41015014	Pailat ndi kat wandɨ. Manda vatna kavle vat yinda waa wandɨ. Wandɨ, nɨma vat kɨselandi. Vɨtagwe mimba kaala waa kɨselandi.
41015015	Pailat wan nɨma sakwat nɨmbana maawupmba yivat wandɨ. Wungi kat tɨga Barabas kat kwo ay wandɨ. jisas kat aviya walaa vɨtagwe mimba kaala wandɨ maa ndɨ kat kwutaa kalindi.
41015016	Kao yilɨga nɨmba aywaa yalaa Pailatna ngay Pritoriam walɨnja ngaymba lɨga Jisas kat kiyandi.
41015017	Yelogwen mbangɨ waavwi ndɨ kat kwusondi. Mangɨnɨmbi yamboy klalaa ngilaa ndɨna nambumba kɨlɨsandandi.
41015018	Ndɨ kat kwuselɨndi. Mɨn Judana king mɨn waa kwuselɨndi.
41015019	Ndɨna nambu maambɨmba viyalɨndi ndɨ kat sɨpmiya salɨndi kwusɨlɨga kwaali mamba sɨndi.
41015020	Kwusɨlaa yelogwen mbangɨ waavwi klalaa ndɨ kat ndɨna waavwi kwusolaa vitagwe mbaomba kaalavat kiyandi.
41015021	Samat yiga kɨta nyan kat vɨndi. Ndɨna sɨ Saimon. Wan nyan saimon ngepma wuleivat yandɨ. Ndɨ kat kwutaa wandi. Kan vɨtagwe mbao walalaa kali waa wandi. Wan nyan saimona angwa ngepma Sairiniwalɨnja ngepma. Ndɨna mbɨt nyana sɨ Aleksanda Rufus.
41015022	Golgota walɨnja nduwi andɨgava nambu vla la nduwi Jisas kat kiyandi.
41015023	Nɨma nguo mɨl walɨnja sukwino kɨta salɨndi. Jisas kat kwivat wandi. Ndɨ kɨvak kat kai wandɨ. Wan ngu kangɨt yilɨga vak kat kwulatɨga ngua.
41015024	Wungi kavamba ndɨ kat kaalandi. ndɨna waavwi klavak kak satumba kaselɨndi.
41015025	9 klok ngambi ndɨ kat kaalandi.
41015026	Jisas kat kavle vat wanja nyaangɨt lavungamba pɨlɨwutndi. Judana king waa pɨlɨwutndi.
41015027	-
41015028	Jisasonala sɨkwutɨga vɨlɨlɨk palɨ kaalandi. Nat nyan kat yaagindan naangamba nat nyan nat ambugendan naangamba kaalandi.
41015029	Vɨgɨvaa yilɨga nɨmba ndɨ kat kwusɨlɨndi. Ndaawamba viyaga wandi. Tat Godna ngay sulɨvat waa wamɨn. Nat ngay nandinya kuvutmba kwukiyowun waa wamɨn waa wandi.
41015030	Ngaga yaga avla mɨna mbangɨ kwunak waa kwusɨlɨgba wandi.
41015031	God kat walɨga nɨmbagwi nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutɨga nɨmbo ndino Jisas kat kwusɨlɨndi. Nat nɨmba kat kwunatndɨ. Avla ana alɨpsɨga kwunakiyandɨ waa kwusɨlɨndi.
41015032	Ndɨ Kraist tɨndeyan ndɨ Isrelna njambwi nyan tɨndeyan vɨtndeyan vɨtagwe mbaomba ngaga yandeyan vɨlaa ndɨ kat nɨna mbangɨ wiyo waavi taagandɨ maa ndɨna nyaangɨt wukiyanɨn waa kwusɨlɨndi. Ndɨnanala vɨtagwe mbaomba ta mbɨt nyan mbɨtno kwusɨlɨmbɨt.
41015033	Nɨndɨ nandinya nya kulun wandɨ. Tɨga vasagla ta lɨndi, kulun wandɨ. 12 klok lulun wandɨ, yiga 3 klok nglaambu kembandɨ.
41015034	3 klok nglaambu Jisas nɨma kwundimba kɨselaga wandɨ. Ndina kwundimba Eloi Eloi lama sabaktani wandɨ. God wuna nyaek manda kat wun kat kwagalamɨn waa wandɨ.
41015035	Wumba lɨga nɨmba yigumba ana wutaa wandi. Awut Ilaija kat walɨgandɨ waa wandi.
41015036	Kɨta nyan pɨlɨlaa namɨnɨngɨmba nyingi lɨga nɨma ngu sɨvugulaa njimbwi mbaomba namɨnɨgɨ taagalaa Jisas kat kwusolaa Jisasna tɨpmwimba taagalaa agɨ wandɨ. Wata kwo lɨgiyanɨn. ilaija ndɨ kat kwunapmak yandeyan vɨgiyanɨn waa kasega wandɨ.
41015037	Jisas nɨma kwundimba kɨselaa waga kiyandɨ.
41015038	Godna ngaymba nɨndɨ ngemba la nɨma waavwi ngɨlɨtndɨ. Angwapmba lɨga ngɨlɨka ndaindɨ.
41015039	Jisas kiyandɨ maa Jisasna mɨndama sambɨmba la njambwi soldia wandɨ. Ndɨ Godna nyan waa wandɨ.
41015040	Sɨvlamba lɨga nat taagwa vɨga lɨndi. Magdala walɨnja ngepmamba la taagwa lɨla sɨ maria nat Jemsagwi Josisna nyɨmeak. Salomi apma vɨga lɨlɨ.
41015041	Tat Jisas Galilimba lɨndɨ maa wat taagwa ndɨna kwupmba yalaa ndɨna kɨgɨnda kwuti Jisasonala nɨma sakwat taagwa yalaa vɨga lɨndi.
41015042	Nya ndaindɨ maa njɨvwa lapman nandinya kat kwanda kwanda kwutnjɨgwilɨnjan nandinya tɨndɨ.
41015043	Arimitiamba la nyan Josep yandɨ. Ndɨ yisolaa nyaangɨt ngambula nɨmbana kɨta nyana. God vɨga lɨga vak kat vɨga la kɨta nyana. Pailat kat yalaa Jisasna sɨm klavat wandɨ.
41015044	Pailat wandɨ. Tamba kiyandɨ? E? Ana kiyandɨ? Walaa njambwi soldia kat yagwa walaa wagalandɨ.
41015045	Njambwi soldia waa nyaangɨt wutaa pailat Josep kat sɨm agla wandɨ.
41015046	Jisasna sɨm kanda kalilaa waavwimba mbatndi. Kambapmba waangu vala taagandi. Taagalaa kambak mbandɨgaa ndɨna waangu tɨvɨndɨ.
41015047	Magdalamba lak Mariagwi Josisna nyɨmeo nat maria taaganja kava yigumba vɨga lɨmbɨt.
41016001	Jɨvwa lapman nandinya yindɨ maa Magdalamba lak Maria Jemsna nyɨme nat Maria, Salomi, apma njangu veilɨga ngwaat Jisasna sɨmba salɨpmak kwutaa kalindi.
41016002	Kɨta wan nandinya ngambi glei laataa waangu la kavat yindi.
41016003	Avla ngambundi. Nɨn kat kandana kambat lavwigiyalaa waa ngambundi.
41016004	Yilaa kambak lavwilaa lɨndɨ, vɨndi. Wan kambak nɨma kambakna.
41016005	Waangu wuleilaa kɨta nyan sawun mbangɨ waavwi kwusolaa la nyan ndina yaagindan naangamba ndaalɨndɨ, vɨlaa ngɨpaliga ndandi.
41016006	Ndi kat wandɨ. ke vak. kwaka yangwan Nasaretmba la nyan ana lɨgandɨ. Tambu laatndɨ. Tat ndɨ kat taaganja kava avɨ waa wandɨ.
41016007	Ndɨna kwupmba la nɨmbagwi Pita kat yiga ambuk. Jisas laataa Galili yigiyandɨ waa ambuk waa wandɨ. Galilimba ndɨ kat vɨgiyangwuk waa ambuk waa wandɨ.
41016008	Waangumba lɨga vaaka kɨta yi yindi. Ngɨpaliga ndalaa avamban plaga yindi. Vaaka lɨga nat nɨmba kat ana mbutndi.
41016009	Kɨta wan nandinyamba Jisas laatndɨ maa Magdalamba lak Maria ndɨ kat tatak vɨlɨ. Tat Jisas lɨ kat tavila waagan sɨla vɨli savɨlɨndɨ.
41016010	Jisasonala ta nɨmba nolin tapman nglalɨndi maa Maria yaa ndi kat mubtuɨ.
41016011	Maria ndi kat mbutɨ. Jisas kiyalaa tamba laatndɨ waa mbutɨ. Wala vak wutaa ndina mbangɨ wup yindɨ.
41016012	Jisas mandɨt nyan vla lɨndɨ, vɨlɨlɨk palɨ ngepma lapman kavamba yetɨga lɨga Jisas kat vɨmbɨt.
41016013	Vɨlaa nat nɨmba kat yiga mbupmbɨk. Wamba nyaangɨt wutaa ndina mbangɨ wup yigandɨ.
41016014	Ngɨni wan tamba vɨli kiyeli kɨta nɨmba njambamba ndaalɨga nao kɨlɨndi, Jisas ndi kat yandɨ. Yalaa ndi kat mbangɨ kɨlɨpangɨ yindɨ lɨnjangat nɨma kwundimba wandɨ. Tat va taagwa yaa mbuta nyaangɨt ngwula mbangɨ ana wiyo waavi taagandɨ. Wungi kat tɨga Jisas yiga ndi kat wandɨ.
41016015	Ndi kat wupma wandɨ. Kava kavamba wan apma nyaangɨt aywaa ndi kat yiga ambuk waa wandɨ.
41016016	Kɨta nyan wan apma nyaangɨt maawupmba kwutaa lɨndeyan ndɨ kat yagunjeyan ndɨ kat God kwunakiyandɨ. Maawupma kwupmak kak kai wagiyaa nɨmba kat God nɨma vat yigiyandɨ.
41016017	Wan apma nyaangɨt maawupmba kwukiyaa nɨmba ndinogwionala sɨmogwilɨga nda lɨgiyandɨ. Wuna sɨ waga waagan kat tula waa wanjeyan kwagalagiyandi. Mandɨp mandɨp kwundimba waigandi.
41016018	Kamboy kwutaa katsonjeyan ana valɨgiyandɨ. Ndaa kwutɨga ngu kɨnjeyan ana kiyaigandi. Yelogwen ta nɨmba kat taamba taaganjeyan kwo lɨgiyandi.
41016019	Njambwi nyan Jisas ndi kat walaa nyɨnangwut wokelaa Godna yaagindan naangamba ndalɨndɨ.
41016020	Ndi kava kavamba yiga mbutndi. Nɨma nyan ndina lak kwandɨ. Sɨmogwi lɨga nɨma njɨvwa kwutndi. Va nɨmba vɨlaa yelavɨtndi. Wanja nyaangɨt woseka ana walɨkandi waa yelavɨtndi. Ngiyambak.
42001001	Njambwi nyan Tiofilas mɨn kat nyaangɨt pɨlɨwupmat yigowun. God nɨnogwinala kwuta nɨma njɨvwa kat nɨma sakwat nɨmba pɨlɨwupmat tɨgandi.
42001002	God kwuta njɨvwa va nɨmba wan njɨvwa vɨlaa nat nɨmba kat mbutndi maa pɨlɨwutndi. God kwuta njɨvwa aywaa vɨlaa mbutndi. Va nɨmba Godna njɨvwa kwuta nɨmba ndi.
42001003	God kwutɨnda njɨvwa kat aywaa wagalalaa wutaa mɨn kat pɨlɨwupmat wowun. God kwuta njɨvwa kat wagalalaa wutaa apma vat pɨlɨwukiyowun. Sɨmblan ana pɨlɨwukiyowun.
42001004	Pɨlɨwukweya nyaangɨt vɨlaa tak wukwa nyaangɨt woseka ana wandi waa yelavɨka lɨgiyamɨn. Wupma yelavɨka lɨmangat pɨlɨwukowun.
42001005	Herot Judiana king tɨnda njɨmbla kan pɨlɨwukweya vak tɨndɨ. Kɨta nyan tɨndɨ ndɨna sɨ Sekaraia. Ndɨ God kat kwunatɨga nɨmbana kɨta nyana. Ndi God kat kwunatɨga nɨmba mbaapma mbaapmamba lɨndi. Wan nyan Abaisana mbaapma nyana. Ndɨna taagwana sɨ Ilisabet. Lɨla yelangɨ ndɨna yelangɨ kɨta. Eron walɨnja yelangɨ.
42001006	Mbɨk God waa vak apma vapmba yetɨmbɨk. God waa nyaangɨt wuka ndɨnai taaga njambiyamba yetɨmbɨk.
42001007	Mbɨt nyan kai. Ilisabet kwandɨ lagwa tɨga nyan ana kwutɨ. Mbambala avɨt ndu avɨt taagwa mbɨt.
42001008	Sekaraina mbaapma nɨmba njɨvwa kwupmat yandi. God kat kwunapmat yandi.
42001009	Ndina vak kɨngiyan. Mandɨt mandɨt njɨvwa kansaga kwutndi. Apma njangu veilɨga ya salɨlɨnda njɨvwa Sekaraia klandɨ. klalaa ya salɨvat Godna ngay wuleindɨ.
42001010	Ya salɨvat wuleindɨ mala nat nɨma sakwat nɨmba alagumba lɨga god kat wagala lɨndi.
42001011	Sekaraia godna ngay weleilaa apma njangu veilɨga ya salɨndeya kugɨmbɨ waymba njambwi nyana ensel vɨndɨ. Kugɨmbɨ yaagindan naangɨmba lɨndɨ, vɨndɨ.
42001012	Sekaraia ensel kat vɨlaa maawut viyalɨndɨ, vaaka lɨndɨ.
42001013	Ensel ndɨ kat wandɨ. Sekaraia ke vaaka. Wagalalɨma nyaangɨt God tamba wutndɨ. samat tɨga mɨna taagwa Ilisabet nyan kwukiyalɨ. Kwutɨ maa ndɨna sɨ Jon waa waigamɨn.
42001014	Kwutɨ maa solat sɨgiyamɨn. Nat nɨma sakwat nɨmba ndino solat sɨgiyandi.
42001015	God wan nyan kat bɨlaa ndɨ apma nyana njambwi nyana waa waigandɨ. Wan nyan ndɨ nɨma ngu ana kɨgiyandɨ. Wan nyan ndɨ nyɨmena yaapmba lɨndɨ, Godna waagan ndɨna mbangɨ tavɨgiyandɨ.
42001016	Wan nyan ndɨ Juda nɨma sakwat ndi kat mbutndɨ maa ndina njambwi nyan God waa nyaangɨt wuka yetɨgiyandi.
42001017	Tamba la nyan Iliaja nɨma kwondumba Godna njɨvwa kwutnda vla wan nyan kwukiyandɨ. Ndɨnai waigaa nyaangɨt wutaa God kat kai walɨga nɨmba God waa nyaangɨt mbukiya nyan kat kawiga tɨgiyandi waa wandɨ ensel.
42001018	Ensel wandɨ maa sekaraia ndɨ kat wagalandɨ. Woseka wamɨn? E? Woseka ana wamɨn? angamak vɨgiywowun. Wuna taagwa avɨt taagwat. Wuno avɨt ndu wun. Anda vapmba nyan kwukiyalɨ waa wandɨ maa ensel wandɨ.
42001019	Wun gebriel wun. Wun Godna apma njɨvwa kwutɨga nyan wun. God wandɨ maa mbukwa apma nyaangɨt yalaa mbukwun.
42001020	Tɨga lɨga mɨna kwundi kwulamakiyandɨ. Mɨna taagwa nyan kwutɨ maa mɨna kwundi apma vat tɨndɨ, kwundi ngambugiyamɨn. Wawa nyaangɨt wutaa kavle maawut yelavɨtaa woseka wandɨ? E? Woseka ana wandɨ? Waa wamangat mɨna kwundi kwulamakiyandɨ. Wawa nyaangɨt kak kiyandɨ, vɨgiyamɨn waa wandɨ ensel.
42001021	alagumba la nɨmba Sekaraia kat kwo kawiga lɨndi. Godna ngay wuleilaa sɨvla mbundɨ lɨnda waa nɨma vak yelavɨka lɨga kawiga lɨndi.
42001022	Sakaraia wogwelaa ndi kat nyaangɨt ana mbutndɨ. Ndi kat taamba mɨna yindɨ. Nyaangɨt mbutapman ndi kat taamba mɨna yinda vak vɨlaa godna ngaymba lɨga sɨmak vla vɨndɨ waa yelavɨtndi.
42001023	God kat kwunatɨnda njɨvwa ngɨlɨndɨ mala Sakaraia ndɨna ngayat yindɨ.
42001024	Gɨga lɨga ndɨna taagwa yapmba nyan tɨndɨ. Mbat tambanat ngaymba mɨna tɨlɨ. kava kava ana wogwelaa yilɨ. Lɨ walɨ.
42001025	Njambwi nyan God wun kat apma vat yindɨ. Tak nyan kwutapman tuwa njɨmbla nat nɨmba wun kat vɨlaa kavle taagwa lɨ waa yelavɨtndi. Mbambala wupma kai waa walɨ.
42001026	Ilisabetna yaapmba nyan mbak sɨla kɨta tɨndɨ maa God ndɨna ensel Gebriel kat wandɨ maa Galili walɨnja nɨma kɨpmana ngepma Nasaret walɨnja ngepmat yindɨ.
42001027	Wan ngepmamba taagwa nyan kɨta lɨlɨ. Lɨla sɨ maria. lɨ kat wandi ndu klavak kat. wan nduna sɨ Josep. Ndɨ tamba la nyan Devitna yelangɨ nyan Josep.
42001028	Ensel lɨ kat vɨlaa wandɨ. Apma nandinya. God nyɨn kat apma vak yigiyandɨ. Nyɨn kat apma vat yindeya vat nat taagwa kat wupma ana yigiyandɨ waa wandɨ maa
42001029	Maria ndɨ kat vɨlaa nɨma vak yelavɨtɨ. Manda kat wandɨ. Ana yelavɨkowun waa nɨma vak yelavɨtɨ.
42001030	Ensel lɨ kat wandɨ. Nɨmamba ke yelavɨka. Ke vaaka. God nyɨn kat kavle vat ana wandɨ. Nyɨn kat apma vat yivat wandɨ.
42001031	Samat tɨga nyɨna yaapmba nyan tɨgiyandɨ. Wan nyan kwutaa ndɨna sɨ Jisas waa waiganyɨn.
42001032	Wan nyan njambwi nyanat tɨgiyandɨ. Ndɨkat vɨlaa ndɨ Godna nyana waa waigandi nat nɨmba. God wandɨ maa ndɨna yelangɨna najmbwi nyan Devit tamba vɨga lɨnda vla ndɨno vɨga lɨgiyandɨ.
42001033	Njɨmbla njɨmbla Jekopna yelangɨ nɨmba kat vɨga lɨgiyandi. Vɨga lɨndeya vak ana ngɨlɨgiyandɨ waa wandɨ ensel.
42001034	Ensel wandɨ maa Maria ndɨ kat wagalalɨ. Wama nyaangɨt anda vapmba tɨgiyandɨ. Wun lan kai waa walɨ.
42001035	Walɨ maa ensel wandɨ. Godna waagan nyɨn kat yaa tavɨgiyandɨ. Godna kwondu nyɨn kat yaigandɨ. Wan nyan ndu kɨta nyɨna yaapmba ana taagagiyandɨ. God ndɨnayɨ taagagiya. Nyi kat tɨga wan nyan Godna nyana waa waigandi.
42001036	Awut nyɨla. Nyɨna yakwa lagwa Ilisabet nyan tɨgalɨ. Lɨ tamba avɨt taagwa lɨ. Tak nyan ana akwutɨ. Mbak sɨla kɨta tɨgalɨ nyan.
42001037	God kɨta nda tɨgiyandɨ waa wandeyan tɨgiyandɨ. Ndɨ kwondu mbundɨ nyana waa wandɨ ensel.
42001038	Wandɨ maa Maria walɨ. Wovuna. Wama nyaangɨt tɨgiyandɨ. Wun ana kai waigowun. Godna njɨvwa kwukiyowun waa walɨ maa ensel lɨ kat kwagalalaa yindɨ.
42001039	Tɨga lɨga Maria laataa nduwi la kavat yilɨ. Juda walɨnja nɨma kɨpmana nat ngepmat laataa yilɨ.
42001040	Ngepma yilaa Sekaraiana ngay wuleilaa Ilisabet kat apma nandinya walɨ.
42001041	Apma nandinya waga walɨ, Ilisabet wutɨ, lɨla yaapmba ta nyan yuvut yindɨ. yuvut yindɨ mala Ilisabetna mbangɨ Godna waagan tavindɨ mala walɨ.
42001042	Nɨma kwundimba walega walɨ. Apma vat tɨga taagwa nyɨn. God nyɨn kat apma vat yinda vak vla nat taagwa kat ana yindɨ. Nyɨna yaapmba lɨga nyan ama vat tɨga nyana.
42001043	Wuna njambwi nyana nyɨme nyɨn. Wuna ngay wuleinyan apma vakna. Nyɨn kat vɨwan apma vakna God kwiya apma vakna.
42001044	Awut nyɨla. Wun kat apma nandinya wanyɨn maa wuna yaapmba tɨga nyan solat sɨga yuvut yindɨ. Wukwun maa yuvut yindɨ.
42001045	God nyɨn kat waa nyaangɨt wutaa woseka wandɨ waa ana wanyɨn. God waa nyaangɨt tɨgiyandɨ waa wanyɨn. Wanya vat apma vatna waa walɨ Ilisabet.
42001046	Maia lungwamataa walɨ. God njambwi nyana waa wuna maawupmba yelavɨka lɨgowun.
42001047	God wun kat kwunatɨgandɨ. Wun kat kwunatɨnda vak kat yelavɨtaa solat sɨlɨgowun.
42001048	Wun Godna njɨvwa kwutɨgat taagwa wun. Wun kwo taagwa wun. God wun kat kwo awagapma apma vat yindɨ. Ngɨni yaiga nɨma sakwat nɨmba wun kat yelavɨtaa apma taagwat waa waigandi.
42001049	Njambwi nyan wun kat apma vat yindɨ. Ndɨna sɨ kwutaa katsogiyowun.
42001050	Ndɨnai waa nyaangɨt wutɨga nɨmba ndi kat kwunakiyandɨ. God ndina nyangu kat kwunaka ndina ngwak kat kwunaka kwunakiyandɨ.
42001051	God ndɨ kwondu mbundɨ nyana. nat nɨmba nɨn apma nɨmba nɨn waa yelavɨka lɨgandi. God ndi kat kai waa savɨlɨlɨgandɨ, kava kava vaaka yigiyandi.
42001052	Njambwi la ndi king kat kai waa ndina sɨ viyesendalɨgandɨ. Kwo la ndi nɨmba ndina sɨ kwutaa katsolɨgandɨ.
42001053	Wundɨ kat tɨga nɨmba ndi kat apma kɨgɨnda kwilɨgandɨ. nɨma sakwat nɨmbun ndawi lɨga nɨmba ndi kat ana kwilɨgandɨ. Ndi Godnanamba klalapman kwo yilɨgandi.
42001054	God ndɨna nɨmba isrel walɨnja nɨmba ndi kat kwunatɨndɨ. kwunatɨnda vak yelavɨka lɨgiyandi. Ndina maawut ana tɨvɨgiyandɨ.
42001055	Tamba nɨna ngwat walanga kat kwunakiyowun waa wandɨ God. Tamba la nyan ebraham kat kupma wandɨ. Mɨno mɨna nyangu ngwak walanga kat kwunakiyowun waa God wandɨ Ebraham kat waa walɨ Maria.
42001056	Maria Ilisabetna ngay mbak kuvut tɨlɨ. Tɨga lɨga yilɨ lɨla ngepma.
42001057	Ilisabet nyan kwup mɨna lɨlɨ. Tɨga lɨga nondanyan kwutɨ.
42001058	Nyan kwutɨ mala lɨla ngepma nɨmba lɨla yelangɨ nɨmba wutaa solat sɨga wandi. Njambwi nyan lɨ kat apma vat yindɨ waa solat sɨga wandi.
42001059	Nandinya sɨla kuvut yindɨ maa mat nyana mbangɨ pɨtaa sɨ wavat wandi. Ndɨna nyaekna sɨmba Sekaraia waa wavat wandi.
42001060	Ndɨna nyɨme kai walɨ. Ndɨna sɨ Jona waa nyɨme walɨ.
42001061	Walɨ maa lɨ kat wandi. Nyɨna yelangɨna sɨ ana ndɨ. Manda kat Jon waa waiganyɨn waa wandi.
42001062	Nyɨme kat walaa mat nyana nyaek kat taamba yiga wagalandi maa
42001063	ndɨ taamba yiga pensil pepa agwi waa taambamba wandɨ. kwindi maa pɨlɨwutndɨ, vɨlaa ngɨpaliga ndandi.
42001064	Sekaraia jona sɨ pɨlɨwutaa ndɨna kwundi kwo lɨndɨ, ngambundɨ. Godna sɨ kwutaa katsoga ngambundɨ.
42001065	Ngambundɨ mala ndɨna ngepma nɨmba wutaa maawut viyalɨndɨ, vaaka lɨndi. Vaaka lɨga judia walɨnja nɨma kɨpmana nduwi la kava kavamba mbutseli mbutsela mbutɨndi.
42001066	Nɨma sakwat nɨmba wan nyaangɨt wutaa nɨma maawut yelavɨka lɨndi. yelavɨka lɨga wagalandi. Wan mat nyan angamak tɨgiyaa nyana waa wagalandi. God wan nyan kat kwondu kwindɨ, vɨndi.
42001067	Jona nyaek sekaraia Godna waagan ndɨna mbangɨ tavindɨ mala Godna nyaangɨt mbutndɨ.
42001068	Mbuka wandɨ. Nɨn Isrel walɨna nɨmba nɨna njambwi nyan God ndɨ apma nyana. Ndɨna nɨmba kat ngaga yalaa kwunatɨndɨ.
42001069	Nɨn kat kwunatɨga nyan tamba kwindɨ. Nɨn kat kwunapmak yaiga nyan tamba la nyan Devitna yelangɨ nyana.
42001070	Tamba la profet ndi God waa nyaangɨt mbutndi. God ngɨni nɨn kat kwunakiyandɨ waa mbutndi.
42001071	Nɨn kat kwunatndɨ mala nɨna maama nɨmba kat kwulakiyanɨn. Nɨn kat kai walɨga nɨmba kat kwulakiyanɨn waa tamba la profet mbutndi.
42001072	God nɨna ngwak kat tamba wandɨ. ngwuk kat awagapma apma vat yigiyowun waa wandɨ. Wan wanda apma nyaangɨt Godna maawut ana tɨvɨgandɨ.
42001073	Tamba God nɨna walanga Ebraham kat nɨma kwundimba wandɨ. Mɨn kat apma vat kwunakiyowun waa wandɨ.
42001074	Wan wanda vak vla nɨn kat kwunakiyandɨ. nɨn kat kwunatndɨ mala nɨna maama nɨmba kat kwulataa nat vak kwagalalaa Godna njɨvwa mɨna kwukiyanɨn. kwuka lɨga ana vaaka lɨgiyanɨn.
42001075	Apma vat yiga God yeta vla apma vak yetɨgiyanɨn njɨmbla njɨmbla.
42001076	Mɨn Jon wuna nyan mɨn njambwi nyan God ndɨnai waa nyaangɨt mbutɨga nyanat tɨgiyamɨn. Mɨn tatak njɨvwa kwuka yigiyamɨn. Njambwi nyan ngɨni njɨvwa kwuka yaigandɨ. njambwi nyan yandeya yambɨ mɨn kwunakiyamɨn.
42001077	Njambwi nyan ndɨna nɨmba kat kwunatndeya vak mɨn ndi kat mbukiyamɨn. Ndi kat kwunataa kavle vat yiga yetɨlɨnja vak kat njambwi nyan sɨlɨmbwigiyandɨ.
42001078	God nɨn kat nɨma maawut yelavɨka lɨgandɨ. Ngi kat tɨga nɨn kat kavle vat awagapma sɨlɨmbwigiyandɨ.
42001079	Mbambala nɨn kulun walɨga kavamba tɨga nɨmba vla lɨganɨn. mbambala wundumbu yilɨga nɨmba vla lɨganɨn. nɨn kat kwunatndɨ maa nɨna maawut apma vat mɨna yelavɨka lɨgiyanɨn waa wandɨ Sekaraia.
42001080	Mat nyan Jon tamba nɨma yindɨ. Apma maawut sɨka lɨndɨ. Tɨga lɨga ngepma kwagalalaa ndinyangu lapman kwo kava yiga yetɨndɨ. Isrel walɨnja nɨmba kat nyaangɨt mbutndeya nandinya kat kwo kavamba lɨga kawiga lɨndɨ.
42002001	Ndina kɨpmana njambwi nyan Sisa Ogastas ngepma ngepmana nɨmbana sɨ klavat wandɨ.
42002002	Tak ndina sɨ ana klalɨndi. kupi vatna tamba sɨ klavat yigandi. Sɨ klalɨnja njɨmbla Siria walɨnja kɨpmana nɨma nyan Sairinias tɨndɨ.
42002003	Sɨ klavat wandi maa ngepma ngepma la nɨmba ndina ngepma kwagalalaa angwa ngepmat yindi.
42002004	Josep ndɨno yindɨ. Nasaretna nat ngepma Galili kwagalalaa Betlehem walɨnja ngepmat yindɨ. Wan ngepma Judiamba lɨndɨ. Betlehem Devitna yelangɨ nɨmbana angwa ngepma. Josep ndɨ Devitna yelangɨ nyana.
42002005	Kapma ana yindɨ. Ndɨna tagwonala yindɨ. Ndɨna taagwa nyan tɨlɨ.
42002006	Tamba yiga wungi ngepmamba lɨgandi. Tɨga lɨga nyan kwup mɨna lɨgalɨ.
42002007	Tɨga lɨga ngɨma nyan kwutɨ. kwutaa ndɨ kat waavwimba ngiga kwutɨ. Ndɨ kat kwataa yiga naangalɨ. Bulmakau kɨgɨnda kɨla bokismba naangalɨ, sɨndu kwandɨ. Tak haus pasindia wuleivat wambɨt. Haus pasindia tamba taatɨ. Nɨma sakwat nɨmba.
42002008	Ngepma ngwaymba nat nɨmba sip sip kat ngan vɨga lɨndi.
42002009	Tɨga lɨga njambwi nyana ensel ndi kat ngaga yandɨ. ngaga yandɨ mala nɨma vak kembandɨ vɨlaa vaaka lɨndi.
42002010	Ensel ndi kat wandɨ. Ke vakngwa. Apma nyaangɨt mbupmat yawun. Mbukweya nyaangɨt wukiya nɨmba aywaa solat sɨgiyandi.
42002011	Mbambala Devitna ngepmamba taagwa kɨta nyan kwutɨ. Wan nyan ngwuk kat kwunakiya nyana. Wan nyan njambwi nyana. God wandɨ, yaa nyana.
42002012	Ngepma yilaa vɨgiyangwuk wan nyan kat. Ndɨna nyɨme ndɨ kat waavwi ngilaa bulmakau kɨgɨnda kɨga bokismba naangalɨ, vɨgiyangwuk. Bulmakau kɨgɨnda kɨla bokismba kwaiga nyan kat vɨlaa ensel nɨn kat ana woseka wandɨ. Kɨngi mat nyan kat wandɨ waa yelavɨkiyangwuk waa wandɨ ensel.
42002013	Ensel wandɨ mala nɨma sakwat ensel ngaga yalaa dɨnogwinala ngambulɨndi. Godna sɨ kwutaa katsoga ngambulɨndi.
42002014	God nyɨnangwupmba lɨga apma nɨma nyana. Ngwuk kɨpmamba lɨga nɨmba ngwuk kat apma vat yindɨ, apma maawupmba tɨgiyangwuk waa wandi.
42002015	Ensel walaa ndi kat kwagalalaa nyinangwutnat wokendi. Wokendi maa vɨga la nɨmba awat sowat ngambundi. Betlehem yagwa yigat. Nɨma nyan nɨn kat mbutnda vak yiga vɨgiyanɨn walaa yindi.
42002016	Laataakwiyatapman yindi. yilaa yiga vɨndi. mariagwi Josep kat vɨndi. wan nyan bulmakau kɨgɨnda kɨla bokismba kwandɨ, vɨndi.
42002017	Vɨlaa ensel ndi kat mbukna nyaangɨt nat nɨmba kat yiga mbutndi.
42002018	Mbutndi mala wuta nɨmba mandɨp mandɨp yelavɨka lɨndi.
42002019	Maria wutaa ana mandɨp mandɨp yelavɨka lɨlɨ. Lɨla maawupmba tɨndɨ, yelavɨka lɨlɨ.
42002020	Sip sip kat vɨga la nɨmba ndi kat kwagalalaa lungwamataa yindi. Ensel nɨn kat wanda nyaangɨt tɨgandɨ, vɨnɨn. God apma nyana. Njambwi nyana waa wandi.
42002021	Nandinya sɨla kuvuk yindɨ maa mat nyana mbangɨ pɨtaa ndɨ kat sɨ wandi. Ndɨna sɨ jisasa waa wandi. Ndina maawupmba ana wandi. Ensel kan sɨ wandɨ maa mat nyan nyɨmena yapmba tɨndɨ.
42002022	Taagwa nyan kwuta nglambi lɨmbwinjeya njɨmbla ngwaymba lɨgandɨ. Tamba la nyan Moses pɨlɨwuta nyaangɨpmba nglambi sɨlɨmbwindi. Ngi kat tɨga nglambi lɨmbwivat Jerusalemat yindi. Mat nyan kwutaa God kat sɨmogwivat kalimbɨt.
42002023	Tamba Moses kwiya nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutndɨ. Ngɨma nyan nondanyan aywaa God kat sɨmogwigiyangwuk. Ndi Godna njɨvwa kwukiyandi waa tamba pɨlɨwutndɨ.
42002024	Nglambi sɨlɨmbwivat waavi vatnyalaa kwimbɨt. Tamba Moses kwiya nyaangɨpmba kwimbɨt. nugulɨvɨk vɨlɨlɨk kwingweyan wovuna. Namio vɨlɨlɨk kwingweyan wovuna waa tamba pɨlɨwutndɨ Moses.
42002025	Kɨta nyan Jwerusalemba la nyan ndɨna sɨ Simion. Ndɨ apma vat yiga yetɨlɨga nyana. God waa nyaangɨt wutɨga nyana. God Isrel walɨnja nɨmba kat kwunatndeya njɨmbla kat kawiga lɨlɨndɨ wan nyan. Godna waagan ndɨna mbangɨ tavilaa lɨndɨ.
42002026	Tak Godna waagan ndɨ kat mbutndɨ. Tak ana kiyaigamɨn. Tak God wandɨ, yaa nyan Kraist ndɨ kat vɨgiyamɨn. Vɨlaa ngɨni kiyaigamɨn waa mbutndɨ.
42002027	Godna waagan ndi kat wandɨ maa Godna ngay wuleindɨ. Wuleindɨ maa Jisasna nyaek nyɨme ndɨ kat kwutaa wuleimbɨt. Tamba Moses mbuta nyaangɨpmba nglambi sɨlɨmbwivat wuleimbɨt.
42002028	Simion mat nyan kat vɨlaa yiga ndɨna taambamba kwutaa Godna sɨ kwutaa katsolaa God kat wandɨ.
42002029	Njambwi nyan tak wun kat wama nyaangɨt mbambala tamba vɨgowun. Mbambala kiyaweyan wovuna. Ana kai waigowun.
42002030	Ndinyangu kat kwunapmak kwima nyan mbambala tamba vɨgowun.
42002031	Wamɨn maa wan nyan ndinyangu kat aywaa kwunapmak yandɨ.
42002032	Juda ana ndi nat nɨmba ndi kat apma nyaangɨt vɨsɨmogwindɨ, vɨga wukiyandi. Nɨn Isrel waa Juda walɨnja nɨmba nɨna nɨndɨmba laatndɨ. Nɨna nɨndɨmba laatndangat nat nɨmba nɨna sɨ kwutaa katsogiyandi waa wandɨ Simion.
42002033	Simion wandɨ mala Jisasna nyaek nyɨme wutaa mandɨt mandɨt yelavɨpmbɨk.
42002034	Simion mbɨk kat wandɨ. God mbɨk kat apma vat yigiyandɨ waa walaa Jisasna nyɨme Maria lɨ kat vɨga wandɨ. Awut nyɨla. Wan mat nyan kwutndeya njɨvwa kwutndɨ mala Judana nɨma sakwat njambwi nɨmba kavle yigiyandi. Nɨma sakwat nɨmba kwo nɨmba apma vat tɨgiyandi. Nat nɨma sakwat nɨmba ndɨ kat kai waigandi.
42002035	Ndɨ kat kai waiga nɨmba maawupmba yelavɨtnjeya vak ana pagwugiyandi. Kapmba kai waigandi. Kai wanja njɨmbla nyɨn kat nɨma vat tɨgiyandɨ waa wandɨ Simion.
42002036	Profetna njɨvwa kwutɨga taagwa kɨta lɨlɨ. Lɨla sɨ Ana. Lɨla nyaekna sɨ Panuel. Lɨla yelangɨ Asa walɨnja yelangɨ. Lɨ avɨt taagwak. Tak ndu klalaa naambi sɨla vɨli tɨlɨ.
42002037	Lɨla lan kiyandɨ maa to lagwa kwalɨ. Lɨla naambi ndumi aynat kiyeli aynat. Godna ngaymba mɨna jnjɨvwa kwuka yetɨlɨ. Nat walaa nandinya ngan God kat mɨna wagalaga yetɨlɨlɨ.
42002038	Jisasna nyaek nyɨme tɨlɨmbɨk mala Godna ngay wuleilɨlɨ. Mat nyan kat vɨlaa God kat sɨvu lɨlɨlɨ. Kumba la nat nɨmba God ngɨni Juda kat kwunatndeya njɨmbla kat kawiga lɨndi. Wundi nɨmba kat vɨlaa walɨ. Ndɨnayɨ. Nɨn kat kwunakiya nyana waa walɨ. Nɨn kat kwunakiya nyan tamba yalaa lɨgandɨ waa Jerusalemba la nɨmba kat mbutseli mbutsela mbutɨlɨ.
42002039	God waa nyaangɨpmba nglambi aywaa lɨmbwiyagilaa ngepmat yɨmbɨt. Galili walɨngja kɨpmat yiga mbɨtna angwa ngepma Nasaretnat Jisas kat kwutaa yimbɨt.
42002040	Tɨga lɨga mat nyan nɨman yindɨ. Ndɨna maawut apma vat sɨka lɨndɨ. Apma vat ndɨna nambu lɨgandɨ. God ndɨ kat nɨma kwondu kwindɨ.
42002041	Jisasna nyaek nyɨme naambi naambi pasova walɨnja pesto vɨvat Jerusalemat yilɨmbɨt.
42002042	Jisasna naambi taamba vɨli kiyeli vɨlɨlɨk tɨndɨ, yilɨnja vak vla pesto kat yilɨndi.
42002043	Pesto ngɨlɨndɨ mala Jerusalem kwagalalaa ngepma lungwamataa yindi. Jisas ndɨ ana yindɨ. Ndɨ wumba lɨndɨ. Mbɨk Jisas tamba yigandɨ waa yelavɨtaa Jerusalem kwagalalaa yimbit.
42002044	Nɨma sakwat nɨmba kɨtamba yilɨndi. Jisas kɨta vat yilɨganɨn waa yelavɨtaa kɨta nandinya yiga tɨmbɨk. Ava yambɨ yiga lɨga ngan mbɨla ngepma nɨmba alɨ nɨmba kat Jisas kat kwaka wagalambɨt.
42002045	Wagalambɨt, kai ana lɨgandɨ wandi. Kai wandi mala ndɨ kat kwapmak Jerusalem lungwamataa yimbɨt ndɨ kat vɨvat.
42002046	Ndɨ kat kwaka vɨlevimbɨt. Kwaka vɨlevilaa kuvut wan nandinya Godna ngay wuleilaa ndɨ kat vɨmbɨt. Nat nɨmba kat sɨmogwi lɨga njambwi nɨmbana nɨndɨmba ndalɨndɨ, vɨmbɨt. Ndɨ kat wagalalaa mbutɨnja nyaangɨt wuka lɨndɨ.
42002047	Jisas mbuta nyaangɨt wuta nɨmba ngɨpaliga ndandi.
42002048	Ndɨna nyaek nyɨme ndɨ kat vɨlaa mbɨtno ngɨpaliga ndambɨt. Ndɨna nyɨme ndɨ kat walɨ. Nyan, an kat manda kat wupma yimɨn. Wuno mɨna nyaekno mɨn kat kwaka yeta. Nɨma vak yelavɨka kwaka yeta waa walɨ maa wandɨ.
42002049	Mand kat wun kat kava kava kwatɨmbɨt. Wuna nyaekna ngaymba tuwan apma vatna. Nglaatndɨ. Tuwa vak wupma mbɨk ana vɨga lɨgambɨt? Waa wandɨ.
42002050	Wanda nyaangɨt wutaa ana yigumba yelavɨpmbɨk.
42002051	Bɨlagwio kɨta kɨta yigandɨ Nasaretnat. Nasaretmba yiga tɨga mbɨlai waa vak Jisas wuka lɨndɨ. Ndɨnai ya vak vɨlaa ndɨna nyɨme maawupmba yelavɨka lɨlɨ.
42002052	Jisas nɨma yilaa ndɨna nambu apma vat tɨndɨ. Godno nat nɨmbo ndɨ kat vɨlaa apma vat tɨgandɨ waa Jisas kat wandi.
42003001	Njambwi nyan Tabirias Sisa naambi taamba vɨli kiyeli tambanat vɨga lɨndɨ. Judia walɨnja nɨma kɨpma kat vɨga la njambwi nyan Pontias Pailat. Galili walɨnja nɨma kɨpma kat vɨga la njambwi nyan Herot. Herotna yakwa nyan Filip kava vɨlɨlɨk kat vɨga lɨndɨ. Ndɨ Ituriagwi Trekonaitis kat vɨga lɨndɨ. Abilini walɨnja kava kat vɨga la nyan Laisenias.
42003002	Judana njambwi nɨmba God kat kwunatɨga nɨmba vɨlɨlɨk palɨ. Mbɨla sɨ Anaso Kaiafas. Wan njɨmbla God Sekaraiana nyan Jon kat wandɨ. Wandɨ, Jon ndinyangu lapman kwo kavamba yiga lɨndɨ.
42003003	God wandɨ maa kwo kava kwagalalaa Jodan walɨnja ndandangɨ wayat yindɨ. Yiga mbutndɨ. Kavle maawut kwagalalaa mandɨt kupi maawupmba lɨga ngu yagungweyan God ngwutna kavle vat sɨlɨmbwigiyandɨ waa mbutndɨ.
42003004	Jon mbuta nyaangɨt tamba la profet Aisaia ndɨ tamba kɨta vat pɨlɨwutndɨ. Kupma pɨlɨwutndɨ. Kɨta nyan kwo kavamba lɨga laataa nyaangɨt mbukiyandɨ. Njambwi nyan yaiga yambɨ kwunak ngwula waa bukiyandɨ. Ngu lɨga kava kava ngɨni tagula kɨpmat tɨgiyandɨ.
42003005	-
42003006	Nduwi tɨga kava nduwi ndandɨ, apma savagu kɨpma tɨgiyandɨ. Sɨvi vita lɨga yambɨ ngɨni apma vat tɨgiyandɨ. Nɨma kambat tɨga yambɨ ngɨni savagu lɨgiyandɨ. Ngɨni God ndinyangu kat kwunatndeya vak ndinyangu aywaa vɨgiyandi waa tamba pɨlɨwutndɨ Aisaia.
42003007	Nɨma sakwat nɨmba ngu yaguvat Jon kat yandi. Yandi maa ndi kat mbutndɨ. Ngwuk apma nɨmba ana ngwuk. Ngwuk kamboyna nyangu vla lɨgangwuk. Ngɨni yaiga kavle vak kat vaaka lɨga wun kat yangwuk.
42003008	Kavle maawut kwagalalaa apma kupi maawupmba yelavɨka lɨngweyan apma vapmba yiga alɨ ngwuk. Ngwuk kupma yelavɨka lɨgangwuk. Nɨn Ebrahamna nyangu nɨn. Ngi kat tɨga kavle savle yiga yetɨneyan God nɨn kat ana kai waigandɨ waa yelavɨka lɨgangwuk. Wupma ke yelavɨka. Ana nglaatndɨ. Kavle savle yiga yetɨngweyan God ngwuk kat kai walaa kan tɨga kambak kwutndɨ mala Ebrahamna nyanguat tɨgiyandi.
42003009	Kavle mi vɨtɨga nyan vɨp mɨna lɨgandɨ. Avɨmba ngwuk. Apma mɨ sɨk kwalapma mi aywaa vɨtaa yamba yaagindɨ, vɨkiyandɨ waa mbutndɨ Jon.
42003010	Mbutndɨ mala nɨma sakwat nɨmba ndɨ kat wagalandi. Anda apma njɨvwa kwutaa apma vat kwo lɨgiyanɨn waa ndɨ kat wagalandi.
42003011	Wagalandi mala ndi kat wandɨ. Waavwi vɨlɨlɨk tɨga nyan nat nyan waavi lapman tɨga nyan kat agwi. Kɨgɨnda lɨga nyan kɨgɨnda lapman tɨga nyan kat vɨlaa agwi waa wandɨ Jon.
42003012	Takis sanya klalɨga nɨmba ngu yaguvat Jon kat yalaa wagalandi. Sɨmogwi lɨga nyan nɨn angambak yigiyanɨn waa wagalandi maa Jon ndi kat wandɨ.
42003013	Ngwuk kiap waa sakwapmba mɨna klaigangwuk takis sanya. Mandɨp wata kwuleiga sɨkwupmak klalɨngweya waa Jon ndi kat wandɨ.
42003014	Soldia ndɨ kat wagalandi. Nɨn angamak yigiyanɨn waa wagalandi maa Jon ndi kat wandɨ. Ngwuk wata woseka waga ndi kat viyaga nat nɨmbana nda sɨkwupmak walɨngweya. Ngwuk kat pe kwindi, ngiyambak waa awa waa wandɨ Jon.
42003015	Nɨma sakwat nɨmba Jon kat vɨlaa mandɨp mandɨp yelavɨka lɨndi. Ndɨ nɨn kat kwunakiya nyan anagandɨ waa maawupmba yelavɨka lɨndi.
42003016	Yelavɨka lɨnja vak wutaa Jon ndi kat wandɨ. Wun nɨma njɨvwa ana kwutɨgowun. Ngwuk kat ngu yagua njɨvwa mat njɨvwat. Ngɨni yaiga nyan wuna njambwi nyanat. Wun apma nyan ana wun. Ndɨna man suna yaaw ana alɨpsɨga njalakiyowun. Apma nyan mɨna njalakiyandɨ. Wuna kwupmba ngɨni yaiga nyan wandɨ mala Godna waagan ngwuk kat tavigiyandɨ. Tayindɨ mala kɨsɨk yamba vɨka ngɨlɨndaya vak ngwutna kavle vat ngɨlɨgiyandɨ.
42003017	Ngɨni yaiga nyan yuwi sɨk kwutɨga nyan vla lɨgandɨ. Sɨla sɨlak klalaa yiga yuwi sɨk sɨka yiga ngaymba yisolɨgandɨ. Ndɨna ava ndɨna sɨmbɨ sɨka nɨma vat vɨtɨga yamba yisolɨgandɨ.
42003018	Ndina kavle maawut kwunapmak Jon nɨma sakwat nyaangɨt mbutɨndɨ. Ndi kat apma nyaangɨt mbutɨndɨ.
42003019	Wan kɨpmana njambwi nyan Herot ndɨna yakwa nyana taagwa Herodias vanyangɨka klandɨ maa Jon ndɨ kat kavle vat yimɨn, mɨn kavle vat yilɨga nyan mɨn waa wandɨ.
42003020	Herot ya kavle vat nɨma sakwatna. Nat kavle vat yiga Jon kat kalabus kwutndɨ.
42003021	Jon nɨma sakwat nɨmba kat ngu yagulaa Jisas kat yagundɨ. Yagundɨ maa Jisas God kat wagalalɨndɨ maa nyinangwut yambɨ kwandɨ.
42003022	Wungi yambɨmba Godna waagan ngaga yandɨ. Namiyo saava klalaa yandɨ, vɨndi. Vɨlaa nyinangwupmba lɨga kwundi wutndi. Mɨn wuna apma nyan mɨ. Mɨn kat wun solat sɨlɨgowun waa wandɨ kwundi.
42003023	Jisasna naambi ndumi vɨli kiyeli tamba vɨli tɨndɨ, njɨvwa kwupmat laatndɨ. Ndɨ Josepna nyana waa nɨma sakwat nɨmba yelavɨka lɨndi. Wan nyan Josep ndɨna nyaek Hilai.
42003024	Hilaina nyaek Matat Matatna nyaek Livai Livaina nyaek Melkai Melkaina nyaek Melkai Jananina nyaek Josep Josepna nyaek Matataias
42003025	Matataiasna nyaek Emos Emosna nyaek Neam Neamna nyaek Eslai Eslaina nyaek Nagai Nagaina nyaek Meat
42003026	Meatna nyaek Matataias Matataiasna nyaek Semem Sememna nyaek Josek Josekna nyaek Joda Jodana nyaek Joanan
42003027	Joanana nyaek Resa Resana nyaek Serababel Serababelna nyaek Sialtiel Sialtielna nyaek Nerai Neraina nyaek Melkai
42003028	Melkaina nyaek Edai Edaina nyaek Kosam Kosamna nyaek Elmedam Elmedamna nyaek Ea Eana nyaek Josua
42003029	Josuana nyaek Eliesa Eliesana nyaek Jorim Jorimna nyaek Matat Matatna nyaek Livai Livaina nyaek Simion
42003030	Simiona nyaek Juda Judana nyaek Josep Josepna nyaek Jonam Jonamna nyaek Eliakim Eliakimna nyaek Melia
42003031	Meliana nyaek Mena Menana nyaek Matata Matatana nyaek Netan Netana nyaek Devit Devitna nyaek Jesi
42003032	Jesina nyaek Obet Obetna nyaek Boas Boasna nyaek Salmon Salmona nyaek Nason Nasona nyaek Aminadap
42003033	Aminadapna nyaek Admin Admina nyaek Anai Anaina nyaek Hesron Hesrona nyaek Peres Peresna nyaek Juda Judana nyaek Jekop
42003034	Jekopna nyaek Aisak Aisakna nyaek Ebraham Ebrahamna nyaek Tera Terana nyaek Neho Nehona nyaek Serak
42003035	Serakna nyaek Kiya Kiyana nyaek Pelek Pelekna nyaek Iba Ibana nyaek Sila Silana nyaek Kenan
42003036	Kenana nyaek Afaksat Afaksatna nyaek Sem Semna nyaek Noa Noana nyaek Lemek Lemekna nyaek Metusala
42003037	Metusalana nyaek Inok Inokna nyaek Jeret Jeretna nyaek Mahalalil Mahalalilna nyaek Kenan Kenana nyaek Inos
42003038	Inosna nyaek Set Setna nyaek Adam Adamna nyaek God.
42004001	Godna waagan Jisasna mbangɨ tavindɨ mala Jisas Jodan walɨnja ndandangɨ kwagalalaa kwo kavat yindɨ. Godna waagan wanda ava yambɨmba yindɨ Jisas.
42004002	Kwo kavamba nandinya ndumi vɨlɨlɨk yetɨndɨ. Yetɨga lɨga Seten ndɨ kat yalaa kavle vat ay waa wandɨ. Nandinya ndumi vɨlɨlɨk kɨgɨnda ana kɨndɨ Jisas. Kwo yetɨndɨ. Wan nandinya ngɨlɨndɨ, wundɨ kat tɨndɨ.
42004003	Seten ndɨ kat yalaa wandɨ. Godna nyanat tɨmeyan kan tɨga kambak klalaa bretnao kwupmeyan Godna nyanat tɨma vak vɨgiyowun waa wandɨ maa Jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ.
42004004	Tamba la nyan God waa nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutndɨ. Kɨgɨnda kɨvak kat mɨna yelavɨtɨgiya nɨmba ndi apma vat ana tɨgiyandi waa tamba la nyan pɨlɨwutndɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
42004005	Seten Jisas kat kwutaa nat kavat kalindɨ. Ndɨ kat kalilaa kan kɨpmana njambwi nɨmba vɨga la kava aywaa ndɨ kat kwiyatapman vɨsɨmogwindɨ.
42004006	Vɨsɨmogwilaa wandɨ. Vɨlɨma njambwi nɨmbana ava kwondu wuna kwondua. Wunamba klandi. Wuna maawupmba nat nɨmba kat kwilɨgowun.
42004007	Wun kat vɨlaa nambu sɨlandalaa mɨn njambwi nyan mɨn waa wameyan mɨn kat wuna kwondu kwigiyowun waa wandɨ Seten.
42004008	Jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ. Tamba la nyan God waa nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutndɨ. Ngwutna njambwi nyan kɨta lɨgandɨ. Godna. Nat nyan kat mɨn njambwi nyan mɨn waa ke waa. God kɨta lɨgandɨ njambwi nyan waa tamba pɨlɨwutndɨ waa wandɨ Jisas.
42004009	Setan ndɨ kat nat njambɨ kwutaa Jerusalemat kalindɨ. Kalindɨ maa God kat kwunatɨnja sɨvla mbundɨ ngayna sambɨ ngeat wokembɨt. Wokembɨt maa Seten ndɨ kat wandɨ. Godna nyanat tɨmeyan valaseliga kɨpmamba ndamɨn, vɨlu.
42004010	Tamba la nyan God waa nyaangɨt pɨlɨwutndɨ. Godna ensel mɨn kat vɨga lɨgiyandi. Ana kavle yigiyamɨn waa pɨlɨwutndɨ.
42004011	Nat nyan pɨlɨwutndɨ. Mɨn kat ensel kwutaa taambamba kwutaa katsogiyandi. Nɨmbumba ana nɨmamba ndai viyaigamɨn. Ndi kwutaa katsogiyandi waa tamba pɨlɨwutndɨ waa wandɨ Seten.
42004012	Jisas ndɨ kat wandɨ. Nat tamba la nyan God waa nyaangɨt pɨlwutndɨ. Awup mɨla. Ngwula njambwi nyan God kat kavle vat ay waa ke waa waa tamba pɨlɨwutndɨ waa Jisas wandɨ.
42004013	Seten Jisas kat kavle vat ay waa wanda nyaangɨt ngɨlɨndɨ maa Jisas kat kwagalalaa yindɨ. Yilaa yelavɨtndɨ. Ngɨni ndɨ kat yiga nat njambi waigowun waa yelavɨtndɨ.
42004014	Godna waagan Jisas kat kwondu kwindɨ maa Jisas Galili walɨnja kɨpmat yindɨ. Njɨvwa kwutɨnda vak kava kava la nɨmba mbutseli mbutsela mbutɨndi, wutndi.
42004015	Juda yisolaa tɨnja ngay wuleilaa ndi kat nyaangɨt mbutɨndɨ. Wutaa apma nyana waa yelavɨtaa wandi.
42004016	Jisas Nasaret walɨnja ngepma yindɨ. Tamba mat nyan tɨga kan ngepma yetɨga nɨman yindɨ. Ndɨna angwa ngepma. Njɨvwa lapman nandinya aywaa yisolaa lɨnja ngay wuleilɨndi. Wuleilaa nyinga lɨga nyaangɨt vɨvat laatndɨ Jisas.
42004017	Laatndɨ maa tamba la profet Aisaia pɨlɨwuta nyaangɨt tɨga nyinga ndɨ kat kwindi. Kwindi maa lavwilaa vɨga kwundimba wandɨ.
42004018	-
42004019	Godna waagan wun kat tavilaa mbutndɨ. Kavle vat tɨga nɨmba ndi kat apma nyaangɨt ambuk mɨla waa mbutndɨ. Ngindi, kalabusmba lɨ vla lɨga nɨmba ndi kat yiga njalap mɨla waa mbutndɨ. Vat ta nɨmba kat ndi kat kwunap mɨla waa mbutndɨ. Mbambala God nɨn kat kwunakiyandɨ waa ambup mɨla waa Godna waagan wun kat mbutndɨ waa tamba la profet pɨlɨwutndɨ waa Jisas viga kwudimba walaa
42004020	nyinga wan ngavna nyinga kat vɨga la nyan kat kwilaa ndaalɨndɨ. Ndaa lɨndɨ mala wan ngaymba la nɨmba apma nyaangɨtna ngambulɨnda waa yelavɨka aywaa ndɨ kat vɨlɨndi.
42004021	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Tamba la nyan pɨlɨwutnda nyaangɨt viga wawa nyaangɨt mbambala kak kiyagandɨ waa wandɨ maa
42004022	wuta nɨmba yelavɨtndi. Wan nyan apma nyaangɨt ngambulɨgandɨ. Apma nyaangɨt ngambulɨnda vak andamba klandɨ. Ndɨ kwo nyana. Ndɨ Josepna nyana waa yelavɨka wandi.
42004023	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Kɨngi ngepmana nyan wun viga lɨgangwuk. Ngɨni wun kat anagangwuk waiga. Nat ngepma kapaneam yilaa ndina yelogwen kat ta nɨmba kat kwunapmɨn. Angwa ngepma yalaa manda kat kwunatapman yilɨgamɨn waa wun kat anagangwuk waiga.
42004024	Wun kat wagalangweya nyaangɨt kat awat waigowun. Awuk ngwula. God waa nyaangɨt butɨga nyan profet walɨna nyan ndɨna angwa ngepmamba ta nɨmba ndɨ kat kai walɨgandi.
42004025	Tamba wupma lɨndɨ. Tamba Ilaija ta njɨmbla talagwa nɨma sakwat tɨndi nɨn isrelna kɨpmamba. Wan tamba la njɨmbla naambi kuvuk mbak sɨla kɨta meik ana ndandɨ, kɨgɨnda ngɨlɨndɨ.
42004026	Godna njɨvwa kwutaa tamba la nyan Ilaija kɨgɨnda lapman talagwa kat kwunapmak yindɨ. God wandɨ, yindɨ. Nɨn Isrelna talagwa kat kwunapmak ndɨ ana yindɨ. Kapman ngepmamba ta talagwa kat kwunapmak yindɨ. Lɨla ngepma Sarefat. Wan ngepma Saidon walɨnja nɨma kɨpmamba la ngepma.
42004027	Godna njɨvwa kwuta tamba la nat nyan Ilaisa ndɨno nɨmbun. Ndɨnai la njɨmbla kawia kɨla Juda nɨma sakwat tɨndi. Ndina kɨta nyan kat ana kwunatndɨ. Kawia kɨla kapma ngepma nyan kat kwunatndɨ Ilaisa. Wan nyana ngepma Siria walɨna ngepma. Ndɨna sɨ Neaman waa wandɨ Jisas.
42004028	Yisolaa lɨnja ngaymba la nɨmba wutaa Jisas kat walia lɨndi.
42004029	Walialɨga laataa Jisas kat kwutaa ngepma alaguat kalindi. Wungi ngepma nambu nduwimba ngindi, lɨndɨ. Nambu nduwi valagalaa tɨga kavamba ndɨ kat sandavat kalindi.
42004030	Ndi nɨma sakwat nɨmbana mbupmba wuleilaa yindɨ Jisas.
42004031	Jisas Galilina nat ngepma kapaneam walɨnja ngepmat ndaindɨ. Njɨvwa lapman nandinya ndi kat nyaangɨt mbutɨndɨ.
42004032	Ndɨnai waa nyaangɨt wuta nɨmba ngɨpaliga ndalaa maawupmba yelavɨtndi. Nat nɨmba mbutɨnja vla ana mbutɨgandɨ. Kwondumba mbutɨgandɨ.
42004033	Yisola lɨnja ngaymba Jisas mbutɨndɨ mala kavle waagan tavila la nyan laataa Jisas kat nɨma kwundimba walega wandɨ.
42004034	Mɨn Jisas Nasaret nyan manda kat nɨn kat yamɨn. Nɨn kat vatnyavak yamɨn? Mɨn kat vɨga lɨgowun. Mɨn God wandɨ, yaa apma nyan mɨn waa walega wandɨ.
42004035	Wandɨ mala Jisas kavle waagan kat kai waga wandɨ. makayak. Ndɨ kat kwagala waa wandɨ maa waagan wan nyan kat kwutaa viyandɨ mala ndina nɨndɨmba kɨpmamba ndandɨ. Waagan ndɨ kat ana kavle vat yindɨ. Ndɨ kat viyalaa kwagalalaa yindɨ.
42004036	Va nɨmba ngɨpaliga ndalaa awat sowat wandi. Ndɨnai mbuta nyaangɨt kwonduo tagula nyaangɨtna. Kavle waagan kat wandɨ maa wutaa kwagalalaa yilɨgandi. nɨma tagula vatna waa awat sowat wandi.
42004037	Yinda vak kat kava kavamba la nɨmba mbutseli mbutsela mbutɨndi. Aywaa wutndi.
42004038	Jisas yisolaa tɨnja ngay kwagalalaa Saimon waa Pita walɨnja nyana ngay wuleindɨ. Pitana nasakwatna mbangɨmba nɨmamba kangan walɨndɨ, kavle vat tɨlɨ. Lɨ kat kwunapmak Jisas kat wagalandi.
42004039	Lɨla ngwaymba laataa lɨga yelogwen kat kai wandɨ, kwo lɨlɨ. Lɨ laataa ndi kat kɨgɨnda kwutaa kwilɨ.
42004040	Nya tamba ndai mɨna lɨndɨ. Nat nɨma sakwat nɨmba yelogwen kat ta nɨmba kat kwutaa Jisas kat kalindi. Ndi kat aywaa taamba taagalaa kwunatnɨ.
42004041	Kavle waagan tavila la nɨmba kat ndino ndi kat kwunatndɨ. Kan waagan ndinyangu kat kwagalalaa walega wandi Jisas kat. Mɨn kat vɨga lɨganɨn. Mɨn Godna nyan mɨn waa walega walaa kwagalalaa yindi. Jisas ndi kat wupma ke waa waa wandɨ. God wandɨ, yaa nyan Kraist tɨnda vak nat nɨmba kat mbutnjangat kai walaa wupma ke waa waa wandɨ Jisas.
42004042	Ngambi wan ngepma kwagalalaa ndinyangu lapman kwo kavat yindɨ. Wan ngepma nɨmba ndɨ kat kwaka lɨga ndɨna kwupmba yindi. Ndina ngepma kwagalaa yivak kat kai waa wandi Jisas kat.
42004043	Jisas ndi kat wandɨ. Wuna njɨvwa kɨngiyan. God ndinyangu kat vɨga lɨga vat ngepma ngepmamba mbukiyowun. Wuna njɨvwa. Kɨta ngepma mɨna ana mbukiyowun. Ngepma ngepmamba mbukwangat wuna nyaek wandɨ mala yawun waa wandɨ Jisas.
42004044	Ndi kat kwagalalaa Judia walɨnja nɨma kɨpman ngepma ngepmat yindɨ. Ngepma yilaa yisolaa lɨnja ngay wuleilaa nyaangɨt mbutɨndɨ.
42005001	Jisas Genesaret walɨnja sak waymba lɨndɨ. Waymba lɨga God waa nyaangɨt ndinyangu kat mbutɨndɨ. Wungi nyaangɨt wupmat ngwaymba yaa ndɨ kat kematndi.
42005002	Jisas vɨndɨ bot vɨlɨlɨk yaawmba tundi, lɨmbɨk. Kami kwuta nɨmba bot kwagalalaa ndina njula kɨsɨk tɨndangat njangilɨndi.
42005003	Jisas yiga bot kɨta kundɨ. Saimon waa Pita walɨnja nyana botna kunda Jisas. Saimon kat wagalandɨ mala sɨvasagundɨ, Jisas bopmba ndaalɨga ndinyangu kat nyaangɨt mbutɨndɨ.
42005004	Jisas mbuta nyaangɨt ngɨlɨndɨ mala Saimon kat wandɨ. Jula kulaa samat wogwelaa yiga kami kat yaagi waa wandɨ.
